vivartavAdI tu vyAchaShye | ekavij~nAnena sarvavij~nAnaM pratij~nAya dR^iShTAntAkAN^kShAyAmuchyate- yathA somyeti || etaduktaM bhavati | ekena mR^itpiNDena paramArthato mR^idAtmanA vij~nAtena sarvaM mR^iNmayaM ghaTAdikaM mR^idAtmakatvAvisheShAdvij~nAtaM bhavet.h | yato vAchArambhaNaM vikAro nAmadheyam.h | vAchA kevalamastItyArabhyate | vikAro ghaTaH sharAva udaJNchanaM cheti | natu vastuvR^ittena vikAro nAma kashchidasti | nAmadheyamAtraM hyetadanR^itam.h | mR^ittiketyeva satyamityeSha brahmaNo dR^iShTAnta AmnAta iti | 
tatraikavij~nAnena sarvavij~nAnapratij~nAnaM mR^itpiNDAdidR^iShTAntAshcha vikAravivartAbhiprAyA itye(vaM)tat.h na tAvadvAkyAtpratIyate | kintu vAchArambhaNamityupapAdakavAkyabalAditi vaktavyam.h | atastadeva prathamaM vyAkuvarnvAchArambhaNashabdArthamAha- vAchArabdhamiti ||
nanvArambhaNashabdo lyuDantaH | lyuT.h cha bhAve karaNAdhikaraNayoshcha vihito na karmaNi nacha "kR^ityalluTo bahulam.h' iti karmaNi lyuT.h | prabalaniyAmakamantareNa bahulagrahaNasya karmaNi vyAkhyAtumashakyatvAt.h | "na chArabhyasyArambhaNamiti yujyate shabdaH' iti svavachanavirodhAchcha | tatkathamArabdha iti vyAkhyAnamiti | maivam.h | bhAva evArambhaNashabdasyAN^gIkArAt.h | vAchA vAgindriyeNArambhaNamutpAdanaM yasyeti tR^itIyAyA aluk.h | "TApaM chApi halantAnAM yathA vAchA nishA dishA' iti vachanAt.h, vAchayA.a.arambhaNaM yasyeti vA bahuvrIhirayam.h | tasyArthakathanaM vAchAkhyamiti |
tushabdo.avadhAraNArtha uttaratra sambaddhayate |
vAchArambhaNashabdAdeva vikAratvalAbhAdvikAra iti punaruktaM syAdatastAtparyamAha- sAN^ketyeti || vAchArambhaNashabdena sAN^ketikaM nAmaiva vAchyaM syAt.h | avayavArthakathanaM tu vaishadyArthameva | yathA chaShye.aneneti chakShuriti nirvachanalabhyeti darshanakAraNatve chakShuShA pashyatIti noktArthatA | tasyAM dashAyAmavayavArthasyAvivakShitatvAt.h | tathAcha vAchArambhaNashabdo.api sAN^ketikaparyAya iti | 
vikArashabdArthamAha- vikR^itamiti ||
anena vikriyata iti vikAra iti karmaNi ghaJNityuktaM bhavati | vikR^itatvopapAdakamarthAntaraM chAha- vahniti || vividhaH mR^ittiketyeva satyamityasyArthamAha- tviti ||
satyashabdArtho nityamiti || tushabdo.avadhAraNe | Adishabdena lohamaNyAdergraDaNam.h | yanmR^ittiketyAdi saMskR^itaM nAmadheyam.h tadeva nityamiti sambandhaH | vaidikamiti tadupapAdanam.h | 
tatashchaivaM yojanA | vAchArambhaNaM sAN^ketikaM nAmadheyaM vikAra utpattimat.h | tata evAnityam.h | kutaH | bahuvidhatvAt.h | puruShechChAnusAreNAneka(vidha)prakAratvAt.h | mR^ittiketyAdinAmadheyaM vaidikatvAnnityamanAdi cheti | nacha vAchArambhaNaM vikAra iti liN^gavaiShamyadoShaH | nAmadheyavikArashabdayorniyataliN^gatvAt.h | vAchArambhaNashabdasya cha nAmadheyavisheShaNatvAt.h | visheShaNAnAM cha visheShyanighnatvAt.h | ata eva sAN^ketyamityeva vaktavye sAN^ketyanAmetyavochat.h | yadA tu vAchA yasyArambhaNaM tannAmadheyaM vikAro janimaditi, vAchA nAmnAmArambhaNaM vividhAkAraH, AkArAkAriNorabhedAt.h | vikAritvAdutpattivinAshavaditi yAvaditi vA granthAntaroktA yojanA, tadA(tu) liN^gavyatyAsashaN^kaiva nAstIti | 
nanu cha sAN^ketikAnAmanAmutpattivinAshavattvaM saMskR^itanAmnAmanAdinityatvaM kimarthamatrochyate | paramaprakR^ite brahmavij~nAnena 
sarvavij~nAne.avAntaraprakR^ite.asmAkamivadR^iShTAnte (vo)chopayogAbhAvAt.h | ato.asaN^gatatvAnnAyaM shrutyartha iti | maivam.h | yadyapi parasyeva nedaM dR^iShTAntopapAdakam.h | tathA.api brahmaj~nAnena sarvavij~nAne dR^iShTAntAntaratayopayokShyate | yathA tena tadvij~nAtaM syAditi, prakR^itAnuvR^itterityAshayavAnAha- prAdhAnyAditi ||
idamuktaM bhavati | kR^itakatvAdanityatvAchcha parApekShatvena sAN^ketikaM nAmApradhAnam.h | anAdinityatvAtparAnapekShatvena saMskR^itaM pradhAnam.h | tatra yathA prAdhAnyAtsaMskR^itaj~nAnamAtreNa sAN^ketikaM j~nAnaM bhavati | tajj~nAnena yatphalaM vidvadvayavahAragocharatvAdikaM tadbhavatIti yAvat.h | evamanityatvAdinA.apradhAnasya devatAkamarAdimishrasya sakalasyApi jagato j~nAnena yatphalaM tatsamastamapi nityatvAdinA pradhAnasya paramAtmano j~nAnAllabhyate | tatphale.antarbhavatIti | atra prAkR^itAj~no.apItyanena phalApekShayedamiti sUchitaM (bhavati) | evaM tarhyekavij~nAnena sarvavij~nAnamamukhyaM syAditi chet.h | satyam.h | nahi pareNApi tanmukhyaM vyAkhyAtuM shakyam.h | tathA sati dR^iShTamR^idaH puruShasya ghaTasharAvAdisaMsthAnavisheShAdijij~nAsA.abhAvaprasaN^gAt.h | pAmarA na hi vidvAniti vadanti, ataH sadbhirityuktam.h | evaM nityaparAtmaviditi vAkyasyoktAnusAreNa sheSho j~nAtavyaH | 
nanu satyashabdaH kathaM nityArthaH | rUDheryogasya chAbhAvAdityato yogaM tAvaddarshayati- sadAtanamiti ||
satyamitItyAvartanIyam.h | sadAtanaM satyamiti nirvachanena satyamiti padena nityamuchyata eva | na tUpacharyata iti | budhairvaiyAkaraNairiti nirvachanamUlaM sUchayati | sadAshabdAttatra bhava ityarthe "avyayAttyap.h' iti tyappratyaye kR^ite "sarvasya so.anyatarasyAM diH' ityatra yogavibhAgAtsadAshabdasya so.anyatarasyAM bhavati | sadAshabdAdbhavArthe taddhitA iti Dyapratyayo votpAdyaH | dakArasya cha takAraH | 
idAnIM rUDhimapi darshayati- prayogashcheti ||
uttaratrAShyame prapATha(ghaTTa)ke satyashabdasya nityatva eva prayogashchAstIti sambandhaH | tameva prayogaM darshayituM "yadainaM jarA.avApnoti pradhvaMsate vA kiM tato.a(syAti)vashiShyata iti sa brUyAnnAsya jarayaitajjIyarte na vadhenAsya hanyate etatsatyaM brahmapuram.h' iti vAkyamarthataH paThati- jareti ||
yadainaM dehaM jarA.avApnoti pradhvaMsate vA.ayaM dehaH, (tadA)tatastadasya dehasyAntargataH paramAtmA dahyamAnagehAntargatagaganavatkimatishiShyate kiMvA paTAdivannashyatIti pR^iShye, nAsya dehasya jarayA.ayaM paramAtmA jIryate, asya vadhena na hanyate, kintvetadbrahma pUrNatvAtpuraM satyaM nityamiti parihAro.abhidhIyate | itishabdasya pUrveNAnvayaH | atrApi satyashabdaH kuto nityArtha ityata Aha- nityatva eva hIti || 
atra satyashabdo nityArthashchetsaN^gachChate | vinAshasya prakR^itatvAt.h | tathyArthatAyAmasaN^gatiH | anR^itatAyA aprastutatvAditi hishabdArthaH | etadeva spaShyIkartumetatsatyaM brahmapuramityetAvati paThitavye pUrvavAkyamapi paThitam.h | pUrveNaiva sambandhaH | brahmaNo jarAvadhayorabhAve satyatvaM hetutvenochyata iti chet.h | na | tvayA brahmavyatirikta(sya)satyasyAnabhyupaga(me)tatvenAnvayAbhAvAt.h | jarAdyupetAnAM dehAnAmasatyatvAsyAsiddheH asatyAnAM cha shuktirajatAdInAM jarA.adyabhAvena vyatirekasyApyabhAvAt.h | nanu tathA.api vAchArambhaNavAkyaM trivAraM kasmAtpaThyate | shabdAntaraM dR^iShTAntIkartumiti brUmaH | tarhi ShaDete dR^iShTAntAH syuH | evamaivaitat.h | tathA sati saMskR^itashabdadR^iShTAntatrayamekatraiva vaktavyam.h | maivam.h | tattadabhidheyaprasaN^gAyattasya tadabhidhAnasya tadaiva vaktavyatvAt.h | tathA.api pratishabdaM dR^iShTAntIkaraNe.aparyavasAnaprasakterupalakShaNatve chaikenApi kR^itatvAchChabdatrayopAdAnamanupapannamiti chenna | mR^itpiNDAdidR^iShTAntatrayopAdAne.apyasya samAnatvAt.h | gahane prameye trayopAdAnaM na doShAya | kintu buddhivaishadyahetutayA guNayaiveti chet.h | samaM prakR^ite.apIti ||
evaM svamatena vAchArambhaNamityAdivAkyaM vyAkhyAya vivartavAda(di)vyAkhyAne doShamAha- vAchArambhaNamiti ||
uktam.h- uktiH shabda iti yAvat.h | vAchArambhaNamiti shabde mithyetivyAkhyAyamAne satIti sheShaH | tathAhi | kiM rUDhimAshritya vAchArambhaNamityasya mithyeti vyAkhyAnaM kriyate | kiMvA yogam.h | Adye rUDhij~nApakapramANAbhAvAdashrutakalpanam.h | athArabhyata ityArambhaNamiti dvitIyaH | tathA.api kR^idyoge ShaShThayAM prAptAyAM tR^itIyAN^gIkAre.ashrutakalpanam.h | lyuTaH karmaNi vidhAnAbhAvAchchAshrutakalpanameva | asminnapi pakShe mithyAtvasyAlAbhAdashrutakalpanam.h | vAchArabhyatvamAtreNa tathAtve brahmaNo.api tatprasaN^gAt.h | vAchA kevalamArabhyate vikAro na tu vastuvR^ittenAstIti vyAkhyAne mithyAtvaM labhyata iti chenna | yataH shrutyA vAchArambhaNamityevokte kevalashabdaprakShepeNa mithyeti vyAkhyAne.ashrutakalpanameveti |
dUShaNAntaramAha- punaruktiriti || 
itishabdo.atrAdhyahAryaH | AgAmino vA kAkAkShinyAyenobhayatra sambandhaH | nAmadheyamityetannAmadheyamAtraM hyetadanR^itamiti pareNa vyAkhyAtam.h | tasya vAchArambhaNamityanenaiva gatArthatvAnnAmadheyamiti punaruktiH syAt.h | atha vikAro nAmadheyaM cha dvayamapi vAchArambhaNamiti vyAkhyAnaM, tathA.api vikArashabdenaivAbhidheyAbhidhAnayorgrahaNasambhavAnnAmadhayemiti punaruktireveti | tannAmarUpAbhyAM vyAkriyata ityAdishruteH | 
doShAntaramAha- itItyasyeti ||
mR^ittikAyAH satyatvaM hi parasya vivakShitam.h | tatra mR^ittikaiva satyeti vakta(vyam.h)vye itishabdastu nirarthaka eva | sa hi kvachitpadArthaviparyAsakR^it.h, kvachiddhetau, kvApyevamityarthe, kutrachidAdishabdArthe, kvachitprakArArthe, kvachitparisamAptau | na chAtrai(te)vamAdiShvanyatamenArthenArthavAn.h | asmAkaM tu "shabdAdathare sampratyayaH' iti mR^ittikArthe prApte tatparihAreNa shabdasvarUpagrahaNArthaM tadupapattiH | pariNAmavAdino.api kR^idyoge tR^itIyAyA aN^gIkR^itatvAt.h lyuTaH karmaNi vyAkhyAtatvAdvAchArambhaNaM vikAro nAmadheyamityeteShAM padAnAmanvayAbhAvena padAntarAdhyAhArasyeShyatvAdashrutakalpanam.h, nAmadheyasyApi vikAragrahaNena grahaNasambhavAtpunaruktiH, itishabdasya nirarthakatA cheti sphuTatvAnnoktam.h | nanu tenetishabdaH prakAravachana ityuktam.h | tatkathaM nirarthakatA | uchyate | kAryakAraNayorbhedashaN^kAnirAsArthaM hIdamuchyate | tatra yatsattayA mR^ittikA satI tayaiva mR^iNmayaM satyamiti vyAchakShANena vaktavyam.h, keyaM sattA vivakShiteti | svarUpasattA chetsAdhyAvishiShyatA | yo hi kAryakAraNayorbhedaM manyate, sa kathaM kAraNasvarUpeNaiva kAryaM svarUpavadityaN^gIkuryAt.h | atha sAmAnyasattA | sA.anaikAntikI | nahi mahiShasattayA sannashvo mahiShAnna bhidyate | atha mR^ittikAsattAdhInasattAkaM mR^iNmayamiti vivakShitamiti, tathA.api kulAlAdisattAdhInasattAkamapi bhavatItyanaikAntyameva | viruddhaM cha(chai)tat.h | yadyadadhInaM tadeva taditi | ato vivakShitasAdhanAnupayogitvAditishabdasya tanmate.api nirarthakataiveti | 
idAnIM yathA somyetyAdIni dR^iShTAntavAkyAni svamatena vyAkariShyanparakIyavyAkhyAyAM tAvaddoShamAha- eka iti ||
padasamuchchaye prathamashchashabdaH | itishabdasya pratyekaM sambandhaH | vaiyarthyaM vigatArthatvaM viruddhArthatvaM cha | evashabdena vaiyarthyasyAparihAryatAmAha | chashabdasya vivartavivakShAyAM chetyarthaH | jagato brahmavikAratvena tadAropitatvena chaikavij~nAnena sarvavij~nAne vivakShite mR^idA vij~nAtayA mR^iNmayaM vij~nAtaM syAt.h | lohena vij~nAtena lohamayaM vij~nAtaM syAt.h | kR^iShNAyasA vij~nAtena kAShNarAyasaM vij~nAtaM syAdityetAvatA pUrNatvAttrayANAmekashabdAnAM piNDamaNinakhanikR^intanashabdAnAM sarvashabdAnAM cha vigatAthartvaM syAt.h | sarvamR^iNmayAdInAmekamR^itpiNDAdivikAratvAbhAvAdviruddhArthatA cha syAt.h | AropitatvaM tvekasyApi mR^iNmayasyaikasminmR^itpiNDe nAsti | kutaH sarvasya | yuktyA samathyarta iti chet.h | tarhi vivAdapadatvena dR^iShTAntatA.anupapattiH | "laukikaparIkShakANAM yasminnarthe buddhisAmyaM sa dR^iShTAntaH' iti hi nyAyavidaH | kintu ghaTAdInAmabAdhitapratyakShAdisiddhatvena yuktirevAbhAsabhUteti paramANupuJNjavAdanirAse vakShyate | Aropitatve.api naikasminsarvamityekAdipadAnAM vaiyarthyameva | 
nanvakeneti paramAkAraNasyaikatvaM piNDeneti kAryAbhimukhyaM sarvamiti kAryanAnAtvaM vivakShitam.h | ataH kathaM vaiyarthyamiti | maivam.h | dArShyAntikavAkye tadvivakShAyAmatra vaiyarthyAparihArAt.h | 
api chAdyayordR^iShTAntayoH kAryakAraNabhAvamAtramasti | kintvekAdipadavaiyarthyameva | idantu sarvathA nopapadyate, yathA somyaikena nakhanikR^intaneneti | nakhanikR^intanasyAntyAvayavitvena kArShNAyasAntaraM prati kAraNatvasyaivAsambhavAt.h | kimvekasya sarvaM pratItyAha- nacheti || 
sarvaM cheti dvitIyachashabdasambandhaH | 
yadyatra dR^iShTAntatraye na vikAravivartavivakShA kiM tarhi vivakShitamityata Aha- ata iti ||
arthAntarasya dUShitatvAdityarthaH | chashabdAvitarotarasamuchchaye | tushabdena nityatvaM vishinaShyi | nityatvaM prAdhAnyopapAdakameva na tu svatantramekavij~nAnena sarvavij~nAnasyeti | mR^itpiNDAdidR^iShTAntatrayaM sAdR^ishyaviShayam.h | vAchArambhaNamityAdi tu prAdhAnyaviShayamiti vivektavyam.h | vAchArambhaNadR^iShTAntasya pUrvameva vyAkhyAtatvAtkiM punarvachaneneti chenna | buddhayArohArthamuktasyApyanuktena sahaikena vAkyenoktisambhavAdityAshayenoktam.h- ukteti || sAdR^ishyAdekavij~nAnena sarvavij~nAnamAchAryeNAnyatra vyutpAditamatrAnusandheyam.h | tathA mR^itpiNDAdidR^iShTAntAnAmavAntarabhedo.apIti | 
nanvasminnapi pakShe "sadeva somyedamagra AsIt.h' ityAderuttaragranthasya saN^gatyabhAvo doShaH | asmAkaM tu kAryakAraNabhAvAdiprapaJNchArthatvena astyupayoga ityata Aha- prAdhAnyeti || 
Adipadena pralaye.avasthAnaM trivR^itkaraNaM jIvarUpeNa praveshanamityAdikaM gR^ihyate | prAdhAnyAdbrahmaj~nAnena sarvaj~nAnasya phalaM bhavatItyukte, kutastasya prAdhAnyamityAshaN^kAyAM, tatpratipattyarthaM sR^iShTayAdeH pratipAdaka eva granthavistaraH pravR^itto.ataH kathamasaN^gatiriti | chashabdo.avadhAraNe | na tUpAdAnatvAdipratipattyarthamiti | na hyupAdanAM prekShApUrvaM kAryaM karoti | nApyadhiShThAnamadhyastam.h | eSha cheti vA sambandhaH | tena "apAgAdagneragnitvam.h' ityAdyapi parasya brahmaNaH prAdhAnyapratipattyarthamevetyuktaM bhavati | tathAchoktaM bhAShye | 
vivartamatanirAkaraNamupasaMharati- tasmAditi ||
kenApi mArgeNeti || brahmAvidyApekShayA vA, jIvAvidyApakSheNa vA, ekajIvamatena vA, anekajIvamatena vA, svapakShasAdhanena vA, parapakShanirAsena vA, yuktiparyAlochanayA vA, shrutipayarAlochanayA vA, vichAritamiti sheShaH | na bhavet.h upapannamityadhyAhAraH | tataH kimityata Aha- taditi || 
tat.h vivartamatam.h | tasmAdita vA | tasyaiva vivaraNaM asaN^khayAtadoShetaM yasmAditi | heyameva tat.h | natu taduktarItyA sUtrArtho grAhyaH | etena paramatanirAkaraNasyAsaN^gatirapi nirastA veditavyA | 
yadyuktAtiriktadoShAH santi | tarhi dUShaNAbhidhAnAya pravR^ittairvaktavyAH | kimuparameNetyata Aha- asaN^khayatveneti ||
doShANAmatibahutvena kAMshchiduktvA keShAJNchidupalakShaNe(Natve)naivoparantavyam.h | upalakShaNaM chaitAvatA.api bhavatItyuparamyata iti | sarve.api vaktavyAH, kimupalakShaNatvenetyata uktam.h- grantheti || granthAdhikye hi shrotR^INAM pravR^ittirna syAt.h | tathAcha kR^itamapyakR^itaM syAditi bhayAdapItyarthaH | 
yadi nopAdAnatayA vibhramAdhiShThAnatayA vA, brahmaNo jagatkAraNatvaM, kIdR^ishaM tarhi janmAdisUtre.abhitihamityata Aha- tata iti ||
pariNAmAdivAdasya nirastatvAdityarthaH | pitR^ivadichChApUrvakamiti katarR^itvena nimittatvamabhipraiti | vichitrAnekakAryakartR^itve shramAdidoShAH prasajyanta ityata uktam.h- ashrama iti || taduktamantaryAmyadhikaraNe | yadvA.ashrama ityenenedamabhipraiti | "adhikaM tu bhedanirdeshAt.h' ityAdinA brahmaNaH shramAdirnirasiShyate | nachApAdAnAdeH shramAdiprasaktirasti | ato.api kartR^itvamevAbhipretaM sUtrakArasyeti | 
evamasminnadhyAye parabrahmaNi nArAyaNe pratipAditasya sakalashrutisamanvayasya phalaM janmAdisUtroditalakShaNasiddhimupasaMharati- pUrNeti || 
pUrNAH pratyekaM niravadhikAH | 
|| iti shrImadAnandatIrthabhagavatpAdAchAryavirachite shrImadbrahmasUtrAnuvyAkhyAne prathamAdhyAyasya chaturthapAdaH || 
|| atha shrImannyAyasudhAyAM smR^ityadhikaraNam.h ||
yatpadaM vedasaMvedyaM kaTAkSheNApi vIkShitum.h |
na kShamante vimatayastamupAse shriyaH patim.h || 1 ||
ekavAkyatA(di)siddhaye prathamAdhyAyArthasaN^gatatvena dvitIyAdhyAyArthaM vivakShurabuddhisthena saN^gaterdarshayitumashakyatvAt.h prathamAdhyAyArthaM tAvadanuvadati- ukta iti ||
(sakala)jagajjanmAdinimittakAraNe sArvajj~nasarvaishvaryAdyanantaguNaparipUrNe.avidyAdyavadyagandhavidhure pare brahmaNi nArAyaNe svaravarNapadavAkyamahAvAkyarUpasya samastasya shAstrasya, sAkShAtparamamukhyayA vR^ittyA natu lakShaNayA, tathA mahAtAtparyeNa natu pArArthyena samanvayaH prathame.adhyAye samarthita ityarthaH | 
yadyapi samanvayashabdenaiva sAkShAdityartho labhyate | tathA.api parakIyasaMshabdavyAkhyAnanirasane.avahitairbhavitavyamiti sUchanAya tadvayAkhyAnamidaM kR^itamityadoShaH | athavA samanvayashabdena mukhyayA vR^ittyA.anvayaH pratIyate | paramamukhyayA tu vR^ittyA anvayaM darshayituM sAkShAdityuktam.h | yadvA na pradhAnaparamANvAdinirAsanena upAdAnatvAdipratipAdanena cha paramparayA kintu sAkShAdevetyanenAchaShye | 
evaM prathamAdhyAyArthamabhidhAya tatsaN^gatatvena dvitIyAdhyAyArthamAha- avirodha iti || 
atrokte.arthe.avirodho virodhAbhAvo.atra vyAchikhyAsitatayA buddhisannihite dvitIye(.adhyAye) sAdhyate | anenAsyAdhyAsyAtItAdhyAyena kAryakAraNabhAvalakShaNa(NA)saN^gatiH sUchitA bhavati | sakalashAstrasya samanvayena jagajjanmAdikAraNatve samastagurapUrNatve.asheShadoShavidhuratve cha parasya brahmaNo.abhihita eva(hi) tatra virodhaH sphurati | nAnyathA 
nirAshrayatvAt.h | virodhasphUrtAveva tadabhAvasAdhanasyAvasaro netarathA | aprAptapratiShedhAyogAt.h | ato.atItAdhyAyArthasya kAraNatvametadadhyAyArthasya kAryatvaM nishchIyate | athavA shrutisamanvayenopapAdito.apyartho na tAvachChrotR^INAM dR^iDhanirUDho bhavati, yAvadatra pratIte virodhAbhAvo na sAdhyate | virodhena shrutInAmevAprAmANyashaN^kanAt.h | tathA chAnupapAditakalpa evApadyate | virodhAbhAvasAdhane tu bhavatyeva dR^iDhanirUDhaH | yathoktam.h | "vimR^ishya pakShapratipakShAbhyAmarthAvadhAraNaM nirNayaH' iti | ato viparItakAryakAraNabhAvalakShaNA anayossaN^gatiH | 
nanUktArthe virodhastatra tatraiva parihR^itaH | kimatra pari(tatkimaparamava)shiShyate yadarthamadhyAyAntarArambhaH | satyam.h | prativakShyatyatrAchAryaH | 
nanvevamadhyAyasyAvirodhalakShaNaikArthatvenaikavAkyatve sati pAdabhedaH kinnibandhanaH | tatrApyasya pAdasya prAthamyaM kinnibandhanamityapekShAyAmAha-chaturvidhasyeti || 
tasyAvirodhasya | nirdhAraNe ShaShThI | Adau prathamapAde | avirodhaH sAdhyata ityanuvartate | chaturvidhasya tasyetyanuvAdAtsa chaturvidha iti labhyate | 
tadayamarthaH | yadyapyukte.arthe virodhAbhAva ityeko.arthaH | tathA.api yuktisamayashrutinyAyopetashrutivirodhAbhAvarUpAvAntarabhedena sa chaturvidho bhavati | tatpratipAdanena chaturNAM pAdAnAM bhedo yujyate | tasya chaturvidhasyApi virodhAbhAvasya madhye yuktivirodhAbhAvaH prathamapAde sAdhyate | sarveShAmapi virodhAnAM yuktyupajIvitavena tadvirodhasya prabalatayA tadabhAvasAdhanasya prAthamyopapatteH | yuktipuraskAreNa yuktyupajIvitvena tadvirodhasya prabalatayA tadabhAvasAdhanasya prAthamyopapatteH | yuktipuraskAreNa pravartanA(mAnatvA)chcha vichArashAstrasyeti |
nanu kathamabhAvasya chAturvidhyam.h | uchyate | chaturvidhA hi virodhino(nyo)yuktyAdayaH | tadupadhAnAdvirodho.api chaturvidho.abhidhIyate | tatastatpratiyogiko.abhAvo.api tathochyate | ata eva yaukta ityupapannam.h | abhAvasyApi paramparayA yuktisambandhitvAt.h | athavA.avirodhapadasannidhApito virodhastasyeti parAmR^ishate | tathAcha virodhasya yuktyAdyupadhAnena chaturvidhatvAttadabhAvasAdhanena pAdabhedo yujyate | chaturvidhasya tasya virodhasya madhye yaukto virodha AdAvuktaprakAreNa prabalo yatastasmAttadabhAvo.atrAdau sAdhyata iti yojanIyam.h | yadvA tasyeti virodhiparAmarsho.ayam.h | tasyApyavirodhapadena buddhisannihitatvAt.h | avirodho hi virodha(nirUpaNa)dhInanirUpaNaH | virodhashcha virodhinA vinA nopapadyate | tatashcha virodhino yuktyAdibhedena chaturvidhatvA(tta)dvirodhAbhAvasAdhanena pAdabhedopapattiH | chaturvidhasyApi tasya virodhino madhye yukteH prabalatvAdAdau yaukto yuktisambandhI virodhAbhAvaH sAdhyata iti yojyam.h | 
prathamAdhikaraNe visheShamAha- tatrApIti ||
apipadamAdAvityasyAnukaSharNArtham.h | tatra yuktivirodhAbhAvapratipAdake.api pAda ityanauchityashaN^kAsUchanArthaM vA | chashabdenAvirodhaH sAdhyata ityetadanukR^iShyate | smR^iteH pAshupatAdikAyAH | yadyapi smR^iterityasya na naJNarthena sambandho ghaTate virodhashcha samAse guNabhUtaH | tathA.api buddhayA viviktena tena sambandhaH sambhavati |
yuktivirodhaparihAralakShaNe.atra pAde smR^itivirodhaparihAro na kartavyo.asaN^gatatvAt.h | kartavyatAyAM vA prAthamyaM kuta ityata Aha- tasyA iti ||
tasyAH pAshupatAdismR^iteryuktisamayAdivirodhichatussvarUpatvAt.h | etaduktaM bhavati | pAshupatAdismR^itayo hi svayamAptAbhimatavAkyatayA samayarUpA api svAbhimatArthe yuktIH shrutIshcha saMvAdayantyo yuktisamayAdivirodhichatuShyayarUpAH | tatashchokte.arthe tadvirodhaparihAro.adhyAye.antarbhavatyeva | kintu pAdachatuShyayArthasaN^gato.a(pya)yaM na niShkR^iShyaikatraiva pAde.antarbhavati | tato.adhyAyAdau tadante vA vaktavyaH | prathamAtikrame cha kAraNaM na kiJNchidastItyAdyAdhikaraNe nirUpyata iti | evaJNcha tatrApi cha smR^iterityayamuktasyApavAdo bhavannapi na sarvathetyuktaM bhavati | 
samayAdivirodhasyApi parihAreNa niShkR^iShyapAdArthAbhAvAdyuktivirodhaparihArasyApi bhAvenAntarbhAvasambhavAchcha | 
ekasyaivAdhikaraNasya pAdachatuShyayArthasambandhena chatussvarUpatvakathana(nena)prasaN^gachChiShyANAM shAstre bahumAnotpAdanAyAnyadapi chAturvidhyaM vakti- pratyekamiti ||
chatvAro.api pAdAH pratyekaM chaturAtmakAH pAdachatuShyayArthavanto draShyavyAH | tadyathA | yuktivirodhaparihAralakShaNo.apyayaM pAdaH samayAditrayavirodhaparihArAtmako.api bhavati | tathA samayavirodhaparihAralakShaNo.api dvitIyo 
yuktyAditrayavirodhaparihArAtmako.api bhavatItyAdi | pAdA ityevokte sannihitatvAdetadadhyAyagatA eveti j~nAyate | tadarthaM sarve ityuktam.h | sarvAdhyAyasambandhino.apItyarthaH | yo yadadhyAyagataH pAdaH sa tadadhyAya(gata)pAdachatuShyayArthavAnavadhe(se)yaH | na kevalamevaM pAdAH, kintu tadaMshAshcha te pAdA aMshA yeShAM te tadaMshA adhyAyA ityarthaH | prathamAdhyAyaH samanvayasyevAvirodhAditrayasyApi pratipAdako bhavatItyAdi | pAdAnAM chaturAtmakatve.adhikaraNAnAM tathAtvaM siddhameva | na chaivamadhyAyAdibhedAnupapattiH paunaruktyadoShashcheti vAchyam.h | vivakShAbhedena sAmaJNjasyAt.h | yadA prathamaH samanvayasyArtho vivakShyate na tadA tadarthatetareShAmityAdi | 
anyadAdi chAturvidhyaM shAstrasya darshayati- mUrtInAmiti ||   Vyasa-(8) 
chatasR^iNAM vAsudevAdimUrtInAM pratipAdakatvenApi chaturAtmakatvaM j~nAtavyamiti yojanA | nanvetaduktameva, punaH kasmAduchyata ityata Aha- varNamiti || 
atrAgamAdityAN^gadvayasyopashleSho draShyavyaH | tatrAdyasyArabhyetyarthaH | dvitIyo.abhividhau | Agama iti chaturadhyAyishAstramuchyate | tatashchAyamarthaH | na kevalaM pratyakSharaM pratipadaM pratisUtraM pratyadhikaraNaM kintvetachChAstragatamekaM varNamArabhya A sarvashAstrAt.h, pratyadhikaraNaM pratipAdaM pratyAdhyAyaM samastena shAstreNa cha chatasro mUrtayaH pratipAdyanta ityarthaH | 
kuta etadavagantavyamityata Aha- AgamAditi || bR^ihattantrAderityarthaH |
etatpAdAdhikaraNapUrvapakShasiddhAntayuktIH saN^kShepeNAha- AptatetyAdinA ||
uktArthaM smR^itivirodhenAkShipya samAdadhatsUtram.h OM smR^ityanavakAshadoShaprasaN^ga iti chennAnyasmR^ityanavakAshadoShaprasaN^gAt.h OM || iti | asyArthaH | yaduktaM parasya brahmaNo viShNoH sakalajagajjanmAdikAraNatvaM sArvaj~nyAdisakalaguNapUrNatvaM samastadoShadUratvaM cha tadayuktam.h | pAshupatasAN^khayabauddhArhatAdismR^itiviruddhatvAt.h | tA hi shivaprabhR^itInAmeva jagajjanmAdikAraNatvAdikaM pratipAdayanti | nacha tAsAmanyo.avakAsho.asti yena pratIte.apyarthe tAtparyAbhAvaM pratImaH | anyathA tAsAM smR^itInAmanavakAshenAprAmANyalakShaNadoShaprasaN^ga iti | tanna | puruShottamasyaiva paJNcharAtrAdismR^itibhirakhilajagatkAraNatvAderuktatvAt.h | apara(nya)thA tAsAM pAshupatAdi(smR^iti)bhyo.anyAsAM paJNcharAtrAdismR^itInAmavakAshAntarAbhAvenAprAmANyadoShaprasaN^gAditi |
tatrAkShepastAvadayamayuktaH | shrutisamanvayenAsyArthasya sAdhitatvAt.h | shrutiviruddhAnAM(cha) smR^itInAmaprAmANyasyeShyatvAt.h | shrutisamanvayanyAyena pAshupatAdismR^itInAmapi parabrahmaNi samanvayena shivArchanAdiparatvena vA sAvakAshatvAchcha | samAdhAnamapIdamayuktam.h | sakalashAstrapramANakatvamuktArthasyAbhidhAyedAnIM smR^itimAtropAdAne kAraNAbhAvAt.h | parAbhidhitsitaM doShamavabuddhaya shrutiparityAgastvayuktaH | kintu sa parihartavyaH | anyathA prAgapi shrutiranAdeyA syAt.h | kiJNcha paJNcharAtrAdismR^itInAmaprAmANyaM parasyeShyameva | vAsudevArchanAdiparatayA sAvakAshatA.api tena sambhAvyeta | sAmyApAdanamAtre.api parasyaiva jayo nishchayapratibandhakatvAdityato nirdalaM pUrvapakSha tAvadujjIvayati- Aptairiti ||
ayamihAbhisandhiH pUrvapakShiNaH | shrutivirodhena smR^itInAmaprAmANyamabhilaShatA prabaladurbalatve sarvathA samarthanIye | anyathA.atiprasaN^gAt.h | na tAvatprAmANyakAraNabhAvAbhAvAbhyAM prAbalyadaurbalye | prAmANyasya svatastvenAN^gIkR^itatvAt.h | vaiparItyAchcha | vAkyaprAmANye hi kAraNaM vakturAptatvam.h | vaktArashcha smR^itInAmAptAH | na shruteH | apauruSheyatvenAN^gIkR^itatvAt.h | ata eva samUlatvanirmUlatvAbhyAm.h | smR^itInAmAptimUlatvAt.h | shrutestadabhAvAt.h | nApi kR^ittimatvAkR^itrimatvAbhyAm.h | svarUpato.aprayojakatvAt.h | uktarItyA vaiparItyAchcha | tadidamuktamAptai rudrakapilakamalAsanAdibhiH uktamarthaM shivAdInAM jagatkAraNatvAdikaM, pipIlikAlipinibhA buddhipUrvapraNayahInA, shrutiH, kathaM vArayet.h na kathamapIti | 
nanvaudumbarIM spR^iShTvodgAyedityAdishrutiviruddhAnAmaudumbarI sarvA veShyayitavyetyAdismR^itInAmaprAmANyamupalabdhaM tathA.atra syAt.h | na syAt.h | vaiShamyAt.h | shrutimUlatayA.abhimatA hi tAH smR^itayo.atastAsAM mUlashrutyanumApakatvena prAmANyamiShyam.h | nacha shrutiviruddhAyAH smR^itermUlashrutyanumApakatvaM sambhavatItyaprAmANyameva yuktam.h | yathA.a.aha jaiminiH "virodhe tvanapekShaM syAdasati hyanumAnam.h' iti | nachaivaM prakR^ite | pAshupatAdismR^itInAM shivAdipratyakShamUlatvena shrutimUlatvAbhAvAt.h | tadidamAha- pratyakShato dR^iShTveti || nanu tarhi smR^itInAmuktarItyA sAvakAshatvAnniravakAshashrutivirodhenAprAmANyamastu | maivam.h | vaiparItyAt.h | smR^itayo hi vispaShyavAdinyo na vivakShitArthAtprachyAvanamarhanti | shrutayastvasphuTa(spaShya)vikShiptavAdinyo.avyavasthitAlaukikashAbdalakShaNaviShayA ashakyAdhyayanAnantAparipUrNavAkyarUpA nArthavisheShaniShThA lakShyante | ata eva bhavatAM mImAMsAyAsaH | etadapyuktaM prakarSheNoktamiti | vispaShyamuktamityarthaH | 
pipIlikAlipinibheti cha | asphuTe(spaShye)tyarthaH | 
kiJNcha shrutayastAvadavispaShyArthAH | praNetR^ivyAkhyAnasampradAyavikalA na svatantrAH kamapyarthaM pratipAdayitumIshate | kintu sahajasiddhena yogardhilabdhena vA pratyakSheNAsheShArthadarshinAmAptAnAM vachanamanusR^itya netavyAH | yathoktam.h | itihAsapurANAbhyAM vedaM samupabR^iMhayediti | itihAsapurANagrahaNamupalakShaNam.h | tathAcha kathaM pAshupatAdismR^ityuktArthanivAraNAya samarthAssyuH | tadidamuktaM pipIlikAlipinibhA saMvAdena vinA kamapyarthaM pratipAdayitumasamarthA shrutiryadvachanasaMvAdApekShiNI tairevAptaiH pratyakShato dR^iShTvA proktamarthaM kathaM vArayet.h | svatantra(svAtantya)dashAyAmapratipAdakatvAt.h | pAratantye tu virodhAbhAvAdeva | kintu tadanusAreNaiva netavyeti |
bhavedetadyadi pAshupatAdismR^itipraNetR^INAmAptatvaM syAt.h | tadeva kuta ityata Aha- sarvagA hIti || sarvaM gachChantyavagachChantIti sarvagAH | AptatvopalakShaNametat.h | te rudrAdayaH | hIti tatra pramANaprasiddhiM dyotayati | 
athavA sarvaj~natvamevAtra pramANaprasiddhayA sAdhyate | tata evAnyasya siddheH | 
tathAhi | hariharahiraNyagarbhAstAvatsarvaj~natayA shrutItihAsapurANeShu prasiddhAH | tatra harerevAvatArA buddharShabhakapilAH saugatAdismR^itipraNetAraH | tathAcha teShAM mohAbhAvena rAgadveShayorapyabhAvAt.h vipralipsA cha nivartate | kiJNcha j~nAnechChAprayatnasthAnakaraNapATavAni tAvadupadeshamAtreNa teShAM nishchIyante | kiJNcha j~nAnechChAprayatnasthAnakaraNapATavAni tAvadupadeshamAtreNa teShAM nishchIyante | j~nAnaM tu yathArthamayathArthaM vA syAt.h | ichChA.api pratipipAdayiShA vA vipralipsA veti sandeho.avashiShyate | tatrAbhyAsadashApanno.ayamartho.asyeti sAmAnyato nishchaye bhavatyeva tasya j~nAnasya yathArthatvanishchayaH yathA.abhyAsadashApannamidamaraNyamamIShAM mleJNChAnAmato.asminnete mArgAbhij~nA iti pAnthAnAmeva nishchayaH | vipralipsA cha hetudarshanena vyAptA hetau sati syAt.h | sa cha dvirUpaH | svopakAraH parApakAro vA | na tAvatpAntheShu vimArgeNa pratiShThamAneShu mleJNChAnAM kashchitsvopakAraH | svasya gR^ihItatvAt.h | sharIrasya cha karaNIyAntarabhAvAt.h | bhAve vA parityAgAyogAt.h | nApi dvitIyaH | na hyanunmattA anapakAriNamapakurvate | nApi parApakAramAtraM puruShArthaH | tathA sati sarvaH sarvamapakuryAditi | evaM vipralipsA.api nivAryate | anabhyAsadashApanne tu viShaye pramANAntarasaMvAdAtpravR^ittisAmarthyAdvA mohavipralipsayornivR^ittirityato mleJNChA apyAptA bhavanti | kimuta mahAnubhAvA rudrAdaya iti | 
evaM pUrvapakShasUtrAbhiprAyamabhidhAya siddhAntasUtratAtparyamAha- iti chediti ||
tanneti sheShaH | kut|A nishchite hi pAshupatAdismR^itiprAmANye tadviruddhaM viShNossarvajagatkAraNatvAdikamasatsyAt.h | na chaivam.h | satpratipakShatvAt.h | AstAM tAvachChatiH | paJNcharAtrAdismR^itayo hi viShNoreva sakalajagatkAraNatvAdikamabhidadhAnA dR^ishyante | 
nanu viruddhayoH pramANayoH sAmye sati satpratipakShatA syAt.h | na chaivaM prakR^ite | pAshupatAdismR^itInAmAptapraNItatvAt.h vispaShyavAditvena niravakAshatvAchcha | paJNcharAtrAdismR^itInAM tadabhAvAdityata Aha- yadIti || asheShaj~nA asheShavida ityAptatvopalakShaNam.h | haripUrvakA harimanuprabhR^itayaH paJNcharAtrAdInAmapi tadupeyam.h | nacha visheShaheturastIti bhAvaH | upalakShaNaM chaitat.h | vispaShyavAditvena nira(rAna)vakAshatvaM cha draShyavyam.h | 
kimato yadyevamityata Aha- mAnamiti ||
hishabdo hetau | yasmAdevaM tasmAdubhayatra pUrvapakShasiddhAntayormAnaM smR^itidvayaM samaM bhavet.h | tathA cha pAshupatAdismR^itInAM satpratipakShatvaM sthitamiti sheShaH | 
nanu ye viruddhe pramANe na tayoH sAmyam.h | shuktirajataj~nAnayostadabhAvadarshanAt.h | ye cha same na tayorvirodhaH | paTashuklo dIrghashchetyatra tadabhAvAt.h | tatkathaM pAshupatAdismR^iteH satpratipakShatvasambhavaH | sambhave.api jitaM pareNa | siddhAntanirNayasyAyogAdityata Aha- mAnamiti || ubhayatra dvayossmaraNayormadhye yatsamaM saha mayA mUlapramANena vartate, tadeva mAnamanyadapramANam.h | etaduktaM bhavati | visheShAnirdhAraNAyAmeva satpratipakShatvam.h | vastutastu samUlaM mAnamanyadamAnamiti | nanu samUlatvena prAmANyAvadhAraNe prAmANyasya paratastvApattiH | maivam.h | parasparavirodhenAprAmANyashaN^kAprAptau samUlatvena tadapanayanAt.h | tathobhayatra smaraNe yatpaJNcharAtrAdismaraNaM samaM samUlapramANaM saMvAdipamANAntaropetaM cha, tadeva mAnaM bhavenna tu pAshupatAdikam.h, mUlAdyabhAvAt.h | ato noktadoSha iti yojyam.h | vakShyete hi shrutimUlatvatatsaMvAditve cha paJNcharAtrAdInAm.h | nanu kathaM pAshupatAdismR^itInAM nirmUlatvAt.h | yAvatA pashupatiprabhR^itInAmAptistatra mUlamuditetyata Aha- na cheti ||
tatra shivAdiShu nishchayopAyAbhAvAditi sheShaH | nanUktamatra "sarvagA hi te' iti | maivam.h | "nityaM vR^iddhikShayopetam.h' ityAdinA 
paramapuruShAditareShAM sArvaj~nyAbhAvasyoktatvAt.h | shrutyAdInAM chopacharitatvAt.h | 
nanvasti tAvadviShNoranupacharitasArvaj~nyam.h | shivAdInAmapyupAyopeyaviShayam.h | kiM gaN^gAvAlukAkITasaN^khayAparij~nAnena | satyam.h | na tAvattattvaj~nAnamevAptiH | vipralambhake.ativyAptirityAha- vyabhicharata iti ||
athochyeta sarvaj~nAnAM mohAbhAvAttanmUlayo rAgadveShayorabhAve vipralipsA.api nivartata ityAptinishchaya iti | kiM tatra sarve.api tIrthakarA AptA ityaN^gIkR^ityaivamanumIyate | uta svasvAbhimatamekameva | AdyaM dUShayati- vyabhichArata iti || paJNcharAtrAdismR^itipraNetari nArAyaNe asyAN^gIkArasya bhagnatvAdityarthaH | abhaN^ge vA siddhaM naH samIhitam.h | yadvA vyabhichAro.anyonyavirodhaH | nahi parasparaviruddhavAdinaH sarve.apyAptA ityaN^gIkartumuchitam.h | vastuvikalpaprasaN^gAt.h | dvitIyaM parAchaShye- vyabhichArata iti || yasya tIrthakarasyAptatvaM nAN^gIkriyate | tatraiva sArvaj~nyasya vyabhichArAdityarthaH | nacha tatra sAvarj~nyaM nAN^gIkriyata iti yuktam.h | samAnanyAyatvAt.h | atha hetuM vishiMShyAttadA sandigdhAsiddhayAdikam.h | 
yadapyuktaM j~nAnechChAprayatnasthAnakaraNapATavAni tAvadupadeshamAtreNa nishchIyanta iti | tanna | apaTukaraNAnAmapyupadeshadarshanena vyabhichArAdityAha- vyabhicharata iti || upadeshavisheShaNe chokto doShaH | nishchIyatAM j~nAnam.h, tasya yAthArthyaM tu kutaH | abhyAsadashApanno.ayam.h artho.asyeti sAmAnyanishchaye sati tatsiddhiriti netyAha- vyabhichArata iti || vyabhichAraH viprakarShaH teShAmeva sannidhAnaM durlabhamasmadAdInAM, dUre tadIyAbhyAsAvadhAraNamiti bhAvaH | vineyavachanaparamparayA tadavadhAraNamiti chet.h(na) | tIrthakarAntare vyabhichArAdityAha- vyabhichArata iti || tAsu tAsu smR^itiShvabhiniviShyAH sarve.api hi taM tamAchAryaM tatra tatrArthe.abhyAsavantamevAchakShate | nacha tadIyaM j~nAnaM yathArthamevAN^gIkartuM shakyaM, tvatsiddhAntavirodhitvAt.h | anyathA tvadIyasiddhAntasyAvAstavatvApAtAdityAha- vyabhichArata iti || vyabhichAraH virodhaH | ichChA.api vipralipsA kuto neti vAchyam.h | svopakAraparApakArarUpahetudarshanAbhAvAditi chet.h tatkiM smR^itipraNetArassarve.api na vipralambhakAH | addheti chet.h | asya niyamasya buddhAdiShu bhagnatvAdityAha- vyabhicharata iti || niyame cha svavyAghAtaH | yasya kasyApi vipralambhakatve, hetudarshanAbhAvasya tatraiva vyabhichAraH | nahi tattatpuruShavisheShAnusaMhitAste te prayojanavisheShAH pishitanayanairasmadAdibhiravadhArayituM shakyanta ityAshayenAha- vyabhichArata iti || kenApi pramANena hetUpalambhAbhAvo.avipralambhaheturiti chenna | sandigdhatvAt.h | prayojanAbhAvo.avipralambhahetuH | prayojanAbhAvashcha paravaJNchanasyApuruShArthatvAdatatsAdhanatvAchcha nishchIyata iti chenna | sampratipannavipralambhakeShu vyabhichArAdityAha- vyabhichArata iti || apuruShArthamapi puruShArthatayA vibhramya vaJNchayatyasAviti chet.h | kiM tAvatA | prakR^itastu vivekitayA naivamiti chenna | tIrthakarAntare avidyamAnasya vivekasyAsminnavadhAraNAnupapatteH | 
atha vishvahitopadeshArthaM pravR^ittyA vipralambhAbhAvo.anumIyata iti chenna | buddhAdiShu tatsAmyena vyabhichArAdityAha- vyabhichArata iti || 
atha te na tathA, kintvayogyajanavyAmohanArthamiti chet.h | prakR^ito.api na tatheti kuto nishchitam.h | nishchayopAyasyetaratrApi tulyatvAt.h | 
yadapyuktaM pramANAntarasaMvAdAnmohavipralipsayornivR^ittiriti tadasat.h | pramANAntaraM hi na tAvatpratyakSham.h | atIndriyatvAdvipratipannArthasya | anumAnaM chedvayabhichAro buddhAdiShu | AbhAsameva tat.h madIyaM tvanumAnameveti chenna | yato nivArayiShyAmastava(vachana)chamatkAraM mA tvariShThA ityAshayenAha- vyabhichArata iti || 
athAgamaH sa kiM vedAdiruta tad.hviruddhaM smR^ityantaramathavA svayUthyarachitaM granthAntaram.h | na prathamadvitIyau | virodhitvena saMvAdAsambhavAdityAha- vyabhichArata iti || nApi tR^itIyaH | buddhAdipraNItasmR^itInAmapi svayUthyapuruShAntaravachanasaMvAditvena vyabhichArAdityAha- vyabhichArata iti || te.api sandigdhAptabhAvA iti chenna | prakR^iteShvapi tannishchayopAyAbhAvAt.h | 
yachchoktaM pravR^ittisAmarthyAdvayAmohavipralipsayornirAsa iti | tadayuktam.h | pravR^ittisAmarthyaM hi tato.arthamavabuddhaya pravR^ittasya phalopalambhaH | nacha vipratipannasmR^itiphalaM svargApavargalakShaNaM pratyakSheNekShyate | indriyANAM tAdR^igArthAviShayatvAdityAha- vyabhichArata iti || Abhimukhyena chAro.abhichArastadabhAvo vyabhichAraH | nApyanumAnena | smR^ititvAdervyabhichAritvAt.h | anyasya chAbhAvAdityAha- vyabhichArata iti || athAgamena | so.api na tAvatsampratipanno.asti | nacha vipratipannena | tasya bauddhAdiviShaye.api vidyamAnatvena vyabhichArAdityAha- vyabhichArata iti ||
syAdetat.h | dvividhA khalu shivAdipraNItA smR^itiH | ekA tAvadadR^iShTaM phalamuddishya pravR^ittA | parA tu sampadAdikaM dR^iShTam.h | tatra dR^iShTArthAyAH pravR^ittisAmarthyaM pratyakSheNopalabhyate | tatastatpraNeturAptatvamiti | tanna | tathA.api vipratipannasmR^iterAptimUlatve 
pramANAbhAvAt.h | tata evAsyA api tatsiddhiriti chenna | vyabhichArAt.h | na hyekatrAptena sarvatrApi tathA bhAvyamiti niyamo.asti | tathA cha sati sarvAsAmapi smR^itInAmAptimUlatApAtAt.h | tatrApi dR^iShTArthAnAM pravR^ittisAmarthyopalambhAdityAha- vyabhichArata iti || aN^gIkR^itya chedamuditam.h | dR^iShTArthAnAmapi tAsAM bahulaM (phala)vyabhichAro dR^ishyate | tathAcha kathaM tad.hdR^iShTAntenetarAsAmAptimUlatAnumAnamityAha- vyabhichArata iti ||
kiJNcha phalavyabhichAratastadaMshasyAnAptimUlatvasthitau pashupatipraNItatvAdestatra vyabhichArataH kathamanumAnaM syAdityAha- vyabhichArata iti || 
tadevaM pAshupatAdismR^itInAmAptimUlatvAnishchayena nirmUlAnAM paJNcharAtrAdismR^itivirodhenAprAmANyameva yuktam.h | 
tadanena "itareShAM chAnupalabdheH, etena yogaH pratyuktaH' iti sUtradvayaM vyAkhyAtaM bhavati | 
yachchetareShAM mahadahaN^kArAditattvAnAmanupalabdheshcha sAN^khayasmR^iteraprAmANyamiti vyAkhyAnam.h | tatpratyakShAnupalabdhervedAnteShvapi vyabhichArataH sarvathA.anupalabdherasiddheruktatvAdayuktamiti | 
nanu paJNcharAtrAdismR^itayo.api phalaM vyabhicharanti | kvachittaduktAnuShThAne.api dR^iShTaphalAnupalambhAt.h | atastAsAmaprAmANyAnna tadvirodhena pAshupatAdismR^itInAmaprAmANyam.h | anyathA phalavyabhichArasyAnaikAntikatvamityata Aha- na cheti || 
asyAH paJNcharAtrAdismR^iteH kvachidvayabhichAre.apIti sambandhaH | kuto na hIyata iti chet.h | kimadR^iShTAtharAyAH prAmANyAbhAvo.abhidhIyate, uta dR^iShTArthAyA eva | nAdyaH | yataH phalavyabhichAre hetau kvachid.h dR^iShTArthAyAM vartamAne asyA adR^iShTArthAyAM phalavyabhichAre, tata evAprAmANye satyapyasyA adR^iShTArthAyAstAvavanmAnatA na hIyate | kAraNAbhAvAt.h | tadvirodhAdeva cha pAshupatAdInAmaprAmANyamuktam.h | dR^iShTArthAyA aprAmANyavachanaM tu prakR^itAnupayuktamityabhisandhiH | 
atha dR^iShTAtharAyAH phalavyabhichAreNAprAmANye sati tata evAdR^iShTArthA apyapramANaM bhaviShyatIti chenna | tata iti kiM tena hetunota tena dR^iShTAntena | nAdyaH | kvachidvayabhichAre(NA).aprAmANye.apyasyA mAnatA hIyata iti na yuktam.h, vyAptyabhAvAt.h | na dvitIyaH | kvachidvayabhichAre.aprAmANye(.api) asyA mAnatA hIyata ityetanna yuktam.h | hetvabhAvAt.h | nArAyaNavAkyatvAdervyabhichArAt.h | mA hi bhUtsakalamapi nArAyaNavAkyamapramANam.h | dR^iShTArthAyAM phalavyabhichAre aprAmANye cha satyasyA api mAnatA shaN^kAspadatvena hIyata iti cha na vAchyam.h | atra hetumAha- nirdoSheti ||
nirdoShavAkyaM vedaH tadyuktiH samarthapravR^ittijanakatvaM prAmANyAvadhAraNasya yata iti sheShaH | ayamabhisandhiH | kimidaM dR^iShTArthAyAH paJNcharAtrAdismR^iteH phalavyabhichAreNAprAmANyAnumAnam.h | tata evetarasyA apyaprAmANyashaN^kanaM cha svAtanteNa kriyate kiMvA pratibandIgrahaNam.h | AdyaM tUttarAdhikaraNe nirAkariShyAmaH | na dvitIyaH | pratibandIgrahaNaM hi prameyasAdhye bhavati | na chaivaM prakR^ite | pareNa khalu phalasaMvAdAdinA pAshupatAdismR^iterAptimUlatvaprAmANyayoranumitayorasmAbhistannyAyena phalavisaMvAdaM pradarshya doSho.abhihitaH | yadi nAma paJNcharAtrAdismR^itiprAmANyAvadhAraNaM phalasaMvAdayuktyA.a.ashAsyeta | syAdidaM tadA pratibandIgrahaNam.h | na chAsmAbhiH paJNcharAtrAdiprAmANyAvadhAraNasya tadyuktimUlatopeyate | na chaivaM tatprAmANyAvadhAraNaM nirmUlaM syAditi vAchyam.h | bodhakatvena svataHsiddhatvAt.h | aprAmANyashaN^kAnivR^ittiH kuta iti chedAptimUlatvenetyuktam.h | tadavadhAraNaM nirmUlamiti chenna | shrutisaMvAdanibandhanatvAditi | 
nanu shrutereva vaktR^iguNahInAyA na prAmANyamityato nirdoShavAkyetyuktam.h | bodhakatvenaiva hi prAmANyaM vyavasthApitaM tachcha vAkyatvAchChaterubhayasammatam.h | doShastu tadapavAdakaH | na chApauruSheye sa sambhavatIti niShkampameva shrutiprAmANyamiti vakShyAma ityarthaH | asyAM dashAyAM shrutivirodhenApi pAshupatAdismR^itInAmaprAmANyaM shakyasAdhanam.h | yadapyuktam.h "itihAsapurANAbhyAM vedaM samupabR^iMhayet.h' iti tattathA kintvaviruddhAnAmevopAyatvaM na tu viruddhAnAm.h | nachaivamitaretarAshrayatvam.h | shrutyarthanishchayasya smR^itisaMvAdaikanibandhanatvAbhAvAditi | 
nanu cha paJNcharAtrAdismR^itInAM prAmANyamaN^gIkurvANaiH sarvathA pravR^ittisAmarthyamaN^gIkaraNIyam.h | vyabhichArasya cha kartR^ikaraNAdivaiguNyanibandhanatvamabhyupeyam.h | anyathA phalavyabhichAri cha pramANaM cheti vyAghAtApAtAt.h | tathAcha phalasaMvAdenApi prAmANyAdisAdhanaM sushakameveti kimuchyate, nacha tadyuktimUlateti suhR^idbhAvena pR^ichChantaM pratyAha- vedoktasyeti ||
vaidikagranthopadiShyAnuShThAne vedoktA niShekAdisaMskArA evAdhikAratAmApadyanta iti vedoktasyetyuktam.h | yadvA vedashabdena paJNcharAtrAdayo.api gR^ihyante | adhikArasyetyupalakShaNam.h | sAdhanAnuShThAnasyetyapi draShyavyam.h | durnirUpatvamasmadAdyapratyakShatvam.h | sadeti svabhAvata eva na tu deshAdivyavadhAnenetyarthaH | niyamo vyabhichAro vA phalasyeti sheShaH | hishabdo yasmAdityarthe | 
tasmAtphalasaMvAdena prAmANyAdi nAnumIyata iti sheShaH | 
etaduktaM bhavati | pramitaM khalu liN^gamanumiteH karaNam.h | na sattAmAtreNa | atiprasaN^gAt.h | atra (cha) evaM prayoktavyam.h | paJNcharAtrAdikaM pramANam.h | samarthapravR^ittijanakatvAtsampratipannavaditi | tasya chAyamarthaH | etadvihitasAdhanAnuShThAnavadbhistatphalasya niyamena prApteriti | nachaitalliN^gaM shakyAvadhAraNam.h | vyabhichArasya bahulamupalambhena niyamasya pratyetumashakyatvAt.h | tadavadhAraNe cha kAkatAlIyatAyAH shaN^kanAt.h | tatraitAvadvaktavyam.h | kAryaM kAraNasAmagrIsampAdyaM natu tadekadeshena | tathAtve.atiprasakteH | prakR^ite chobhayakulashuddhivaidikaniShekAdisaMskArAdyadhikArapUrvakaM vishuddhAbhisandhyAdimatA samyaganuShThita karma asati pratibandhake, sati cheshvarechChAdau hi sahakAriNi, sampadAdiphalajananAyAlam.h | tathA cha yatra phalaM nopalabdhaM tatrAdhikArAdivaiguNyamitaratra tu tatsAdguNyamityato niyamanishchaya iti | na chaitadyuktam.h | paragatayoradhikArAdibhAvAbhAvayorasmadAdibhiravagantumashakyatvAt.h | nahi khalu parakIyapitR^ipitAmahAdInAM mAnasAdivishuddhirdhA, niShekAdisamIchInatA vA, mantrANAmayAtayAmatvAdikaM vA dravyAdInAM shuchitvAdikaM vA, arvAchInairavagantuM shakyate | tathAchAsya phalaniyama eva vyabhichArastu vaiguNyanimitta iti vA.astu | vyabhichAra evAsya | kvachitphalopalambhastu kAkatAlIyo.anyanimitta eveti vA bhavatviti sandeho na nivartate | nacha sandigdhena prAmANyAnumAnaM yujyate | prAmANyasiddhayuttarakAlaM tu vyabhichArasya vaiguNyanimittatAkalpanAyAmitaretarAshrayatvaM syAt.h | vedasaMvAdena tu prAmANye.avadhArite shakyate phalavyabhichArasyAnyA gatiH kalpayitum.h | ato vedasaMvAdenaiva prAmANyaM paJNcharAtrAdInAmavadhAryate na pravR^ittisAmarthyeneti | 
evaM nyAyasAmyAbhAvena pratibandI mochitA | yadapi pratibandImAdadAnasya vivakShitam.h | yathA cha paJNcharAtrAdiprAmANyamabhilaShatA phalavyabhichArasyAdhikArAdivaikalyanibandhanatA kalpyA tathA.ahamapi pAshupatAdismR^itiShu kalpayiShyAmIti, tadayuktaM vaiShamyAdityAha- adhikAro hIti ||
adhikAragrahaNaM sAdhanasyApyupalakShaNam.h | anyAgameShu pAshupatAdiShu kathito.adhikAro.alaM sulabho.anAyAsasAdhyaH | kutaH | yasmAdanyAgameShu tathA kathitaH | tathAcha tadvaikalyakalpanamasambhAvanApratihatam.h | vedoktastvadhikAro vishuddhasantAnajatvAdiH sarvamAnuShairdurlabha iti prasiddhameva | atastadvaikalyakalpanaM sambhAvitameveti |
nanu kathamanyAgameShvadhikAraH sAdhanaM cha sulabhamuktamityato leshena dasharyati- anyAgameShviti ||
yadbhAvAH tareNa mahatA tapasA vinA vA(na).alabhyaM tadapItyarthaH | yatitvAdikamapIti vA | chaNDAlajanmanAmapi kimu kShatriyAdInAmiti vA | viprA eva ye kamarNA chaNDAlAsteShAM kathaJNchitpratyApattirvaidikairapyaN^gIkriyata ityatashchaNDAlajanmanAmityuktam.h | chaNDAleShu janma yeShAmiti vA | chaNDAlasambandhitvAchchaNDAlaM janma yeShAmiti vA tathoktAH | kramasho maNDalAntaHpraveshenetyanenedamuchyate | yo yAvajjAtivyavahitastasya tAvanti maNDalAni pUjyAni (kalpyAni) | tatra yadyanmaNDalaM pravishati tattajjAtIyo bhavati | charamamaNDalapraveshe tu vipraH sampadyata ityanyAgameShu pratipAdyata iti sambandhaH | tathA choktam.h "dIkShApraveshamAtreNa brAhmaNo bhavati kShaNAt.h | kApAlaM vratamAsthAya yatirbhavati mAnavaH' iti | etadadhikArasaulabhyamudAharaNam.h | evaM sAdhanasaulabhyamapi draShyavyam.h | yathA.a.ahuH kApAlikAH | "mudrikAShaT.hkatattvaj~naH paramudrAvishAradaH | bhagAsanasthamAtmAnaM dhyAtvA nirvANamR^ichChati | karNikA ruchakaM chaiva kuNDalaM cha shikhAmaNiH | bhasma yaj~nopavItaM cha mudrAShaT.hkaM prachakShate | Abhirmudritadehastu na bhUya iha jAyate (kAyabhAk.h)' ityAdi | tathA kAlAmukhA api | rudrAkShakaN^kaNaM haste jaTA chaikA cha mastake | kapAlaM bhasmanA snAnaM lakuTaM (cha kalA) kalashArchanam.h' ityAdi | 
nanu yathA.adhikArasAdhanayoH saulabhyamuktamevaM taddaurlabhyamapi tatraivoktamiti chettarhi na kevalaM phalasaMvAdena pAshupatAdInAmaprAmANyam.h | kinnAma parasparavisaMvAdenApItyAha- adhikAramiti ||
yasmAtkvachidadhikAraM durApAdyamuktvA punarapi sulabhaM bravIti, yasmAchcha tatphalAptaye sampadAdiphalAptaye, sAdhanamashakyamuktvA sushakaM chochyate | yasmAchcha taduktaM sAdhanaM phale.api viShaye vyabhichAri atastaduktaM sA pAshupatAdyuktiH kathaM pramANatAM gachChenna kathamapItyarthaH | durlabhatvoktyanurodhena saulabhyavachanaM prarochanArthaM vyAkhyAyatAm.h | tathAcha phalavisaMvAdo.apyadhikArAdivaiguNyanimitto bhaviShyati yathA paJNcharAtrAdAviti chenna | vaiShamyAt.h | yuktaM hi paJNcharAtrAdiShu tathA kalpanam.h | shrutimUlatvena prAmANyasya nishchitatayA kalpakasya vidyamAnatvAt.h | pAshupatAdau tu tadabhAvena visaMvAdasyAprAmANyanibandhanatopapattau kalpakAbhAvAt.h | kvachitsaMvAdastu kAkatAlIyo vA guDajihvikAnimitto vA bhaviShyati | tadidamuktaM tushabdena | taduktaM tviti sambandhaH | tadevaM pAshupatAdInAmapasmR^ititvAnna tadvirodhenoktArthAsambhavaH shaN^kanIya iti 
sthitam.h | 
|| iti shrImannyAyasudhAyAM smR^ityadhikaraNam.h || 
|| atha shrImannyAyasudhAyAM navilakShaNatvAdhikaraNam.h ||
|| OM na vilakShaNatvAdasya tathAtvaM cha shabdAt.h OM || parihR^itaH smR^itivirodhaH | samprati yuktivirodhaH parihriyate | tathAhi | shrutyAdisamanvayena khalu jagajjanmAdikAraNatvaM brahmaNo nirUpitam.h | tatra shrutereva prAmANyaM tAvaddurlabham.h | yaddhi phalavyabhichAri tadapramANaM dR^iShTam.h | yathA vipralambhakavAkyam.h | phalavyabhichAriNI cha shrutiH | putrakAmeShyayAdyanuShThAne.api kadAchitputrajanmAdyanupalabdheH | anyathA phalAnupalabdhyoktaM pAshupatAdyaprAmANyamapi na syAt.h | ekadeshe chAprAmANye tannyAyenaikadeshAntarasyApyaprAmANyAnumAnaM sulabhameva | kiJNcha yadabuddhipUrvakaM tadapramANaM yathA pipIlikAlipiH | abuddhipUrvakashcha vedo.apauruSheyatvAN^gIkArAt.h | pauruSheyatve cha mUlapramANashUnyatvAdapramANameva, vipralambhakavAkyavat.h | api chAptApraNItavAkyatvAdunmattavAkyavadaprAmANyaM vedasyAnumeyam.h | yadA vedasya I(etA)dR^ishI dashA tadA kA vAtasmR^itItihAsapurANAnAM phalavyabhichArAdi(doSha)kharkharANAM prAmANyasya | tathAcha vedAdisamanvayena na jagajjanmAdikAraNatvaM brahmaNaH siddhayatItyevaM prApte tatpratividhAnAtharsya na vilakShaNatvAditi sUtrasya tAtparyamAha- nityatvAditi ||
vedavAkyamiti sheShaH | ayamarthaH | bodhakatvena khalu karaNAnAM prAmANyaM doShAttu, kadAchidapanIyate | vedavAkyaM cha bodhakatvena vAdiprativAdisammatam.h | anyathA phalavyabhichAro.api tatra(sya) na syAt.h | vAkye cha prAmANyasyApavAdakA doShA abodhakatvaviparItabodhakatvAdayaHsarve.api vaktR^idoShanibandhanA eva | anvayavyatirekAbhyAM tadavagamAt.h | vedavAkyaM cha nityatvAdapauruSheyatvAtpuruShadoShanibandhanaiH sarvadoShairvarjitaM svata eva prAmANyamApnoti | prAmANye cha nishchite sati phalavyabhichArasya sAmagrIvaikalyaM vA pratibandhakasadbhAvo vA kAraNaM kalpayiShyate | anyathA siddhAnanyathAsiddhayorananyathAsiddhasya balavattvAditi |
atraite prayogA bhavanti | vedaH pramANaM bodhakatve sati viparItabodhakatvAtsampratipannavat.h | vimato viparItabodhako na bhavati anAptApraNItavAkyatvAtsampratipannavAkyavat.h | vimato anAptapraNIto na bhavati apauruSheyatvAdvayomavat.h | vimataH phalavyabhichAro vaikalyAdinibandhano bhava(vitumarha)ti pramANasiddhaphalavyabhichAratvAt.h charakAdyuktaphalavyabhichAravaditi |
syAdetat.h | nityatvameva vedasya kutaH | prAguktasAmAnyasiddhiparisheShAbhyAmiti brUmaH | 
ye tu svayUthyA vedaprAmANyamaN^gIkR^ityApi tannityatAM nAnumanyante tAnprati sUtrasUchitAbhiH shrutibhistAmupapAdayati- virUpeti ||
anena "tasmai nUnamabhidyave vAchA virUpa nityayA | vR^iShNe chodasva suShyutim.h' iti shrutimupAdatte | 
atra vAcho nityatvamuchyate | na vedasya | tadapi bahukAlInatvaM bhaviShyatItyato "nityayA.anityayA staumi brahma tatparamaM padam.h' iti "shrutirvAva nityA.anityA vAva smR^itayo yAshchanyA vAchaH' iti shrutimupAdatte- nityayeti ||   Vyasa-(9) 
vyAkhyAnAntaranirAsAya nityayetyetatsadA vidyamAnayeti vyAkhyAtam.h | vAkyasheShe hi bahukAlInA api smR^itIranityapakShe nikShipya shrutimeva nityAmAha | pauruSheyatAmapi shrutayo.abhidadhatIti chenna | Aptoktatvasya duravadhAraNatAyAH prAguktatvena pauruSheyatve prAmANyAvadhAraNAnupapattiprasaN^gena durbalatvAt.h | prAmANyasya svatastvenApauruSheyatve.api kAraNAbhAvAtprAmANyaM na syAditi prasaN^gasyAbhAsatvAt.h | prabalashrutyanusAreNa tattatpuruShapravartitatvameva tAsAmartho.avagantavyaH | tathAcha "R^ichaH sAmAni jaj~nire' "R^igveda evAgnerajayata' ityAdyupapannaM bhavati | na hyekaM vAkyamanekakartR^ikamapi sambhavati | sambhavati tvanekapravartitamiti | 
yadapi pipIlikAlipivadabuddhipUrvakatvAdaprAmANyaM shruteriti, tannirAkaroti- pipIliketi ||
cho yasmAdityarthe | bodhakatvasamuchchaye vA | tasmAt.h dR^iShTAntasya sAdhyavikalatvAdasadanumAnamiti sheShaH | na kevalaM shrutiH kintu pipIlikAlipirapItyaperarthaH | 
aprAmANyaM khalu pipIlikAliperabodhakatvena vA syAdviparItabodhakatvena vA | nAdyaH | anubhavaviruddhatvAt.h | anyathA puruShaliperapyabodhakatvaM syAt.h | tathAcha tadvaiyarthyamApadyeta | api chaivaM satyAkAshAdikamevodAhriyeta tatkiM pipIlikAlipigaveShaNayA | na dvitIyaH | taddhi balavatpramANavirodhataH kalpanIyamanyathA.atiprasaN^gAt.h | nacha pipIlikAlipibodhite.arthe pramANavirodho.asti | ataH kathamasAvapramANaM syAt.h H 
syAdetat.h | lipistAvanna pramANaM pR^ithak.h | anupramANatritvAbhyupagamAt.h | nacha pratyakShAgamayorantarbhavati | atallakShaNatvAt.h | 
ato.anumAnameveti vAchyam.h | tachcha lekhakabuddhisthashabdaviShayaM vA tadavabuddhArthaviShayaM vA syAt.h | na chaitatpipIlikAlipau sambhavati | pramANabAdhitatvAttatkathamasau pramANamiti | maivam.h | tathA satyeDamUkaliperapyaprAmANyaprasaN^gAt.h | bhavatu sA.apramANamitarA tvanumAnamiti chenna | eDamUkaliperapi sAMvyAvahArikatvadarshanAt.h | kiJNchetaratrApyanumAne kimeDamUkavyAvR^ittyarthaM kimapi visheShaNamupAdeyamuta neti vAchyam.h | nAdyaH | sandigdhAsiddhiprasaN^gAt.h | nirNItalekhakaiva lipiranumAnamiti chenna | anirNItalekhakAyA api sAMvyAvahArikatvAt.h | na dvitIyaH | eDamUkalipAvanaikAntyAt.h | atha mUlalekhakabuddhisthashabdArthAnumAne na ko.api doSha iti matam.h | tadapi na | pipIlikAlipAvanaikAntyAt.h | tadvayAvartane cha sandigdhAsiddheH | nahi pipIlikAlipeH puruShaliperasti kashchidvisheSho yena neyaM pipIlikAlipiriti nishchinuyAt.h | tasmAtpuruShalipirapi padamiva padArthasya varNAnAM smaraNahetureShyavyA | tatsamaM pipIlikAlipAvapi | smR^iteshcha pramitatvaM vakShyAmaH | 
nanu pramAtve.api smR^iterna taddhetumAtrasya prAmANyam.h | pramAtrAdInAmapi tatprasaN^gAt.h | kintu sAdhakatamasyaiva | tachcha mana eveti siddhAntaH | lipidarshanAdikaM tu saMskAro dvedhAbhidhasahakArisampAdanenaiva charitArthamiti kathaM tasya prAmANyam.h | maivam.h | arthasannikarShalakShaNAvAntaravyApArasahitaM hIndriyaM pratyakShaM nendriyamAtram.h | manasashcha smaraNodaye saMskArodbodha evArthasannikarShaH | tathAcha chakShuSha ivArthopasarpaNatatsaMyogasahitasya prAmANyamevaM lipidarshanatadudbuddhasaMskArasahitasyaiva manasa iti kathaM na lipeH prAmANyam.h | kevalAyAstu nAstIti chet.h | shruterapi tannAN^gIkriyata eveti |
nanvatra pramANashabdo bhAvasAdhano vA syAtkAraNasAdhano vA | Adye pipIlikAlipiH pramANamiti sAmAnAdhikaraNyaM na syAt.h | dvitIye tu pramANIti bhavitavyam.h | kathaM vedAH pramANaM smR^itiH pramANamiti | pramANamiti sAmAnyenoddishya vedAditvavidhAnAt.h | anyathA tatrApi daurghaTyameveti | maivam.h | bhAvasAdhanatvAbhyupagamAt.h | sAmAnAdhikaraNyaM tu bhAktamiti | 
nanu cha shruteH samyaganubhavasAdhanatvena prAmANyamiShyaM natu smArakatvena | tathAcha na shrutiH samyaganubhavasAdhanabuddhipUrvakatvAtpipIlikAlipivadityanumAsyata ityata Aha- yatheti ||
yathA.abuddhipUrvakamapyekenolUkena kR^itamanekakAkanAshanamashvatthAmno.ahameka evAnekAnvadhiShyAmItyasyArthasya bodhakaM samyaganubhavaM prati sAdhanaM jAtam.h | tathA shrutirabuddhipUrvA.api samyaganubhavasAdhanam.h | etaduktaM bhavati | abuddhipUrvakatvaM kimanAditvaM vivakShitam.h, sAditve.api buddhijanyatvAbhAvo vA pratipAdyAtharbuddhipUrvakatvAbhAvo vA.anenaitadevaM pratipAdayiShyAmItyabhisandhipUrvakatAvaidhuryaM vA | nAdyaH | pipIlikAlipAvabhAvAt.h | gaganameva dR^iShTAnto bhaviShyatIti chet.h | tathA.api shruteranAditvasya pareNAnaN^gIkR^itatvenAsiddheH | na dvitIyaH | utpadyamAnaM buddhijanyameveti mayA.aN^gIkR^itatvAt.h | na tR^itIyachatutharau | ulUkakR^itavyApAre vyabhichArAditi | yadyapi pratyakShe vyabhichAro.atra vaktuM shakyate | tathA.api j~nAtakAraNasajatIyatvena shakyaparihAro.asAviti noditaH | anumAnamAtre suvacho.api chetanavyApAraviShayasya tathAbhUta eva shAkune pradarshayitumuchita iti na pradarshitaH | nanu shAkunamarthavisaMvAdyapi dR^ishyate | satyam.h | yattu pramANAviruddhaM tadvayabhichArasthalaM bhaviShyatIti bhAvenoktam.h- aviruddhamiti || shAkunamAtre vyabhichArasya darshayituM shakyatve.apyAgamikatvena visaMvAdAnarhatayedamudAhR^itam.h | 
nanvAseti katham.h | asterbhUrityasya nityatvAt.h | vibhaktipratirUpakaM chAvyayaM bhavatIti vachanAdavyayametaditi na doShaH | vibhaktipratirUpakamityuchyate | nachaivaM vibhaktirasti | na nAsti | AmantAnuprayogasya vidyamAnatvAt.h | 
nanvevaM tarhi prayujyate | shrutirna samyaganubhavasAdhanaM shabdatve satyabuddhipUrvakatvAditi | yadvA shrutirnAgamo.abuddhipUrvakatvAditi | abuddhipUrvakatvaM cha vivakShitArthatattvaj~nAnapUrvakatvAbhAvaH | Adya(syApi)sya pipIlikAlipAvapraveshe.apyunmattavAkyaM dR^iShTAnto bhaviShyati | na chonmattavAkyamapi pramANaM pramANaviruddhatvAdityata Aha- viruddhaM tviti ||
pramANaviruddhaM yadunmattavAkyaM tat.h pramANavirodhAdeva bAdhitamayathArthamiti yAvat.h | na tUktahetubhyAmiti | sopAdhikatAmanenAchaShye | ata evAptApraNItavAkyatvaheturapyapAstaH | ayamabhisandhiH | na tAvatsamyaganubhavasAdhanatvAbhAvo j~nAnasAdhanatvAbhAvena | j~nAnasAdhanatvasyobhayasiddhatvAt.h | nApi smR^itisAdhanatvena | ananubhUtaviShayatvasammateH | tato viparItabodhakatvenaiveti vAchyam.h | evaM dvitIyaprayoge.api na tAvadanAgamatvamashabdatvena | shabdatvasyobhayasammatatvAt.h | tasmAdayathAthartveneti vaktavyam.h | evaM tR^itIyaprayoge.api sAdhyaniShkaSharH kartavyaH | tathAcha tatra pramANabAdhitatvamupAdhiH | yadvA.anubhavasAdhanatvAvachChinne prathamasAdhye, vAkyatvAvachChinne dvitIyasAdhye bodhakatvAvachChinne tR^itIye chAyamupAdhiriti |
nanvasyopAdheryadayathArthaM tatpramANaviruddhamiti sAdhyavyApakatve.api sAdhanAvyApakatvaM kathamityata Aha- virodheti ||
pakShIkR^itAyAM shrutAvuktasAdhanasadbhAve.api pramANavirodhasyAdasharnAt.h | sAdhanAvyApakatvamiti sheShaH | atra virodhAbhAvAditi vaktavye.adarshanAdityuktaM virodhAbhAvasAdhanArthamiti draShyavyam.h | 
kimato yadyevaM pramANaviruddhatvamupAdhiriti chet.h | upAdheH pratipakShonnAyakatvasya vakShyamANatvenAnumAnAnAM satpratipakShatvamityAshayenAha- tasmAditi ||
yasmAtpramANaviruddhatvamayathArthatvasya vyApakaM vyAvR^itaM cha pakShIkR^itAdvedAt.h | vyApakanivR^ittau vyApyanivR^ittiravashyambhAvinI | tasmAdvedaprAmANyameShyavyam.h | ayamatra prayogaH | vedo nAyathArthaH pramANAviruddhatvAtpratyakShavat.h | yadvA vedo yathArtho bodhakatve sati pramANAviruddhatvAtpratyakShavat.h | evaM vedaH samyaganubhavasAdhanamanubhavasAdhanatve sati pramANaviruddhatvAtpratyakShavat.h | veda Agamo vAkyatve sati pramANAviruddhatvAtsampratipannavaditi | evaM vAkyatvAvachChinne sAdhye.anAptapraNItatvamupAdhistadviparyayeNa cha pratipakSho.abhidheya iti | 
astvevaM vedaprAmANyam.h | paJNcharAtrAdismR^itInAM tu katham.h | nahi tA apyapauruSheyAH | yena prAmANyamavadhArya phalavyabhichAramanyathA neShyAma ityata Aha- tanmUlatvAditi || 
prAmANyamiShyata iti sambandhaH | yadyapi bhagavadrachitAnAM vedA(da)rthamupalabhya rachitatvaM vedamUlatvaM nAsti | tasya svataH sarvaj~natvam.h | tathA.api tamanusR^itya rachitatvaM tanmUlatvamiha vivakShitamiti noktadoShaH | ayamatra prayogaH | paJNcharAtrAdismR^itiH pramANaM pramANamUlatvAtpramANasaMvAditvAtsampratipannavaditi | yadvA vimataM pramANaM vedasaMvAditvAtparAbhyupagatArhiMsAdivAkyavat.h | AptavAkyatvamupAdhiriti chet.h (na) | pratyakShAdau sAdhyAvyApanAt.h | vAkyatvAvachChinnasAdhyavyApakatvAdadoSha iti chenna | tathA.api vedetaravAkyatvAvachChinnasAdhanenopAdheH pakShe sAdhanasaulabhyAt.h | sati chaivaM smR^itInAM prAmANye tadbalena phalavyabhichAro.apyanyathayitavya iti |
nanu choktArthaviruddhavAdInyapi smR^itItihAsapurANAnyupalabhyante | teShAM prAmANyasAdhane cha bahuviplavaH syAdityata Aha- virodha iti ||
pUrveNaivAnvayaH | yAsAM smR^itInAM sarvathA pramANavirodho nAsti tAsAmeva pakShIkaraNAnna kashchiddoSha ityAshayaH | nanvevaM sati vedamUlatvopanyAso vyarthaH | j~nAnajanakAnAmavashyAN^gIkaraNIyena virodhAbhAvenaiva prAmANyasiddheriti chenna | phalavyabhichAralakShaNavirodhadarshanenAsiddhiprasaN^gAt.h | prAmANyena tadapanayane chetaretarAshrayatvApAtAt.h | vedamUlatvena tu prAmANye siddhe na ko.api doSha iti |
aprAmANyaprayojakasya pramANavirodhasyAbhAvAnna shrutismR^ityoraprAmANyamityuktam.h | tadayuktam.h | shrutyAdyukta(sya) IshvarasArvaj~nAderIshvaro na sarvaj~naH puruShatvAt.h | yaj~nadattavat.h | ityAdyanumAnaviruddhatvAdityata Aha- virodho.apIti || 
prakR^itasambandhArtho.apishabdaH | yachChabdo.adhyAhAryaH | virodhAdeva bAdhitamityaprAmANyaprayojakatayokto virodho.api sa eva yaH pratyakSheNAgamena vA syAt.h | na punaranumAnena | ayamabhisandhiH | aprAmANyaprayojakatayA yadasmAbhirabhihitaM tatpakShe.apyupapAdayituM khalu parasyAyaM prayatnaH | asmAbhishcha pratyakShAgamavirodha eva tathA.abhipreto nAnumAnavirodhaH | tathAcha pakShe tad.hvyutpAdanaM prakR^itAsaN^gatameva | svatantrAnumAnavirodhaM tUttaratra nirAkariShyati sUtrakR^iditi |
nanu pramANavirodha evAprAmANye prayojako.astu kiM pratyakSheNAgamena veti visheShaNena | tathA choktanumAnavirIdhAdvedAderaprAmANyamiti | maivam.h | vakShyAmo hyatra brahmAdivastuShu pramANaM veda evaika iti vaidike.arthe.anumAnasyAnavakAsham.h | yatra cha yasyApravesho na tasya tadbAdhakam.h | nahi nayanaM sparshApabAdhanasyeShye | tathAcha kathamanumAnaM vedA(dya)rthabAdhakena tadaprAmANye prayojakaM syAt.h | prakR^itaM cha vedAdikameveti |
nanvevaM (sati) tarhi vedArthamImAMsA nArambhaNIyA syAt.h mImAMsAyA yuktyanusandhAnAtmakatavAdityata Aha- Agameneti ||
evashabdo virodha ityataH paro draShyavyaH | nirNayArthamiti sheShaH | etaduktaM bhavati | anumAnaM hi dharmyAdipramitimapekShate | nacha dharmyAdirUpaM brahmAdikaM vedAdR^ite siddhayatIti tadanapekShAyAmAshrayAsiddhayAdikam.h, apekShAyAM tu virodhino dharmyAdigrAhakavirodha ityevaM vaidike.arthe.anumAnasyAnavakAsho.abhidhistitaH | mImAMsAyAM tu kvachidAgamasyAgamAntareNa virodha evArthanirNayArthaM yuktirupAdIyate | sA khalvanyatarAgama(prAmANya)mupodbalayantya(ntyA)nyatarAgamabAdhayA.arthanirNayAya prabhavati | anyatarAgamasiddhadharmyAdyAshrayaNenA(yeNa)shrayAsiddhayAdyanavakAshAt.h | anyatarAgamasya dharmyAdigrAhakatvAbhAvenAprabalasya, 
AgamasUchitayopapattestato durbalasya, akiJNchitkaratvAt.h | tadevamevaMvidhopapatterAgamike.apyarthe sAvakAshatvAdupapannA mImAMseti |
api cha pratyakShAgamavirodho.api na svarUpeNAprAmANyaM prayojayati | kintu tayorupajIvyatvAdinA prAbalye satyeva durbalayoH svayaM bAdhitatvena samabalayoH pratibandhamAtrahetutvenAprAmANyanishchayAnupapatteH | upajIvyAdivirodhena chAprAmANyaM bhavadvedasya na sarvathA.ayathArthatvalakShaNam.h | kinnAma pratItArthaprachyAvanamAtram.h | apauruSheyatayA nirdoShasya sarvathA.aprAmANyAnupapatteH | tathAchAnyArthakalpanA.avashyaM kAryetyAshayavAnAha- upajIvyeti | 
upalakShaNametat.h | niravakAshatvAdikamapi grAhyam.h | 
bhavatvevaM tataH kim.h | vedopajIvyatvAdikaM cha pratyakShAgamayoreva prAyeNa sambhavati | yuktestu kvachideva | puruShatvAdiyuktestu nAstyeva | atashcha na tadvirodhena vedasyAprAmANyaM mantavyamityAshayenAha- pratyakShamiti || 
vedasyetyanuvartate | syAdityataH paramitishabdo.adhyAhAryaH tattvamasItyAdivedasya pratyakShamupajIvyam.h | yuktirapi kvachidvedasyopajIvyeti sambandhaH | yathA "prANA vA aNavaH' ityAdeH | AgamaikapramANakeShu viShNvAdiviShayeShu pravartamAnaM "janito.ata viShNoH' ityAdivedaM prati niraniShyo niravadya ityAdestasya vedo(dasyo)pajIvyatetyarthaH | evaM niravakAshatvAdikamapi pratyakShAgamayoreva prAyeNa sambhavati yuktestu kvachideva | tachcha na prakR^itayukterityapi draShyavyam.h | AgamayoH parasparavirodhe satyanyatarAgamAshrayeNa yukteranupraveshopapatteryuktA mImAMsetyuktam.h | tadanupapannam.h | asArvatrikatvAt.h | nahi sarvatrAgamayoH parasparavirodha eva mImAMsA.avatAryata ityata Aha- yukta iti ||
tatra tarhyayamabhisandhiH | satyametatkvachidevAyaM nyAya iti | tathA.api yatra naivaM tatraikasyaivAgamasyAnekArthapratItau yuktyanusAriNamarthamupAdAya tadanuguNatadviruddhArthaparityAgaH kriyata iti noktaniyamabhaN^gaH | kevalayuktervaidike.arthe.anupraveshasyAnaN^gIkR^itatvAt.h | nApi mImAMsA.anupapattiH | anyataravaidikArthAnusAriNyA yukteraN^gIkR^itatvAditi |
prAk.h puruShatvAdiyuktivirodhenAgamasyAprAmANyaM na vAchyamityuktam.h | idAnIM tu yuktirevAsau pratyakShAgamavirodhenApramANam.h | tasyAstadujIvitvena tato durbalatvAdityAshayavAnAha- yuktishcheti ||
yadvA yatsiddhavatkR^itya tatra mImAMsArambhAnupapattiH parihR^itA tadidAnIM darshayitumAha- yuktishcheti ||
chashabdaH prakR^itAnusandhAnArthaH | kathaM traividhyamityata Aha- vyAptiriti ||
yasyA yukteH sAdhyena vyAptiH pratyakShagA pratyakShAvagatA saikA | yuktigA yuktyavagatA yasyA vyAptiH sA dvitIyA | tathA.a.agamagA AgamAvagatA yasyA vyAptiH sA tR^itIyeti | evaM trividheti yojyam.h | 
upalakShaNaM chaitat.h | dha(rmA)rmyAdigrAhakabhedenApi traividhyaM draShyavyam.h | etachcha spaShyayiShyAmaH | 
evaM tarhi yA yuktimUlA yuktiH sA nAgamAdyupajIvinIti tasya bAdhikA | tadabAdhyA cha bhavatvityata Aha- pratyakSheti ||
tatra tAsu trividhAsu yuktiShu | pratyakShAgamUleti | pratyakShamUlA.a.agamamUlA chetyarthaH | yuktimUlA.api hi yuktirantataH pratyakShAgamamUlaiva(dra)eShyavyA | anyathA tanmUlayuktenirrmUlatvamanavasthA vA.a.apadyeta | tathAcha pratyakShAdyapekShatvena sAmye.api bahusaMvidhAnAnapekShayoH pratyakShAgamamUlayoryuktyoH prabalatvaM tadapekShAyAstu yuktimUlAyA durbalatvaM yuktameva | tathAcha prabalayo(ryuktyo)ryadedR^ishI dashA tadA kA (vArtA) durbalAyA yukterAgamabAdhanAdAviti |
tadevamaprAmANye pramANavirodhasyaiva prayojakatvAchChatyAdeshcha pratyakShAgamavirodhAbhAvAt.h | anumAnavirodhasyAprayojakatvAnnAprAmANyam.h | kinnAma bodhakatvena svata eva prAmANyamityupapAditam.h | tadetatpramANApramANavivekamaviduShAM duravadhAraNamityuddeshalakShaNavibhAgaparIkShAbhistannirUpaNArthamuttaro granthasandarbhaH | nacha sAMvyAvahArikatvAtpramANAdeH kiM tannirUpaNeneti vAchyam.h | tathA.api svarUpasaN^khayAviShayaphalagocharANAM vAdivivAdAnAM vidyamAnatvena nirUpaNArhatvAt.h | yadyapyeSho.arthastarkashAstrasya viShayo na mImAMsAshAstrasya | tathA.api shiShyahitaiShiNA bhAShyakR^itA prasaN^gAgato nirUpyate | yathA pUvarmImAMsAbhAShyakAreNetyadoShaH | ata eva pramANalakShaNAdau nirUpitasyArthasya punaratra nirUpaNaM na doShAya | ekIkR^itya nirUpaNasyApi shiShyahitArthatvAt.h | 
tatra nirdhArita(nirj~nAta)svarUpasyaiva saN^khayAdijij~nAsA | lakShaNaM cha tannirdhAraNopAyaH | nacha sAmAnyalakShaNena vinA visheShalakShaNA(syA)vasara ityataH pramANasAmAnyalakShaNaM prathamaM tAvadAha- yAthArthyameveti ||
atra kashchidAha | kimarthaM lakShaNamuchyate | kiM sajAtIyavijAtIyavyavachChinnalakShyapratItyartham.h | uta pramANatvAdipratItaye 
tachchihnopadarshanamidam.h | uta pramANAdishabdapravR^ittinimittAvadhAraNArtham.h | anyasmai kasmaichitprayojanAya vA | 
nAdyaH | tasyA eva duravadhAraNatvAt.h | 
tathA hi | kiM sajAtIyeti pramANatvena (sajAtIyatvaM) vivakShitaM rUpAntareNa vA | nAdyaH | svavyavachChedAvadheH sajAtIyAdavyAvR^ittatvena vyavachChedakatvAnupapattyA vyAvR^ittisvIkAreNA(cha)vyApakatvAt.h | nApi dvitIyaH | vijAtIyapadopadAnavaiyarthyAt.h | asti hi prameya(tvAdinA)sarvasAjAtyam.h | atha j~nAnatvena visheSheNa sAjAtyaM vivakShitvedamuchyate | tarhi lakShyasyApi j~nAnatvAdinA sAjAtyAdvayavachChedyakoTipraviShyatayA saN^grAhyAbhAvaprasaN^gaH | lakShyasya yajj~nAnatvAdibhiH sajAtIyaM tadvayavachChedyam.h | nacha lakShyasya lakShyaM sajAtIyam.h | ShaShThayarthasya sambandhasya bhede vyavasthitatvAditi chet.h | evaM tarhi lakShyApekShayA bhinnAdvayavachCheda ityevochyatAM kR^itaM j~nAnatvAdinA sAjAtyena prakR^itAnupayoginA varNitena | yadA cha lakShyAdanyatva pareShAmavagataM tadA parebhyo.anyatvamapi lakShyasyArthAdavagamyata iti siddhamagrato lakShaNaprayojanamiti vaiyarthyameva syAllakShaNAkhyAnasya | 
api cha na tAvadanena lakShaNenAnavagatenaiva vyavachChinnapratItisambhavaH | atiprasaN^gAt.h | nApi j~nAtena | duravadhAraNatvAt.h | na tAvallakShaNaM pratyakSham.h | nirdoShAkShodbhavatvAderapratyakShavisheShaNatvam.h | nApi kAyareNa liN^gena tadanupapattyA vA tadavagamaH | tAbhyAM sAmAnyataH kAraNamAtrAkShepeNa kAraNagatAnugatarUpAsiddhAvekarUpalakShaNAsiddheH | kAryasyaikajAtyAdekajAtIyakAraNasiddhiriti chet.h | tarhi kAryagataikajAtyasya pUrvamavashyaM pratyetavyatvAN^gIkAre(Na) tata eva sajAtIyavijAtIyavyavachChedaprati(doSha)pattirastu | kR^itamanayA pAramparyakusR^iShTayA | 
nanvetAvatA.api na prakR^italakShaNakhaNDanaM (saM)bhavati | avyApterativyAptervA.anudbhAvanAditi chet.h | maivam.h | prathamabhAvitayA.avashyAbhyupeyatayA laghorupAyAtsAdhyasiddhau sambhavatyAM charamabhAvitayA avashyAnuShTheyatvAbhAvena gurAvupAye pravartamAnasya tavaivedaM (dUSharo)doShodbhAvanam.h | pradIpe pradIpaM prajvAlya tamonirAsAya yatamAnasyaiva puMsaH | nahi tatra kashchiddIpadoShaH | kintu tathAkArI puruSha eva paryanuyojyaH | sarvasAdhanasAdhAraNo vA.ayaM doShaH | yatsambhavadevaMvidhalaghUpAyatvaM nAma svarUpAsiddhiriva sarvapramANAnAm.h | tasmAnmA nAma bhUdativyAptyAdidoShaH | sAmAnyadoShAdeva duShyaM lakShaNamiti |
etena dvitIyo.api nirastaH | pramANatvAdyavagamamantareNa tadavagamAnupapattestadavagamAyAsya pratItAvanyonyAshrayaprasaN^gaH | astu vA.anyadapi lakShaNe kiJNchilliN^gam.h | tathA.api tadeva lakShyAvinAbhUtatayA lakShaNamupanyasyatAM sannihitapratipattikatvAt.h | na tadavashyaM vyApakaM vaktavyam.h | liN^gatvasya vyApyatvenaivopapatteriti chenna, yatra liN^gamavyApakatvAnnAsti tatra lakShaNasya pramANAbhAvAtpratyetumashakyatvena kathaM tataH prAmANyAdyavagamaH | yadA cha kvachillakShyajAtIya eva pramANAbhAvAllakShaNama(syA)navadhAraNIyatayA lakShyavyApakatA.anavagame.api lakShaNam.h | tadA kimaparAddhaM liN^gAntareNAvyApakena | atha yatra tallakShaNe liN^gaM nAsti tatra liN^gAntarAtpratyetavyam.h | tathA.api (tAvevA)te evAstAM lakShye liN^gam.h | kiM lakShaNAnumAnapUrvakaM tadanumAnakalpanayA | atha tathA(vidhaM)liN^gadvayaM yattatpratyekamavyApakatayA na lakShaNam.h | tadanumitaM tu tathAtvAllakShaNamiti chenna | lakShyAnumAnasya lakShaNaprayojanasyobhAbhyAmeva siddheH kR^itaM vyApakena tena | 
nApi tR^itIyaH | sa hyevaMrUpaH yadyathArthaM tatpramANamiti vyavahartavyamiti | ayamanupapannaH | sarvatra lakShaNasya j~nAtumashakyatvAt.h | pramANatvAdinA tadavagame tadevAstu vyavahAraniyamanidAnam.h | avyavahitapratipattikatvAdityAveditam.h | 
ata eva na chaturthaH | kalpanAgauravadoShashchAdhikaH | 
(nApi) na paJNchamaH | tAdR^ishasya darshayitumashakyatvAditi | 
atrochyate | astu tAvatsajAtIyavijAtIyavyavachChinnalakShyapratItyarthaM lakShaNamiti pakShaH | sAsnAdimAngauriti viditalakShaNasambandho hi yaM piNDaM sAsnAdimantaM pashyati taM nAyamashvAdirnApi ghaTAdiriti pratipAdyate | 
nanu vyavachChedo.anyonyAbhAvo bheda ityanarthAntaram.h | bhedashcha vastusvarUpameva | tathAcha lakShyasvarUpapratipattireva tatpratipattiriti kR^itaM lakShaNena | atha lakShyapratItinirapekShameva lakShaNena vyavachChedo bodhyata iti matam.h | tanna | nirAshrayasya tasya bodha(darsha)yitumashakyatvAditi | 
satyaM svarUpa(vastu)pratItireva bhedapratItiriti | tathA.api pratiyogivisheShaghaTitatadavagamAya lakShaNasyopayogaH | asaN^kIrNatayA gopiNDaM pashyannapi hi na tAvadayaM nAshvo na ghaTa iti pratyeti yAvallakShaNaM nAvagachChati | sAsnAdimatvaM tadA pratItamiti chenna | sAsnAdimAn.h gaurityevamavagamasya vivakShitatvAt.h | ata eva sajAtIyetyAdivisheShaNopAdAnam.h | 
yadatroktaM kiM sajAtIyetyAdi | tadasat.h | pauruSheyavachasAM puruShavivakShAdhInatvena niyantumashakyatvAt.h | lakShyAtiriktaM hi sajAtIyavijAtIyatayA dvairAshyena vivakShyate | yathA yathArthaj~nAnatatsAdhanasya pramANasya j~nAnaM tatsAdhanaM cha sajAtIyam.h | yanna j~nAnaM nApi tatsAdhanaM tadvijAtIyam.h | yathA cha pratyakShasyAnumAnAdikaM sajAtIyaM, vijAtIyaM tu ghaTAdikam.h | evamanyatrApi vivektavyamiti |
evaM tarhi lakShyApekShayA bhinnAdvayavachCheda ityuktaM syAditi chet.h | ko netyAha | nahi ko.api svasthAtmA svasmAdeva vyavachChedaM lakShaNaprayojanamAchakShati(Shye) | 
yadatroktaM yadA chetyAdi | tasadaN^gatam.h | vastuto yallakShyAdbhinnaM tato vyavachChedAvagamArthatvAllakShaNasya pratipAdakasya yadyapi lakShyAnyatvaj~nAnamalakShye(vashyA)pekShitam.h tathApi pratipAdyasyAtada(tadana)pekShitam.h tathApi pratipAdyastada(tadana)pekShatvAnna doShaH | 
tasyApi padArthaj~nAnapUrvakatvAdvAkyArthaj~nAnasya sajAtIyavijAtIyapadopAttalakShyAnya(tva)j~nAnaM vinA lakShyasya alakShyAnyatvaj~nAnaM lakShaNaprayojanaM na siddhayatIti kashchit.h | tadanupapannam.h | nahi lakShyAnyavyAvR^ittirlakShaNavAkyapratipAdyA | kinnAma tajj~nAnaM lakShaNaprayojanatvenochyate | lakShaNavAkyArtha eva pratipAdyena boddhavyaH | 
yadapyapi chetyAdinA pR^iShyam.h | tatrAvagatameva lakShaNaM vyAvR^ittalakShyaj~nAnamupajanayatIti vadAmaH | nacha tasya duravadhAraNatA | yathAyathaM pratyakShAdinA tadavadhAraNAt.h | yatra liN^gAttadavagamastatra tata eva lakShaNaprayojanasiddhervyarthA parasparAkusR^iShTiriti chenna | prayojanasadbhAve gauravasyApyanAdaraNa(pyAdaraNa)sambhavAt.h | yathendriyavyApArAnvayavyatirekAnuvidhAyitvenAkShodbhavatvamanumAya tena pratyakShaM lakShyate | tatrAnvarthasaMj~nAj~nApanaM prayojanam.h | evamanyatrApi draShyavyam.h | gauravamanuruddhaya prayojanamavadhIryatAmiti chenna | puruShAbhiprAyANAM niyantumashakyatvAt.h | garIyAMshcha pratipattau gauravAtprameyAdhikyalAbhaH | prayojanAbhAve tu paramparAkusR^iShTiriti chenna | prayojanasadbhAve gauravasyApyanAdaraNa(pyAdaraNa)sambhavAt.h | yathendriyavyApArAnvayavyatirekAnuvidhAyitvenAkShodbhavatvamanumAyatena pratyakShaM lakShyate | tatrAnvarthasaMj~nAj~nApanaM prayojanam.h | evamanyatrApi draShyavyam.h | gauravamanuruddhaya prayojanamavadhIryatAmiti chenna | puruShAbhiprAyANAM niyantumashakyatvAt.h | garIyAMshcha pratipattau gauravAtprameyAdhikyalAbhaH | prayojanAbhAve tu paramparAkusR^iShTiranAdaraNIyaiveti tadIyadoShatAvyutpAdanaM nAsmAkamaniShyam.h | etena dvitIyatR^itIyachaturthA api samAhitA veditavyAH | lakShaNAvadhAraNopAyasyoktatvAt.h | gauravasya cha samAhitatvAt.h | 
nanu tathA.api kiM tattvam.h | yathAyathaM chatuShyayamapi | tathAhi | kvachillakShyAtiriktaM lakShaNaM bhavati | yathA gandhavatI pR^ithivIti | kvachillakShyAnatiriktam.h | yathA pR^ithivItvavatI pR^ithivI, yathArthaM pramANamityAdi | tatrAdyaM lakShyasvarUpapratipattikAraNaM bhavat.h tasyAnvayo vyavachChedatachChabdavyavahartavyate cha pratipAdayati | dvitIyantu pravR^ittinimittaM bhavadvayavahAramAtrakAraNaM bhavati | tatra siddhAMshena pakShIkaraNamasiddhAMshena sAdhyatvaM svayamUhanIyam.h | 
athA.api syAt.h | kimavagataM lakShaNaM phalahetuH, kiMvA.anavagatam.h | na tAvachcharamaH | tadabhidhAnavaiyarthyaprasaN^gAt.h | abhidhAnasya j~nAnotpAdano(payogi)pAyatvAt.h | tasya chAnavagatasyaiva phalasAdhanatvAbhyupagamAt.h | Adye kimanyasmAttadavagama uta tvadIyAllakShaNavAkyAt.h | yadyanyasmAt.h | kR^itamamunA lakShaNAbhidhAnaprayAsena | abhidhAnasya j~nAnotpAdAtiriktaprayojanAbhAvAt.h | tasyAnyata eva siddheH | antye kimidaM tvadabhidhAnamAptopadeshatayA lakShaNaM bodhayatyuta liN^gAdibhAvena | na tAvachcharamaH | tvadvachanalakShaNAvinAbhAvAderdarshayitumashakyatvAt.h | nApi prathamaH | paraM prati bhavatyAptatvasiddheH | siddhau hi pratij~nAmAtrAdeva sAdhyasiddherhetva(tvAdya)bhidhAnamanarthakaM syAt.h | 
nanu prativAdinaM prati lakShaNAbhidhAnaM nArthavat.h | tena vAdyAptabhAvAnaN^gIkArAt.h | kintu shiShyArthaM lakShaNamuchyate shAstre | sa hi sarvasya shAstrasya kartAramAptameva manyate | tasmAchChiShyaM pratyAptavachanatayaiva lakShaNavAkyamartaM pratipAdayiShyatIti | maivam.h | yadi na prativAdinaM prati shAstraM kintu shiShyaM prati tadA pratij~nAmAtrAdevAptavachanAchChiShyasyArthanishchayopapatterhetvAdyabhidhAnamanarthakatAmApannaM shAstre | atha bhavatu prativAdinamapi prati (tachChA)shAstravAkyaM yatra hetvAdyupAttam.h, lakShaNavAkyaM tu shiShyameva prati prayojakaM pratipannashAstrakArAptabhAvamiti manyase | tadapyanupapannam.h | shAstrAntarasAdhyatvAdasyArthasya | asti hi samayagrAhakaM shAstraM munibhiH praNItaM nAmaliN^gAnushAsanavyAkaraNAdIti |
atra brUmaH | uktaM hyetadavagatameva lakShaNaM phalaheturiti | tadavagamashcha yathAyathaM pratyakShAdipramANAdityapi | nacha yathArthaM pramANamiti sAsnAdimAngauriti vAkyasya lakShaNaM pratipAdyamabhyupagachChAmaH | yenAnyataH siddhatvAttasyedamanarthakaM syAt.h | kintu 
yo lakShaNamanyato jAnAti, na jAnAti cha vyavahAranidAnatvAdinA, taM prati tadavabodhAyedaM vAkyam.h | tathAhi | ayaM gaurityAdyupadeshAdinaikasyAM vyaktau goshabdArthatayA.avagatAyAM kimiyameva vyaktiH (evam.h) utAnyA.apIti jij~nAsamAnaM pratyanyatrApi goshabdArthatAM vijij~nApayipuruShadeshAderAnantyAdinA kartumashakyatavAdidaM vyAptiviShayaM vAkyamAha "yaH sAsnAdimAnsa goshabdArthaH' iti | idaM cha nAptopadeshatayaiva vyAptibodhakam.h | api tu prayogAntaravatpratItAyA vyApteH smArakatvena | apratItAyAstu tadeva jij~nAsAjananadvAreNa pramotpAdakatvenopayujyate | smR^itavyAptishcha yAM yAM vyaktiM sAsnAdimatImavalokayati | tAM tAM goshabdArthatayA.anuminotIti ko doShaH | 
yadvA yaH pR^ithivIti padaM vA vyaktivisheShasya tadathartAM vA.avagachChaMstatpravR^ittinimittaM jij~nAsate taM prati pR^ithivItvavatI prathivIti pR^ithivItvaM pR^ithivIshabdapravR^ittinimittamuchyate | tatra yasya vaktaryAptatAbuddhiH sa tAvatA santuShyati | aparaM prati tvavyAptyAdishUnyatvAditi vAkyasheShaH pravartate | 
athavA.asti gaurnAmArtha iti viditavato yatra tatra gavi ghaTAdAvashvAdau cha gobuddhau prasaktAyAM goH svarUpAvadhAraNamukhenetaravyavachChedaM kurvatsAsnAdimAneva gaurna tu tadvirahI ghaTAdirashvAdirveti vAkyaM prayujyate | idamapi pUvarvadAptatvAvadhAraNAnavadhAraNAbhyAM dvayAM gatimavalambata iti kimatrAnupapannam.h | Vyasa-(10)
nanvatra tAvadevaM prayoktavyam.h | ayaM gotvena vyavahartavyaH sAsnAdimattvAditi | tatra kiM gaurvyavahArasya visheShaNaM goshabdo vA | Adye yadyasau govishiShyaM vyavahAraM nAj~nAsIt.h tadA kathaM purovartivyaktau tasya kartavyatAmanumAnAdapi jAnIyAt.h | na hyaviditAgniranumAnAdagnisambandhaM bodhayituM shakyaH | athAj~nAsIttadA j~nAtaj~nApakatvena vyarthamanumAnam.h | na dvitIyaH | tadA hyayaM goshabdAbhidheyaH sAsnAdimattvadityanumAnaM syAt.h | tatra chAtiprasaN^gaH | tatra eva jabagaDadashAdishabdAbhidheyatvamapi sAdhyaM syAt.h | te sAmAnyato.apyarthavattayA na prasiddhAH | naivaM goshabda ityasti visheSha iti chet.h | tathA.api shashaviShANAdishabdAbhidheyatvaM sAdhyatAm.h | te.apyasadviShayatayaiva prasiddhAH | gaurastItyAdiprayogAdgoshabdo naivamiti chet.h | evamapi svastimatItyAdishabdavAchyatAnumAnaM gomAtre syAt.h | atha satyapi gotve tadanyatra tadaprayogAnneti chet.h | evaM tarhi yatra sAsnAdimattvaM nAsti tatra goshabdaprayogo.api nAsti, yatra sAsnAdimattvamasti tatra sarvatrAstIti yo jAnIte taM prati lakShaNAbhidhAnamiti syAt.h | sa cha vyavahArAntaravadanvayavyatirekAbhyAmeva vAchyavAchakabhAvamavadhAritavAniti vyarthamanumAnamiti |
maivam.h | ubhayatrApi doShAbhAvAt.h | kevalavyatirekitve hi kathaJNchidetadabhidhAtuM yuktam.h | upadeshAdinA visheShaNena gavA visheShitaM vyavahAramavagatavo hi tadanyatra tatkartavyatA.anumAnasAdhyetyaN^gIkAre ko virodhaH syAt.h | shabdavisheShitavyavahArakartavyatAsAdhane.atiprasaN^gaH kiM bodhyasya bodhakasya veti vAchyam.h | nAdyaH | tena tadvayApteranavagatatvAt.h | avagatatvAchcha goshabdavAchyatAvyApteH | na dvitIyaH | tenA.api pUrvaM vR^iddhavachanAdinA tathaiva vyApteravagatatvAt.h | prayogabhAvAbhAvAbhyAM bAdhasya niNarItatvAchcha | nahi bodhyo bAdhaparichayashUnya ityetAvatA parichitabAdhenApi bodhakena viparItaM bodhanIyam.h | vipralambhakatvApAtAt.h | tattvanirNayArthatvAchcha vAdakathAnusAriNaH shAstrasyeti | evaM pakShAntare.apyanumAnaprayogaprakAro boddhavyaH | 
yadapyuktaM shAstrAntarasAdhyatvAdayamartho na vaktavya iti | tadayuktam.h | na hyevamasmAbhiH pratij~nAtaM yatsarvathA shAstrAntarasAdhyaM tannochyata iti | na chaivaM shAstrasAN^karyamAshaN^kanIyam.h | viShayaprayojanabhedAt.h | yadi cha shAstrAntarasAdhyo.apyartho bhavadIyashAstrasya viShayaH tarhi vyAkaraNAdisAdhyamanyadapi kasmAnnochyata iti chenna | sandigdhatvasaprayojanatvasadasadbhAvAbhyAM vaiShamyAt.h | sandigdhatAdisadbhAve.api yadavachanaM taduktadishA shiShyaireva shakyaj~nAnatvAditi yatkiJNchidetat.h | anyathA parasyApi kulIrasyeva svApatyayuktihatatvaM syAt.h | tenApi hi smR^itirUpaH paratra pUrvadR^iShTAvabhAso.adhyAsa ityAdIni lakShaNAni svashAstre nibaddhAni | sUtrakR^itA cha janmAdyasya yata iti | tatraite doShAstAni lakShaNAni kiM samAskandantyuta neti vaktavyam.h | na tAvad.hdvitIyaH | sAmAnyasamAnanyAyatvAt.h | nAdyaH | duShyopAdAnasya parAjayahetutvAt.h | doShAskanditAnyapi tAni vyavahAraM nirvahantIti chenna | ApAtato.api duShyAnAM tathAtve kathamunmattabhAShitAnAmapi tadbhAvo na syAt.h | nahi teShAmanivarAhakatve.anupapatteranyatkAraNamasti | 
kiJNchaivaM vadatA prAgbrahmasAkShAtkArAdbAdhyamavyAvahArikaM brahmasAkShAtkArabAdhyaM vyAvahArikamiti matamapi parityaktaM syAt.h | nahyayaM brahmasAkShAtkAro nApi bAdhaH | 
kiJNchaivamasmadIyamapi lakShaNaM kuto na vyavahAraM nirvahet.h | nacha vyavahAranirvAhAtiriktaM kimapi tatsAdhyamabhilaShAmaH | bhavadabhilaShitA pAramArthikatA bAdhyata iti chet.h | kiM lakShaNasyota lakShyasya | nAdyaH | tathAhi | vimatamapAramArthikamaprayojanAbhidhAnatvAdityAdyuktaM syAt.h | na chAsyAsmAnprati vyAptiH shakyAbhidhAnA | kiJNchAsminpakShe.adhyAsalakShaNAnupapattishcha bhavatA na pariharaNIyA | tasyA vyavahAranirvAhAvirodhAt.h | pAramArthikatAniShedhaupayikatveneShyasAdhanatvAchcha | etenAtivyAptyAdidoSho.api nAparamArtha(pAramArthika)tA sAdhakaH | alakShaNatAsAdhakastu syAt.h | na dvitIyaH | anupapadyamAnalakShaNatvena lakShyamithyAtvasAdhane brahmaNi vyabhichArAt.h | uktAyA lakShaNAnupapattestallakShaNe.api sAmyAt.h | 
kiJNchAdhyAsalakShaNamupapannaM na vA | Adye sapakShApraveshaH sAdhanasya | dvitIye tadanupapattinirAsAyAso vyarthaH syAdityAstAM vistaraH | 
atharM nAtivartata iti yathArthaM, tasya bhAvo yAthArthyaM, tadeva mAnatvaM mAnashabdapravR^ittinimittaM mAlakShaNamiti yAvat.h yadyapi sAsnAdimAngauritivadyathArthaM pramANamityukte.api bhavatyeva lakShyalakShaNabhAvapratItiH | tathA.api tadvadeva lakShyaM lakShaNAtiriktaM shaN^kayeta | tatashcha pR^ithaN^.hnirUpyamapi syAttanmA shaN^kIti yAthArthyameva mAnatvaM na tu sAsnAdimattvAdgotvamiva 
tato.atiriktamityuktam.h | 
nanu kimidaM lakShaNaM nAma | lakShyasyAsAdhAraNo dharmaH | yAvastvekaH shabdo niveshayitumiShyaH, yAvanti chetarasmAdvayAvartanIyAni tAnyuchyante lakShyANIti |
nanvasAdhAra(No)NadharmashchellakShaNamavyApakasyApi tadA lakShaNatApattiH | ativyAptyasambhavAviva avyAptirapi hi lakShaNadoShaH | uchyate | liN^gatayA hi lakShaNamupayujyate | nacha vyApakatA liN^gatvopayoginI | vyApyatvenaiva tadupapatteH | itarathA dhUmAdInAmaliN^gatApAtAt.h | kinnAma pakShIkR^itadR^iShTAntIkR^itavyApakatAtvapekShitaiva | upAyatvenopanyastasyAbhAve tadupeyaprApterasambhavAt.h | ubhayadharmabhUtAyA vyApteranyatarAbhAve darshayitumashakyatvAt.h | tathAcha tadAnIM lilakShayiShitamAtravyAptitvaM lakShaNasyApekShitam.h | tachcha lakShyasya dharma ityuktameva | avyApakatva(dharma)sya lakShaNadoShatAvAdastu sarvasyApi lilakShayiShitatve draShyavyaH | 
yadvA.anyatra lakShaNAntarAbhAvanishchayanimittA taduktiH | vastutastvekamivAnekamapi svasvAshraye vyAvR^ittyAdikaM kurvadbhavatyeva lakShaNam.h | ata eva kaNAdaH kriyAvadguNavatsamavAyikAraNamiti kriyAvattvamapi dravyalakShaNatvenAha | kriyAvad.hgrahaNamanyArthamiti chet.h | tatkimavyApakasya lakShaNatAnupapatteranyathAvyAkhyAnamuta nimittAntarAt.h | nAntyaH | tadadarshanAt.h | na prathamaH | anupapatterapAkR^itatvAt.h | 
nanu (cha) atra pR^ithivyAdIni navApi pakShIkR^ityaitAni dravyANi kriyAvattvAditi prayoktavyam.h, kriyAvantyeva vA mUrtAni | nAdyaH bhAgAsiddheH | na dvitIyaH | anadhyavasitatvAt.h | tatkathaM nAnupapattiH | maivam.h | kaishchidanadhyavasitasya doShatAnaN^gIkArAt.h | yeShAM cha sa doShasteShAmapyupadeshAdinA ghaTAderdravyatvanishchaye sati taditaramUrtapakShIkAreNa dravyatvasAdhane kIdR^isho doShaH syAdityalam.h | 
kechidvAdino vij~nAnasya prAmANyamAsthiShata | apare tu tatkAraNasya | tat.h kimatra tattvam.h | dvayamapIti brUmaH | pramitiH pramANam.h, pramIyate.aneneti pramANamiti bhAvakaraNayoH pramANashabdasya sAmarthyAt.h | yadyapi lyuT.h bhAvakAraNayorivAdhikaraNe.api smaryate | tathA.api pramANashabdasyAbhidhAnAbhAvAnna tatra vR^ittiH | kR^ittaddhitasamAsAnAmabhidhAnAdhInatvAt.h |
