sampratipannadeshAdinA sadR^ishaM sajAtIyaM (chA)vA.asmatpakShe gaganAdiparimANotkarShAnantyamanabhyupagachChatAM pakShe kimeva na bhavati | kintu bhavatyeveti | tathAcha sampratipannadeshasya tataH sthUlenAtmanA sadR^ishena sajAtIyena vopetatvasya siddhatvAtsiddhasAdhanatA syAt.h | AkAshAdiparimANotkarShAnantyAsiddherarthAntaratA cheti | sampratipannadeshasyeshvarAdimattvaM bAdhitaM sambandhAbhAvAditi chenna | deshAntareNApi sambandhAbhAvAt.h | etena shashaviShANAdisAdhakAnumAne.api bAdhAbhidhAnaM parAstam.h | deshAntarAnumAne.api sAmyAt.h | tadevaM paramANudvayaNukayorAkAshAdiparimANotkarShAntyasya cha sAkShisiddhatAmanaN^gIkR^itya kevalAnumAnavedyatvasvIkaraNamanupapannamityukttam.h | 
evamAgamamanAdR^ityeshvaradharmAdyanumAnamapyayukttamiti prasaN^gAdAha- yenaiveti ||
atyasiddhamityanenAgamAnAdaraM darshayati | shashR^iN^gAderityaprAmANikasyopalakShaNam.h | etachcha tatra tatra leshato darshitam.h |
na(cha) shashR^iN^gAdyanumAnapratibandIgrastatvamAtreNaiteShAmanumAnAnAmaprAmANyaM yukttam.h | tathA sati dhUmAnumAnasyApyaprAmANyaprasaN^gAt.h | tatrApi hi shakyate vakttuM yadi dhUmavattvAtpavarto.agnimAMstadA pashutvAchChasho.api viShANavAnyasyAditi | athochyeta | tulyayogakShematve hi pratibandIgrahaH | anyathA.atiprasaN^gAt.h | nachAtra tulyayogakShematA dhUmAnumAnasya vyAptyAdisAmarthyasahitatvAt.h | shashR^iN^gAdyanumAnasya tadabhAvAditi | samametatprakR^ite.api | prastutAnumAnAnAmapi vyAptyAdimattvAdityata Aha- pratyakShamiti || 
vAshabdaH samuchchaye | apiranumAnasya samuchchayArthaH | niyAmako grAhakaH | mAnam.h anumAnamAnatvopayoginI | anyA pratyakShAdyagR^ihItA | sandigdhamUlataH sandigdha(gdhA)vyabhichAratvataH | avyabhichAro hi sAhityasya vyAptitve mUlam.h | tatra pratyakShagR^ihItA vyAptiryathA dhUmasyAgninA | AgamagR^ihItA yathA | brAhmaNo na hantavya iti | anumAnagR^ihItA yathA | vyatirekiprayoge | etadukttaM bhavati | pratyakShAdyavadhR^itaM hi vyAptyAdi anumAnamAnA(natA)N^gam.h | na svayamAtrasiddham.h | sandigdha(gdhA)vyabhichA(ra)ritvAt.h | samayAnAM sandigdhamUlatvAchcha | vidyate cha dhUmAdyanumAnAnAM pramANAvadhR^itaM vyAptyAdIti na pratibandIgrahamAtreNa tadbhaN^gaH | na paramANvAdyanumAnAnAmiti pratibandIgrastatvAdaprAmANyameva | nanu vyAptyAdyabhAve kiM pratibandIgraheNa | tata evAprAmANyasiddheriti | satyam.h | pratyakShAdyanavadhR^itavyAptyAderapi prAmANye.atiprasaN^go vA tadaprAmANye dR^iShTAnto vA pratibandIgraheNa dyotyata ityadoSha iti |
satyametatpratyakShAdyavadhR^itaiva vyAptiranumAnaprAmANyopayoginIti | sA cha dhUmAnumAvatparamANvAdyanumAneShvapyastyeva | dhUmasyAgnineva mahadArambhakatvAdInAmapi sAvayavatvAdinA sAhityadarshanAdityata Aha- saheti || 
na dhUmAdImApyagnyAdibhiH sahadarshanamAtreNa vyAptiravasIyate | yena mahadArambhakatvAdInAmapi sAvayavatvAdibhistato.avasIyeta | tathA satyagnyAdInAM dhUmAdibhirapi vyAptyadhyavasAyaprasaN^gAt.h | sahadarshanamAtrasya tatrApi sattvAt.h | vyabhichArAnupalambhe sati sAhityadarshanaM vyAptyadhyavasAyaheturiti chet.h | kiM sakaladeshakAlaniShTho.anupalambhaH, kiM vA tadvisheShaniShThaH | 
nAdyaH | asmadAdyashakyatvAt.h |  na dvitIyaH | atiprasaN^gAditi |
kathaM tarhi vyAptyadhyavasAyaH syAdityata Aha- yadaiveti || avyatireke sAdhyAbhimatavyatirekeNAsattve | asya sAdhanAbhimatasya dharmasya yukttervyAptinishchayahetutve.anavasthA (syA)nAt.h | tadvayApterapi yuktyantareNa nishchetavyatvAdityata ukttam.h- 
tannirdhAriteti || vyAptishabdo.adhyAhAryaH | tena pratyakSheNAgamena vA nirdhAritavyAptiketyarthaH | aparA sAhityadarshanamAtranibandhanA na hi | 
ayamarthaH | niyataH sambandho hi vyAptirna sambandhamAtram.h | niyamashcha vyabhichArAbhAvaH | ataH sAhitya iva vyabhichArAbhAve.api pramANapravR^ittau vyAptisiddhiH | nachaitadashakyam.h | anumityanudaye sarvavyavahAravilopaprasaN^gena kAryadarshanAdeva tatsiddheH | prakArastu chintyate | tatra dhUmasyAgninA sambandhastAvatpratyakSheNAvagamyate | parichitadeshakAlayorvyabhichArashcha nAvagamyate | deshAntarAdigate tu vyabhichAre sandeho.avashiShyate | sa cha na tAvadvayabhichArachihnadarshanajanyaH | kintu bhUyaHsahacharitatayA dR^iShTA adR^iShTavyabhichArA api dharmA vyabhichAriNo dR^iShTAH | dharmashchAyamityevamutpadyate | tatra yadyayametatsahavR^ittisvabhAvastadA.anyatrApi sahaiva varteta | svabhAvasyAnapAyAt.h | yadi chAsahavR^ittisvabhAvastadA.atrApi na saha varteta | asahavR^ittisvabhAvasyApi sahavR^ittirnimittAntarAyattA chedatropalabhyeta | sahavR^ittisvabhAvasyApi nimittAntarAdvayabhichAro bhaviShyatIti tu nirbIjA shaN^kAM nodetyeva | usarvavyavahArAbhAvaprasaN^gAt.h | 
tadevaM mImAMsAsahakR^itaM pratyakShaM dhUmasyAgnisambandhaM gR^ihNadvayabhichArAbhAvamapyAkalayatIti vyAptimavadhArayatyeva | anumAnAgamAbhyAM tu vyAptigrahaprakAraH su(gama)graha eveti | 
nanvanenaiva nyAyena mahadArambhakatvAdInAmapi vyAptinishchayasambhavAtkathaM paramANvAdAvanumAnApravR^ittiriti chenna | pakShetaratvasyopAdhitvasambhavena vyabhichArAbhAvAnishchayAt.h | atha tasyopAdhitvaM nAstItyuchyeta dAta bAdhakamAha- anyatheti || 
pakShetaratvasyopAdhitAmanAdR^itya pramANAntarAsahakR^itenaivAnumAnena paramANvAdisiddhayabhyupagama ityarthaH | madhuro raso lavaNAdirasapaJNchakavyatirikttarasAnyonyAbhAvavAn.h rasatvAllavaNAdityAdyanumayA | aniShyAni cha sarvANi dahanashaityAdInyApateyuH | kutaH | yasmAdevaMvidhAnumA kAmachAriNI | nanu cha saptamarasAderanupalambhAdibAdhitatvAtpakShetaratvopAdhiduShyatvamanumAnAnAmiti chetsamaM prakR^ite.api | paramANvAderapyanupalambhabAdhitatvAt.h | ayogyaM taditi chet.h | tulyaM saptamarasAdAvapi | anumAnaprAmANye saptamarasAdisiddhAvayogyatvaM kalpyam.h | kalpite cha tasminnanumAnaprAmANyasiddhirityanyonyAshrayatvamiti chet.h | etadapi tAdR^igeva | anupabhogyasya saptamarasAdeH kalpane gauravamiti chet.h | samAdhisAmyam.h | pramite na gauravaM doSha ityetadapi samAnam.h | tasmAtparamANvAdeH sAkShivedyatvamaN^gIkR^itya pratibandI mochanIyeti kathaM na tasya sAkShivedyatvamiti |
|| OM samavAyAbhyupagamAchcha sAmyAdanavasthiteH OM || OM ubhayathA.api na karmAtastadabhAvaH OM || iti sUtram.h | tat.h "nityameva cha bhAvAt.h' ityAgAmisUtravyAkhyAnenaiva vyAkhyAtaM bhaviShyatIti manvAnastadapahAya hetvantareNa vaisheShikAdisamayamapAkurvan.h(t.h) "samavAyAbhyupagamAchcha sAmyAdanavasthiteH' ityetatsUtraM vyAchaShye- kAryeti || 
samavAya Iryata iti vakShyamANamatrApi sambaddhayate | anena samavAyapratipAdakaM pareShAM "iheti yataH kAryakAraNayoH sa samavAyaH' iti sUtramarthato.anuvadati | atra kAryakAraNashabdAvayavAvayavivAchakau | tau chopalakShaNaparAviti sUchanArthashchashabdaH | evashabdaH samavAyasyehapratyasiddhatvaM sUchayati |
tadetatsvayameva vivR^iNoti- guNAderiti ||
guNAdeH paJNchakasyeti guNAvayavikriyAsAmAnyavisheShaNAmityarthaH | chashabdena guNyAdipaJNchakasya cheti samuchchinoti | nanu guNaguNyAdikamabhinnaM bhinnAbhinnaM vA tatkiM samavAyenetyata ukttam.h- bhinnasyaiveti || tushabdo visheShArthaH | na yayoH kayoshchidguNaguNinoH samavAyaH kintvayutasiddhayoreveti | sa guNaguNyAdisvabhAva eva chenna padArthAntarasiddhirityata ukttam.h- anya iti || Iryate vaisheShikAdibhiH, ato.api taddarshanamayukttamiti sheShaH |
ayamarthaH | vaisheShikAdayo.avayavAvayavinorguNaguNinoH kriyAkriyAvatorjAtivyaktayoH visheShanityadravyayoratyantabhedamabhyupagamyAtyantabhinnameva samavAyAkhyaM sambandhamabhyupagachChanti | tato.apyanupapannabhAShiNa iti | 
nanu cha guNaguNyAdInAmatyantabhedastAvadvayapadeshabhedAdipramANasiddhaH | anyathA stambhakumbhAdInAmapyatyantabhedo na syAt.h | asti cheha tantuShu paTaH, iha paTe rUpamiha mUrte karmeha gavi gotvamiha nityadravye visheSha ityabAdhitaH pratyayaH | na chehedamiti pratyayo vinA.atirikttena sambandhenopapadyate | iha kuNDe badarANIti pratyayasya saMyogapUrvakatvadarshanAt.h | sa chAyamayutasiddhayoH sambandha iti saMyogAdbhidyate | yutasiddhayorhi sambandhaH saMyogaH | dravyamAtravR^ittishcha | tadevaM pramitasya samavAyasyAbhyupagame kathamayukttavAditvaM vaisheShikAdInAmityata Aha- bhinnatveti ||
bhinnatvasAmyata ityupalakShaNam.h | ihapratyayasAmyatashchetyapi draShyavyam.h | tasya samavAyasya | tAbhyAm.h 
avayavAvayavyAdisambandhibhyAM saha | yogaH sambandhaH | 
etadukttaM bhavati | iha tantuShu paTa ityAdipratyayaH sambandhapUrvako.abAdhitehapratyayatvAdiha kuNDe badarANIti pratyayavaditi samavAyamanumimAnena yo.abAdhitehapratyayaH sa sambandhapUrvaka  iti vyAptiravashyamaN^gIkaraNIyA | vidyate cheha tantupaTayoH samavAya ityabAdhitehapratyayaH | tena samavAyasyApi tantupaTAbhyAM samavAyo.abhyupagantavya eva syAt.h | na chAbhyupagamyate | atastatra anaikAntikamanumAnamiti | 
nanu tantupaTayoH samavAyaH siddho na vA | siddhashchetkimuttarakAlabhAvinA.anaikAntyena | nachetkvanaikAntyam.h | maivam.h | ApAtataH pratIte sambandhe vyabhichAraM dR^iShTvA parAvR^itterAvashyakatvasya vivakShitatvAt.h | 
nanvatra bhinnatvasAmyaM kimarthamupanyastam.h | nahi bhinnatvaM hetUkR^itamiti | satyam.h | abAdhitatvadyotanArthaM bhinnatvagrahaNam.h | vibhinnavastvabhAve khalviha pratyayo bAdhitaH syAt.h | iha tantupaTayoH samavAya iti pratyayo.api sambandhapUrvaka eva tantupaTasamavAyasyaitatkAraNatvAditi chenna | AdhArAdheyatayA pratIyamAnayoH sambandhasya pareNa sisAdhayiShitatvAt.h | anyathA sthANushyenayoH saMyoga ityatra samavAyAsiddhiprasaN^gAt.h | indriyArthasannikarShAdinA siddhasAdhanatApatteshcha | 
nanvanavasthiteriti sUtraM katham.h | ittham.h | yadi vyabhichAraparihArAya samavAyasyApi samavAyAntaramupeyate | tadA.anavasthitiriti | 
iha kechitsamavAyaM pratyakShamAchakShANAH, yata iti cha viShayasaptamIM vyAchakShANAH tatsthemne anumAnamAchakShate | teShAmihapratyayasya sambandhapUrvakatvaM nAma tatpratItipUrvakatvameva | tanmate sphuTaivAnavasthA |
ye tu pratyakShatAM nAbhyupagachChanti | sambandhasya sattAmAtreNehapratyayakAraNavatvamAhusteShAm.h, avasthitiH siddhAntaH tadvirodho.anavasthitiH ityanavasthitishabdo.apasiddhAntavAchI vyAkhyAyate | 
yadveha kuNDe badarANItivatsambandhasya pratItyaivehapratyayakAraNatvAdatrApi pratItimApAdyAnavasthaiva vakttavyA | kuNDabadarasaMyogasya yogyatayA avarjanIyatayA pratItirnehapratyayakAraNamiti kuta eShA kalpanA | sattAmAtreNehapratyayakAraNatvopapattau pratIterapi kAraNatvakalpakAbhAvAditi chenna | satyapi saMyoge kutashchidvayavadhAnAdapratIyamAne nehabuddhirbhavati | bhavati chAsatyapi saMyoge tadviparyayAdityanvayavyatirekayoH kalpakAbhAvAt.h | svasvAmibhAvAdayo.api hi j~nAtA eva sambandhanimittavyavahArahetavo dR^iShTA nAnyathA | na te sambandhA adviShThatvAditi chenna | saMyogasyApyadviShThatAyA vakShyamANatvAt.h | kiJNchaivaM samavAyo.api na sambandhaH syAt.h | tasyAnAshritatvAbhyupagamAt.h |
nanvevaM tarhi nAnaikAntyAt.h anavasthaiva bAdhitatvenAbAdhitehapratyayatvasya tatrAvR^itteriti chenna | anavasthAyAH sAdhyabAdhakatvena sAdhanAbAdhakatvAt.h | sAdhyabAdhenaiva sAdhanabAdhanAbhyupagamasya vyAptinishchayottarakAlInatvAt.h | tantupaTayoH samavAya iti pratItirapi sambandhapUrvikaiva | kintvaropita evAsau sambandha iti chenna | anavasthA.anistArAt.h | AropitasambandhapUrvakatvaM hi sambandhAropapUrvakatvameva, pratItau cheyamanavasthoktteti kathaM (tannirastA)nistAraH | kiJNchaivaM vadatA sattayaiva sambandhasya kAraNatvamiti mataM tyakttaM syAt.h | 
api chAbAdhito.apIhapratyayo yadi sambandhAropamAtreNa bhavettadA tantupaTAdAvapi kinna bhavediti samavAyAsiddhiH | kvachitsiddhasya kvachidAropaH kutrApyabhAve tadasiddhiriti chenna | 
sthANushyenayoH sambandhasya sattvAt.h | anyathA samavAye.api samavAyAntarArope na syAtsamavAyAntarasya kvApya(sattvAt.h)sambhavAt.h | 
samavAye bheda evAropyate na samavAyAntaramiti chenna | tAvanmAtreNehapratyayAyogAt.h | sambandhisambandhabhAvo.apyAropyata iti chenna | tarhi tantupaTAdAvapi tadAropamAtreNehapratyayopapattau kiM samavAyeneti |
nanu samavAye.apIhedamiti pratyayaH samavAyAdhIna eva | nachApasiddhAnto.anavasthA vA | tasyaiva samavAyasya svanirvAhakatvAt.h | ya eva hi samavAyo.avayavAdiShvavayavyAdInAM sambandhaH, sa evAvayavAvavyAdiShvAtmanA sambandha ityAshaN^kate- sa iti ||
saH avayavAvayavyAdisamavAyaH | evaM tarhi kiM samavAyena, dravyasyaiva svanirvAhakatvopapatteriti pariharati- dravyameveti ||
tarhIti sheShaH | tathA svanirvAhakatvAt.h |
kiM kasmAt.h | ayamAshayaH | yadIhedamiti buddhirnAvashyaM svAtirikttasambandhasApekShA | kvachitsvanirvAhakatvAt.h | tarhi dravyaguNAdInAmihedamiti pratyayo.api nAtirikttasambandhAdhIno.aN^gIkAryaH | dravyasyaiva svanirvAhakatayA.api tadupapatteriti | 
samavAyaH sambandhAtmakatvAt.h svanirvAhakaH, na dravyamiti chenna | tadasiddhau sambandhatvasyApyasiddheH | saMyogasyApi svanirvAhakatApatteshcha | tasyAnityatvAnneti chenna | samavAyanityatvasyAsiddheriti |
evaM dravyAdguNAdInAmatyantabhede.api na tatsambandhaH samavAyalakShaNo.aparaH siddhayati | samavAyavad.hdravyasyaiva svanirvAhakatvopapatteH kalpanAlAghava(tva)Achchetyukttam.h | idAnIM guNAdInAM dravyAdatyantabhedAbhAvAchcha na samavAyasiddhirityAshayavAMstadatyantabhede paropanyastAnhetUnapAkataruM tAvadupodghAtamAha- visheSha iti ||
abhinne samavAya iti sheShaH | avasIyate aN^gIkriyata iti yAvat.h | guNakriyAdirUpasya visheShasyeti sheShaH | kena hetunA na kenApi | 
idamukttaM bhavati | samavAye tAvadavayavAvayavyAdigatatvamaN^gIkR^itam.h | "AshritatvaM chAnyatra nityadravyebhyaH' iti vachanAt.h | nachAnityadravyagurakarmasAmAnyavisheShaNAmiva samavAyasya tadgatatvaM nAma samavAyalakShaNavR^ittiH sambhavati | tasyAbhinnatvAt.h | atastadgatatvaM (nAma) samavAyasvarUpamevetyaN^gIkartavyam.h | paratantratayopalabdhistadgatatvamiti chenna | tasyAH samavAyadharmatvAnupapatteH | tadviShayatvAttaddharmatvamiti chenna | viShayatvasyApi samavAyasvarUpa(tva)AnatirekAt.h |
evamastitvAbhidheyatvaj~neyatvasambandhatvAdayo.api samavAye.abhyupagatAH, na samavAyasvarUpAdbhidyante | bhedaM hi teShAM samavAyena sambandho vakttavyaH | anyathA kathamete tatra syuH | nacha sambandho yukttaH, saMyogasya guNatvena dravyamAtravR^itteH, samavAyasya chAbhinnatvAt.h | tatra pR^ichChAmaH | samavAyasya tadgatatvAdidharmANAM chAbhede kathamaparyAyashabdavAchyatvaM, dharmadharmibhAvaH, ShaShThIprayogo, j~nAtatvAj~nAtatvam.h, ekatvAnekatvamityAdi yujyata iti | nahya(chA)tropachArAdikalpanA yukttA | mukhyaprayogAderadarshanAt.h | na tadgatatvAdi samavAyatanmAtraM, yenAnupapAttaH syAt.h | kintu samavAyAbhinnamapi tadvisheShAtmakatmakam.h | ato vyapadeshabhedAdi yujyate | visheShasya bhedapratinidhitvAdityevAgatikataya tatra samAdhirabhidhAnIyaH | tathAcha yadyabhinne.api samavAye tadgatatvAdivisheSho.aN^gIkriyate tadA guNakriyAdikamapi dravyasvarUpameva sadvisheShAtmakaM bhavatu na tu tanmAtram.h | samavAyadharmAstavisheShAH, guNAdayastu na dravyavisheShA ityatra visheShahetvabhAvAt.h iti |
kimato yadyevamityata Aha- dravyameveti ||
samavAyadharmavadguNAdInAM dravyavisheShatvAdityarthaH | anantashabdo yatra yAvanto vyavahArAH tAvatAmupalakShakaH | nAnAvyavahR^iteH vyapadeshabhedAdirityarthaH | etadukttaM bhavati | guNaguNyAdeH atyantabhede siddhe hi tatsambandhaH samavAyaH siddhayati | guNaguNyAdyatyantabhedastu na prAmANikaH | tathAhi na tAvattatra pratyakShaM pramANaM, gavAshvAdivadanupalambhAt.h | ato guNaguNinAvatyantabhinnAvaparyAyashabdavAchyatvAt.h | ghaTapaTavadityAdyanumAnameva vakttavyam.h | tachchAnaikAntikam.h | samavAyasya taddharmANAM (cha) bhedAbhAve.apyaparyAyashabdavAchyatvAdanyathAsiddhaM cha | yathA samavAye tadgatatvAdidharmANAM bhedabhAve.api visheShaparanAmakAtsvabhAvavisheShAdevAparyAyashabdavAchyatvAdikamupapAdanIyam.h | gatyantarAbhAvAt.h | tathA guNaguNyAdInAma(tyantA)bhede.api guNAdInAM dravyavisheShatve(na dra)taddravyameva | visheShashaktayaivAparyAyashabdavAchyatvAdivyavahAraheturbhaviShyati | tathAcha vipakShe bAdhakAbhAvAdaprayojakatvaM hetUnAmiti | 
yadvA visheShastadgatatvAdirityanenaiva guNaguNyAdyatyantabhedasAdhakAnAM hetUnAmanaikAntyAprayojakatve varNite | yadi tadgatatvAdidhamarAbhinne samavAye tadgatatvAdivisheSho.abhyupeyate | visheShaNaiva cha vyavahArA nirvahiShyante | tadA vyapadeshabhedAdihetUnAM vyabhichArAnyathAsiddhibhyAM AbhAsatvAtkena hetunA dravyasya guNakriyAdirUpasya guNakriyAdisvarUpatvasya niShedhaH (kariShyate) kriyate | guNaguNyAdyatyantabhedaH kena hetunA sAdhayiShyata iti yAvat.h | anyathAsiddhimeva prakaTayannupasaMharati- dravyameveti || samavAyavaditi vakShyamANamatrApi sambaddhayate | yathA samavAyasya tadgatatvAdivisheShAtmatayA vyapadeshabhedAdivyavahArahetutvam.h | tathA dravyameva ghaTAdikaM guNakriyAdyanantavisheShAtmatayA nAnAvyavahR^iterheturbhavatIti |
nanvaupachArikatvaM vA bhrAntimUlatvaM vA vyavahArANAmaN^gIkR^itya hetUnAM dUShaNaM shakyam.h | tatkiM visheShAN^gIkAreNa | naivaM shakyam.h | aupachArikatvAdau hi kadAchinmukttau vyavahAraH syAt.h | na hi tIrAdau sadA gaN^gAdivyavahAro.asti | nachaivaM prakR^ite  sadaivAparyAyashabdavAchyatvAdeH sattvAt.h | yadApyabhedabodhAya rUpameva ghaTa iti vA vij~nAnaM brahmeti vA vyavahriyate tadApi na paryAyatAmupetya, tathA.ananubhavAt.h | ato vaktavyamevAtra nimittam.h | tadidamukttam.h- sadeti ||
nanvanantavisheShAtmakamekameva dravyamiti vyAhatamiti chet.h | kiM mAtA vandhyetivatsAkShAdvirodhaH, kiMvA kR^itakaM nityamitivadvayAptyA | nAdyaH | yato.anantatvaM saN^khayAvisheShaH, ekatvaM chAbhedaH | na dvitIyaH | yatrAnekatvaM tatrAvashyaM bheda iti 
vyAptau hi sa syAt.h | na chaivam.h | bhedapratinidhinA visheSheNaiva anekatvasaN^khayAnirvAhAdityAha- anantatvamiti ||
IshvarAkhyadravyavisheShaNAmanantatvamanyatrAnekatvamiti draShyavyam.h | atrApi samavAyavaditi sambaddhayate | eka eva hi samavAyo.anekadharmAtmako.aN^gIkriyate | 
nanvayaM nAnAvyavahAranirvAhaheturvisheSho yadi dravyAtmaiva kathaM tarhi (taddravya)dravyasya visheShaH syAt.h | tadIyatAyA bhedavyAptatvAt.h | maivam.h | vinA.api bhedena tatpratinidhinA visheShaNaiva visheShasya tadIyatopapatteH | evaM tarhi tasyApi visheShasya visheShatvasiddhaye visheShAntaramaN^gIkartavyamityanavasthetyata Aha- visheShashcheti ||
yathA samavAyaH svenaiva samavAyI, na sambandhAntareNetyabhyupagamyAnavasthA pareNa parAkriyate | tathA sa dravye.anekavyavahAranirvAheturvisheShashcha svenaiva visheShI na punarvisheShAntareNa | ato na kashchiddoSha iti | samavAyavadityupalakShaNam.h | sattA.antyavisheShavachchetyapi draShyavyam.h | yathA dravyaguNakarmasu sadvayavahArahetuH sattA svenaiva satI svIkR^itA | yathA cha nityadravyeShvatyantavyAvR^ittipratyaye heturantyo visheShaH svenaivAtyantavyAvR^ittastathaiveti |
athA.api syAt.h | guNaguNyAdibhedamabhyupagachChatA mayA ihedamiti vyavahAranirvAhAya samavAyo.aN^gIkriyate, tasya chAnavasthAparihArAya svanirvAhakatvam.h | abhedaM(abhyu)chAbhyupagachChatA tvayA.aparyAyashabdavAchyatAdisiddhaye visheSho.aN^gIkriyate, tasya chAnavasthAnirAsAya svanirvAhakatvamiti pakShadvaye samAne ko visheSho.abhedapakShe, yena sa parigR^ihyate | samavAyasyAprAmANikatvamiti chet.h | samaM visheShe.api | aparyAyavyavahArAdinA sa siddha iti chet.h | tarhi samavAyo.apIhedamityAdinA siddha iti tulyam.h | tadanaikAntikamityukttamiti chet.h | aparyAyavyavahArAdikamapi ghaTapaTAvanaikAntikamiti samAnam.h | astu tarhi guNaguNyAdibhede vyavahArAdisakamapi ghaTapaTAdavanaikAntikamiti samAnam.h | astu tarhi guNaguNyAdibhede pramANAbhAvo visheSha iti chenna | abhede.api pramANAbhAvAt.h | gavAshchAdivadvivekenAnupalambho abhede pramANamiti chet.h | tarhi vyapadeshabhedAdi bhede pramANamastIti samAdhisAmyam.h | tadvayabhichArAnyathAsiddhibhyAM nirastamiti chet.h | abhedapramANamapi tAdR^igeva | tasyApi kShIranIrAdau vyabhichArAt.h | ayutasiddhatvenAnyathAsiddheshcha | tasmAnnimitto.ayamabhedapakShapAta ityata Aha- kalpaneti ||
padArthAntarA guNaguNyAdInAmiti sheShaH | yadyapi bhedAbhedapakShayoH svanirvAhakasamavAyavisheShAN^gIkAreNa sAmyaM, tathA.api bhedapakShe kalpanAgurutAdoShAt.h guNaguNyAdInAM padArthAntaratA nAN^gIkriyate | kalpanAlAghavAdabheda evopeyata iti |
kathaM bhedavAde kalpanAgauravamityata Aha- kalpayitveti ||
kevalamityetat.h ShaDityanenaikasminnityanena cha sambaddhayate | ekasmin.h samavAye, saH vichitravyavahArahetushchedaN^gIkriyata iti sheShaH | kiM kasmAt.h | pUrvaM dravya ityarthaH | tasya visheShasya | 
ayamabhisandhiH | vyapadeshabhedAdipramANabalamavambya vaisheShikAdibhirdravyAdayo bhAvapadArthAH ShaDeva | abhAvo.api saptama iti kalpitam.h | samavAye pratItaM tadgatatvAdikaM tu na samavAyAtirikttam.h | kintu svabhAvabhedAparanAmnA visheSheNaiva tatra vyapadeshabhedAdyutpattiriti cha | tatrAntato.apyaN^gIkatarvyena vyapadeshabhedAdinirvAhakeNa visheSheNaiva dravye.api tannirvAho vakttavyaH | saptapadArthInirUpaNaM na kartavyam.h | yadvA dravyavatsamavAye.api tadgatatvAdInAM bheda eva svIkAryaH | teShAM cha dravyAdiShvantarbhAvAsambhave saptapadArthaniyamastyAjyaH | visheShakAraNena vinA kvachidbhedasya kvachidvisheShasyAbhyupagame kathaM kalpanAgauravaM na syAt.h | tadabhAve vA.abhedavAde kathaM kalpanAlAghavaM na bhavediti | bhedapratItyapratItibhyAM visheSha ityAdi tu nirAkariShyate | atra dvidhAkalpanapradarshanArthenaiva pUrvArdhena samavAye visheShasyAN^gIkartavyatA.api samathirtA veditavyA | ata eva kevalashabdasambandhaH | saptaiva hi padAtharAH | nacha teShu samavAyadharmANAmantarbhAvaH sambhavatIti visheShA eva taira(te.a)N^gIkartavyA iti |
na kevalaM sarvathA.aN^gIkAyareNa visheSheNaiva guNaguNyAdivyapadeshabhedAdyupapattau dravyabhedamaN^gIkR^itya samavAya(eva) ekasminvisheShAbhyupagame kalpanAgauravamiti bhedamatamapahAyAbhedapakShapAtaH kriyate | kintu samavAye pramANAbhAvAdapi | 
tathA hi | na tAvattatra pratyakShaM pramANam.h | kuNDadadhnoH saMyoga itivattantupaTayoH samavAya ityapratIteH | sambandhapratItireva tatpratItiriti chenna | tasyA asammateH | 
etenAyaM tantupaTasambandhapratyayashchakShurjanyo.ananyathAsiddhatadanvayavyatirekAnuvidhAyitvAtpaTapratyayavat.h | ayaM tantupaTayoH sambandho yogajadharmAjanyajanyasAkShAtkAraviShayastantupaTasambandhatvAdetattantupaTAntarasaMyogavaditi 
samavAyapratyakShatAsAdhanamapyapAstam.h | tantupaTasambandhatatpratyayayoH asiddhayA.a.ashrayAsiddheH | sambandhApratItau shuklaH paTa iti sAmAnAdhikaraNyapratItirna syAt.h | daNDIkuNDalItyAdau tasya tatpUrvakatvadarshanAditi chenna, samavAyo.astItyAdau vyabhichArAt.h | 
nApyanumAnam.h | ihedamiti pratyayasya dUShitatvAt.h | iha bhUtale ghaTAbhAva iti pratyaye vyabhichArAchcha | bhAvamAtraviShayatvena visheShaNAdadoSha iti chenna | abhAvavadbhAve.apyupapattau anyathAsiddheH | iha ghaTe j~nAnamiti pratyaye vyabhichArAparihArAchcha | bAdhito.ayamiti chenna | anyathApratyayAnupalabdheH | etena jAtyAdigocharo vishiShyavyavahAraH sambandhiniyato bhAvamAtraviShayAbAdhitavishiShyavyavahAratvAtsaghaTaM bhUtalamiti vyavahAravadityapAstam.h | j~nAto ghaTaH, asti samavAyaH ityAdau vyabhichArAt.h | 
ete tantava etatpaTasambaddhA etadAshrayatvAdbhUtalavat.h, ayaM paTa etattantusambaddha etadAshritatvAdetadAshritatR^iNAdivadityapyasat.h | tantupaTayorAshrayAshrayibhAvAsiddheH | iha tantuShvayaM paTa iti vyavahArasiddhatatpratyAttatsiddhiriti chenna | iha samavAye.astitvamityAdau vyabhichArAt.h | 
bhUtalarUpAdayo bhUtalasambaddhA bhUtalavisheShaNatvAt.h ghaTavadityapi, bhUtalavisheShaNe j~nAne vyabhichArAdayukttam.h | 
iha tantuSha paTa ityAdipratyaya etaJNjanakasaMyogatvarahitasambandhajanya ihetipratyayatvAdiha kuNDe badarANIti pratyayavat.h | nacheha bhUtale ghaTAbhAva iti pratyaye vyabhichAraH tatrApi chakShurbhUtalasaMyogAdijanyatvasya sattvAt.h, ityapi na yukttam.h, ayaM paTa etajjanakatanturahitopAdAnajanyaH paTatvAtpaTAntaravadityAbhAsasamAnayogakShematvAt.h | 
rUpAdayaH sambandhavantaH prameyatvAdghaTavadityapyanupapannam.h, samavAyAbhAvayorvyabhichArAt.h | tatrApi visheShaNavisheShyabhAvAbhyupagamAnneti chenna, tasya pareNa sambandhatvAnaN^gIkArAt.h | aN^gIkAre vA tenaivArthAntaratvAt.h | matubarthasyAbhAvAdbAdhitaviShayatvAchcha |
samavAyaH svenaiva sambandhI (ityAdi) syAditi nirastam.h | 
idaM chakShuretajjanyasaMyogaj~nAnatvarahitasambandhaj~nAnajanakaM chakShuShTvAdanyachakShurvat.h, ahaM manniShThasaMyogaj~nAnatvarahitasambandhaj~nAnavAnAtmatvAdAtmAntaravat.h, ayaM kAla idAnIntanasaMyogaj~nAnatvarahitasambandhaj~nAnavAnkAlatvAdanyakAlavat.h ityAdIni, AbhAsasamAnayogakShematvAt.h, visheShaNavisheShyabhAvAdinA.atharAntaratvAchchApAstAni | 
saMyogatvaM sambandhavyAvR^ittam.h jAtitvAdgotvavaditi siddhasAdhanam.h | jAteH prativyakttiniyatatvasya vakShyamANatvenaikasya saMyogatvasya saMyogAntarAdvayAvR^itteH, visheShaNavisheShyabhAvAdito vyAvR^itteshcha | vivAdAdhyAsitA mR^it.h ghaTasambaddhA dravyatvAdAkAshavaditi cha ghaTAntarasaMyogenArthAntaram.h | etadghaTasambaddheti nirdeshe.apyetadghaTasambandhamalabdhvA vinaShyadravye.anaikAntikam.h | tatrApi paramparAsambandho.astIti chet.h | tarhi siddhasAdhanam.h | mR^itsaMyukttabhUtalasya ghaTasaMyukttatvAt.h |
tantupaTau nityasambaddhau dravyatvAdAkAshavaditi, dR^iShTAntasya sAdhyavikalatvAdapAstam.h | saMyogaH svavyatirikttasambandhAdbhinnaH prameyatvAdghaTavadityatra svavyatirikttapadena svAnyonyAbhAvavivakShAyAM siddhasAdhanatA | ekasya saMyogasya saMyogAntarAdbhinnatvAt.h | saMyogatvarahitatvavivakShAyAmaprasiddhavisheShaNatvam.h | visheShaNavisheShyabhAvAdinA tatsamAdhAne tenaiva siddhasAdhanam.h | 
ayaM saMyoga etadanyasaMyogatvarahitasambandhAnyo meyatvAdghaTavat.h ityAdyAshcha, AbhAsasamAnayogakShematvAdupekShaNIyAH | tadevaM samavAye pramANAbhAvAnna bhedapakSho.aN^gIkriyate | 
nanUkttamatrAbhedapakSho.api tarhi nAN^gIkAryo visheShe pramANAbhAvAditi tatrAha- yeneti ||
pratyakShasiddhenetyanena pratyakShasiddha iti labhyate | yenAkhilo vyavahAro bhavet.h | yaM vinA na bhavedityanvayavyatirekAbhyAM visheShakAryatvaM vyavahArasya darshayatA vyavahArAnyathA.anupapattishcha visheShe pramANaM tadanaN^gIkAre vyavahArochChedaprasaN^gashchetyukttaM bhavati | akhila ityasyaiva vivaraNaM bhAvAbhAvavibhAgena vidhiniShedhabhedena(iti) | dvividhastAvaditi sheShaH | 
nanu bhedapakShe.api samavAyabhyupagamenAkhilo.api vyavahAro ghaTiShyate | atyantAbhede.api vyAvR^ittisvIkAreNa bhedAbhedAbhyAM tu sutarAm.h | tatkiM visheSheNetyata ukttam.h- kathaJNchaneti ||
etAdR^ishe sarvavyavahAranirvAhahetau ko dveShaH kinnimittA.anupAditA | pramANAbhAvo hyanupAdAnanimittam.h | sati pramANe nAnupAdAnanimittamastItyarthaH | mA bhUdvayavahAra ityata ukttam.h- vAdinAmiti || upalakShaNaM chaitat.h | j~nAtR^iNAM chetyapi draShyavyam.h 
| vishiShyaviShayAbhij~nAbhivadanalakShaNo hyatra vyavahAraH prakR^itaH | 
kiJNchAvayavAvayavyAdibhede pramANAbhAvAchcha taM parityajyAbhedapakSho.aN^gIkriyate | nanUkttamatrAbhede.api pramANaM nAstIti | tatrAha- abhedeneti ||
ihApi kAryakAraNagrahaNenAvayavyavayavAvuchyete | pUrvashabdena guNaguNyAdikam.h | abhAvashabdenAnyonyAbhAvo gR^ihyate | tasyaiva dharmyabhinnatvAt.h | yadvA.abhAvataddharmAvanenopalakShyete | avasIyate sAkShiNA | tathAhi | tantupaTAdiviShayA buddhiratyantabhinnaghaTapaTAdiviShayabuddhito vilakShaNA.anuvyavasIyate utAvilakShaNA | na tAvad.hdvitIyaH | pratItyapalApAnupapatteH | Adye kathamabhedapratItirnAstIti shakyaM vakttum.h | sambandhena vi(she)shiShyata iti chenna | kuNDabadarapratItito.api vailakShaNyAnubhavAt.h | sambandhinorayutasiddhatvAttatheti chenna | AdhArAdheyabhAvenAvasthAnasamaye tasyAkiJNchitkaratvAt.h | atastantupaTayoH kuNDabadarayoshcha bhede sambandhe cha samAne kAlAntarabhAvinaH sambandhavinAshAdeH sambandhivibhAgAdervA pratyakShapratItiM pratyupayogA(yogA)bhAvAdvailakShaNyaM nAnubhUyeta | anubhUyate cha tantupaTAdibuddhiH kuNDabadarAdibuddhevirlakShaNetyabhedaviShayaiva sA.avasIyate | 
kiJNcha paTotpatteH prAgyAvantaM deshamavaShyabhya tantavastiShThanti paTo.api tAvantameva | nacha mUrtayoH samAnadeshatvaM yujyate | tena j~nAyate tantvabhinnaH paTa iti | nachAvayavAvayavino rUparasAdi(vat.h)dvaitamanubhUyata ityAdyabhedapramANaM svayamUhanIyam.h |
nanvabhedashchetpratyakSheNaivekShyate | tadA kathaM shuklaH paTashchalati(paTa) ityAdisAmAnAdhikaraNyAdivyavahAraH | tasya daNDI kuNDalItivadbhedaviShayatvAt.h | nahi pratItivirodhI vyavahAro bhavatItyata ukttam.h- savisheSheti || visheSheNa viShayeNa upetA | 
ayamarthaH | yatra kevalamabhedaH pratIyate na tatra sAmAnAdhikaraNyavyavahAro bhavati | yathA ghaTaH kalasha iti | atra tvabhedaH pratIyamAno visheSheNa sahita eva pratIyate | visheShashcha bhedapratinidhiH sAmAnAdhikaraNyavyavahAraM prasUta iti |
nanvabhedapratItimabhibhUya visheShapratItiH svakAryaM kathaM kuryAt.h, karoti chedabhedapratItirapi visheShapratItimabhibhUya svakAryaM kathaM na syAt.h | maivam.h | nahi pratItirastItyeva vyavahAraH kintu prayojane.api sati | prayojanaM cha sAmAnAdhikaraNyavyavahAreNaiva bahulaM lokavedayoH | yadA tvabhedavyavahAraH prayojanavAMstadA so.api dR^ishyata eva yathA vij~nAnamAnandaM brahmetyAdi | 
yadvA visheShaH pratyakShArthApattisiddha ityukttam.h | tatkathamityataH pratyakShasiddhatAM tAvadupapAdayati- abhedeneti || anukttasamuchchayArthashchashabdaH | padArtha ityekavachanaM jAtiviShayam.h asti yatastasmAtsA savisheShA.avasIyata iti yojanA | tatashchAyamarthaH | asti tAvadavayavAvayavyAdipadArthasArthe.abhedena pratItiH | kuNDabadarAdipratItito.asyA vyAvR^ittatayA.adhyavasAyAt.h | nacha abhedamantareNa vyAvR^ittiheturasti | ato.asati nimittAntare sammatabhedavastvantarapratItito vyAvR^itteyamabheda eva vishrAmyatIti | asti cha tathA.api sAmAnAdhikaraNyAdivyavahAraH | tatra yadIyamabhedamAtraviShayA syAttadA na sAmAnAdhikaraNyAdivyavahAraM kuryAt.h | ghaTaH kalasha iti vyavahArAdarshanAt.h | tato j~nAyate.adhiko.api viShayo.asyA vidyata iti | nacha bhedo.asAviti vAchyam.h | bhedAbhedavAde.apyanto visheShasyAN^gIkAryatvAt.h | tathA cheyamabhedapratItirindriyajA savisheShAvasIyata iti |
prAgukttaM samavAye visheSho.aN^gI(kartavya)kriyata iti tanna tAvadeva | kintu sarveShvapi padArtheShviti darshayanvisheShasya vyavahArAnyathA.anupapattisiddhatAM chopapAdayati- sAmAnyAdIti ||
tanniShThatvAdayo vyakttiniShThatvAdayaH | kathamityAkShepe | vastvaikye.api dharmaikye.api | kuto na nivAryata ityata ukttam.h- vAdibhiriti || avisaMvAdivyavahArasiddhatvAditi yAvat.h | 
etadeva prapaJNchayati- kAryasyeti ||
asti tAvadavayavino.avayavaniShThatvaM nAma dharmaH | guNAnAM keShAJNchidrUpAdInAmAshrayavyApitvam.h keShAJNchitsaMyogAdInAM pradeshavR^ittitvam, rUpAdInAmudbhUtatvam.h, sarveShAM chaturviMshatitvam.h karmaNashcha AshrayavyApitvamanityatvaM paJNchatvaM mUrtaniShThatvam.h, sAmAnyasyApi dravyaguNakarmaniShThatvam.h, nityatvamanugatatvam.h, dvividhatvamityatibahulo.ayaM padArthadharmasamUhaH | na chAyamAshrayato bhinna eveti yukttam.h | asti cha dharmadhamyarAdivyavahAraH | tantuShu paTaH, pa(gha)To na bhavati gha(pa)Ta ityAdiH | sa chAyamatyantAbhede.anupapadyamAnaH svopapAdakaM visheShamavagamayatIti sarvapadArtheShu kathaM visheSho naivAsti | 
satyam.h | santyeva dravyAdiShu saptasvapi padArtheShu te te dharmAH | kinnAmAshrayato bhinnA eva | tathAcha tatsambandhanibandhanatayaivopapadyamAno vyavahAraH sarvapadArtheShu na visheShamAkSheptumalamityAshayena shaN^kate- sa cheti ||
na kevalaM guNAdi dravyAdito bhinnam.h | kintu saH tattanniShThatvAdidharmashcha aparaH svAshrayAdbhinno yadyaN^gIkriyata ityarthaH | nirAkaroti- ShaDiti ||
tarhi dharmANAM ShaD.hbhyaH padArthebhyo.atirekaH syAt.h | tathAcha ShaDeva padArthA sati niyamo bhajyeteti |
nanu svAshrayato vibhinnA api dharmA na Sha(D.hbhyaH)T.hpadArthebhyo.atirichyante | kintu ta evAnyonyavisheShaNIbhUtA dharmA ityuchyante | yathA.a.aha "yadyapi dharmAH ShaT.hpadArthebhyo na vyatirichyante | kintu ta evAnyonyApekShayA dharmadharmiNashcha bhavanti' itrata | anyatrApi "teShAM dharmAsta eva parasparaM visheShaNIbhUtAH' iti | tatkathaM niyamabhaN^ga iti | maivam.h | tanniShThatvAdInAM ShaT.hsu padArtheShvantarbhAvayitumashakyatvAt.h | tathAhi | "AshritatvaM chAnyatra nityadravyebhyaH' ityabhyupagataM kAryadravyaguNakarmasAmAnyavisheShasamavAyAnAmavayavAdiniShThatvaM na tAvad.hdravyAdikam.h | guNAdivR^ittyanupapatteH | nApi samavAyaH tasya svavR^ittyanupapatteH | kiJNchAdhAryAdhArabhUtayoH sambandhaH samavAya iShyate | tathAcha kathaM sa evAdhAritvamAdhAratvaM cha syAt.h | tathA rUpAdInAmAshrayavyApitvaM na dravyAdiShvantarbhavati | teShAM guNavR^itttivAsambhavAt.h | samavAyastUkttarItyA nirastaH | api cha vR^ittitvamAtraM samavAyaH | vyApyavR^ittitvaM tvatirikttaM nirvakttavya(rvAchya)m.h | kR^itsne svAshraye samavAyastaditi chenna | dravyasyAsamuditatvena kR^itsnatvAdyanavakAshAt.h | svabhAvena sahAnavasthAnaM vyApyavR^ittitvamiti chenna | tasyApyantarbhAvyatvAt.h | abhAvo.asAviti chenna | nirAkariShyamANatvAt.h | 
evaM saMyogAdInAM pradeshavR^ittitvaM nirastam.h | udbhUtatvaM cha na jAtivisheShaH | rUpatvAdinA parAparabhAvAnupapatteH | yadi hi rUpatvaM paraM syAttadA sparshasyodbhUtatvaM na syAt.h | yadi chodbhUtatvaM paraM bhavettadA sarvamapi rUpamudbhUtamiti chakShurAderapi pratItiH syAt.h | 
chaturviMshatitvaM cha na saN^khayA, guNAnAM nirguNatvAN^gIkArAt.h | upachAro.ayamiti chenna | nimittAbhAvAt.h | na tAvadekAtharsamavAyo nimittam.h | dravye chaturviMshatitvaniyamAbhAvAt.h | pratyekaM rUpAdiShu tatprasaN^gAchcha | aparyAyachaturviMshatishabdavAchyatvamiti chenna | shabde.api chaturviMshatitvAbhAvAt.h | chaturviMshatipuruShochchAritAparyAyashabdavAchyatvamiti chenna | badhirAdInAM rUpAdiShu saN^khayAvyavahArAbhAvaprasaN^gAt.h | evamanyeShAmapi dharmANAmantarbhAvo nirasanIyaH | 
kashchidAha | dharmapadArtho.abhAve.antarbhavatIti | tadasat.h | niShedhabuuddhibodhyatvAbhAvAt.h | abhAve.abhAvAnaN^gIkAreNa taddharmANAmabhAvatvAyogAchcha | dravyAdiShaD.hlakShaNashanyatamarAhityamabhAvatvam.h | natu niShedhabuddhibodhyatvamiti chenna | lokapratItimavadhUya svakalpanAdaraNe dravyameva bhAvAstallakShaNarahito.abhAva ityapi kalpanAprasaN^gAt.h | atastattanniShThatvAdayo dravyAdidharmAstadAtmAna evAN^gIkAyarAH | tathAchAha "bhAvasya svarUpamevAvasthAbhedenAstitvaM j~neyatvamabhidheyatvaM chochyate' iti | nacha visheShamapahAyAvasthAbhedaH shakyanirUpaNaH | 
nanu dharmA dharmito bhinnA eva | nachokttadoShaH | naiyAyikAdibhiH paramANvArambhavAdibhiH ShaDeva padArthA iti niyamasyAnaN^gIkR^itatvAt.h | dharmapadArthasya pR^ithagaN^gIkR^itatvAchcha | tathAcha bhinnadharmasaMsargavashAtsarvavyavahAropapattau na tadanyathA.anupapattyA visheShasiddhirityata Aha- padArtheti ||
padArthAnAM ShaDeveti niyamAbhAvapakShe.api hi yasmAddharmasya dharmasantAnAdanavasthAyA Akaro bhavedayaM pakShaH, tasmAddharmadharmANAmAshrayAbhede.avashyamaN^gIkArye tatra dharmadharmyAdivyavahArAnyathA.anupapattyA visheSho.aN^gIkaraNIya iti yojyam.h | khaniH AkaraH  |
etadukttaM bhavati | dharmapadArthaM dravyAdibhyo bhinnamabhyupagachChanpraShyavyaH | astitvAdidharmeShvapyastitvAdikamasti na vA | neti pakShe.anubhavavirodhaH | astitvaM na j~neyaM nAbhidheyamiti svakriyAvirodhashcha | anyathA dravyAdiShvapi tadabhAvApattiH | Adye tadAshrayato bhinnamabhinnaM vA | Adye tatrApyastitvAdyantaramityanavasthA syAt.h | dvitIye tvasti tAvattatrApi dharmadharmyAdivyavahAraH | sa chAnupapadyamAno visheShaM gamayatIti | kiJNcha dharmagatA dharmA yadi AshrayAbhinnAstadA kiM dravyAdigatAstitvAdidharmairaparAddham.h | yena te dravyAdito bhidyeran.h | yogakShemasAmyAt.h | tatasteShAmeva dravyAdyabhede sati punarvyavahArAnyathA.anupapattyA dravyAdiShveva visheShasiddhiH (iti) | 
nanvastyeva dravyAdidharmeShvastitvAdiShvapyastitvAdikam.h | tachchAshrayato bhinnameva | nachaivaM dharmasyAnavadhikadharmasantAnAdanavasthAdoShaH | utpattij~naptipratibandhakatvAbhAvenAdoShatvAt.h | yathA.a.ahuH "mUlakShayakarIM prAhuranavasthAM hi dUShaNam.h' iti | yadarthamuttarottarAnusaraNaM tanmUlamutpattirj~naptirvA | tato bhinnanimittatayopapadyamAno vyavahAro na visheShamAkSheptumalamityata Aha- sAmAnyasyApIti ||
sAmAnyasya gotvAdeH, sAmAnyaM sattAlakShaNam.h | guNasya cha rUpAdeH, saN^khayApR^ithaktavAdiguNaH ata anavasthAbhayAdeva hi nAN^gIkR^itaH | 
ayamAshayaH | sAmAnyasyApi sAmAnyaM tAvatpareNa nAN^gIkR^itam.h | tathA guNasyApi guNo nAN^gIkR^itaH | tatkasmAditi vakttavyam.h | na tAvatpratItyabhAvAt.h | sadgotvaM chaturviMshatiguNA rUpAdrasaH pR^ithagiti pratibhAsasya durapahnavatvAt.h | nacha na sadgotvamityAdi bAdhakamasti yena pratItasyApi parityAgaH | gotvaM na sattAvadaparasAmAnyashUnyatvAdvisheShavat.h, guNA na guNavanto.adravyatvAtkriyAvadityAdibAdhakamastIti chenna | vipakShe bAdhakAbhAvenAprayojakatvAt.h | dR^iShTAntayoH(shcha)sAdhyavikalatvAchcha | yadi gotvAdau sattA syAttadA sattAyAmapi syAt.h | tathA chAtmAshrayatvamiti chenna | sattAntaratvopapatteH | kiJNcha pratIteH kimAtmAshrayatA kariShyati | anyathA prameyatvAdInAM kevalAnvayitvaM na syAt.h | AtmAshrayabhayAdyataH prameyatvAdivyAvR^ittiH tasyaiva vipakShatvAt.h | ukttaM cha "kathaM svavR^ittiriShyA chedyathA.anyatreti gR^ihyatAm.h | pramANaM sharaNaM vR^ittau na bhinnAbhinnateyatA' iti | guNAnAmapi guNavattve dravyalakShaNayogAd.hdravyatApattiriti chenna | pratItimanuruddhaya lakShaNAntarasya kartavyatvAt.h | tasmAtsAmAnye sAmAnyaM guNe cha guNaH anavasthAbhayAdeva nAN^gIkriyata ityeva vakttavyam.h | yathA.a.aha "vyaktterabhedastulyatvaM saN^karo.athAnavasthitiH | rUpahAnirasambandho jAtibAdhakasaN^grahaH' iti | nachAnavachChinnA sAmAnyaparamparA guNaparamparA chotpattij~naptipratibandhe hetuH | tathAcha yathA sA dUShaNaM tathA prakR^itA.api dUShaNameva | na chetsA.api na syAditi sAmAnyAderapi sAmAnyAdyaN^gIkAryaM syAt.h | yadi kathaJNchijj~naptipratibandhakatvaM tatra vyutpadyeta | tarhi vayamapyatra tad.hvyutpAdayiShyAma iti |
yadi kashchidvaiyAtyAdbrUyAt.h | astyeva sAmAnyasyApi sAmAnyaM guNasyApi guNo nirbAdhapratItisiddhatvAt.h | astyeva sAmAnyasyApi sAmAnyaM guNasyApi guNo nirbAdhapratItisiddhatvAt.h | utpattij~naptyapratibandhahetoranavasthAyA doShatvAyogAt.h | ato naitannyAyena dharmaparamparA.anavasthAbhayAnnivAraNIyeti | tatrAha- sa cheti ||
sa cha guNasyApi guNaH | chashabdAtsAmAnyasyApi sAmAnyaM yadyaN^gIkriyate tadA brUmo nAnavasthA kvachidbhavediti | 
ayamAshayaH | evaM vadankvachidanavasthAdUShaNamaN^gIkaroti na veti vAchyam.h | nachet.h dUShaNAntaramapi nAN^gIkuryAt.h | avisheShAt.h | tathAcha kathAyAM nAdhikArI syAt.h | nAdyaH | dharmasAmAnyaguNAnavasthAyA adUShaNatve vimatAyA api dUShaNatvAyogAt.h | visheShahetorabhAvAt.h | 
nanvaparyavasitaparamparAmAtrasAmye.api yatrotpattyAdipratibandhakatvaM tatra dUShaNatvam.h | yatra yadabhAvastatrAdUShaNatvamiti chet.h | kimarthamutpattyAdipratibandhakatvamanusaraNIyam.h | anavasthA hi tarkavisheShaH | tarkashchAniShyaprasaJNjanam.h | utpattyAdipratibandhashchAniShyaH | prAmANikaparityAgarUpatvAt.h | utpattyAdeH prAmANikatvAt.h | atastadapratibandhe tarkatvAyogAtkathaM dUShaNAntaram.h | evameva dUShaNatve.atiprasaN^ga ita chet.h | kiM prAmANikaparityAga evAniShya utAprAmANikasvIkAro.api | nAdyaH | niyAmakAbhAvAt.h | dvitIye kathaM na prakR^itAnavasthA dUShaNam.h | atyantabhinnadharmaparamparAyA apyaprAmANikatvAt.h | athAprAmANikasvIkAro na dUShaNam.h | tarhi prAmANikaparityAgo.api na (dUShaNaM) syAditi nAnavasthA kvachid.hdUShaNaM bhavet.h | athAniShyApattiheturanavasthAdUShaNam.h | na punaraniShyarUpeti chenna | aniShyarUpaivAnavasthA dUShaNam.h | natvaniShyApattiheturityapi vakttuM shakyatvena kvachidaN^gIkR^itA.apyanavasthA na dUShaNaM bhavet.h | tasmAtprAmANikaparityAgAprAmANikaparigraharUpA vA taddheturvA.anavachChinnaparamparA.anavastheti vAchyam.h | ata eva nAtiprasaN^gaH | tathAcha dharmaparamparAyA apyanavasthAtvenAbheda evAN^gIkAryaH | evaM chokttanyAyena vyavahArAnyathA.anupapattyA visheShasiddhiriti | 
api cha yo dharmadharmiNobharedaM samavAyaM chAN^gIkR^ityAbhedaM visheShaM chAvajAnAti tenAnavasthAto bibhyatA guNasAmAnyayorguNasAmAnyapratItirevApalapanIyA | vinaiva bAdhakena bhrAntirvA vAchyA | pratItyapalApAdito vA bibhyato.anavasthA syAdityekaM sandhitsato.anya(tpra)chchyavate | abhedaM visheShaM chAN^gIkurvatAM tu nedaM dUShaNadvayamato.api tatpakShapAta ityAshayavAnAha- asmatpakSha iti ||
dharmadharmiNoH savisheShAbhedavAdinAM pakSha ityarthaH | guNAdyA guNAH sAmAnyAni cha | tadvanto guNavantaH | sAmAnyavanti cha | tena chaturviMshatiguNAH sadgotvamityAdipratItivirodho nAstIti sheShaH | ananyatvAt.h dharmadharmiNoriti sheShaH | aprAmANikAparyavasitaparamparArUpA hyeShA | ananyatve kathaM tadvR^ittamiti tadavasthaH pratItivirodha ityata ukttam.h- visheShato hi tadvanta iti || bhedasambandhakAryakArI hi visheSha iti | 
evamavayavAvayavyAdInAmabhedo.atra nirUpitaH | idAnIM kvachidbhedAbhedAvapi bhavata iti tadapavAdamAha- bheda iti ||
eyadvA yadyavayavyAdayo.avayavAdyabhinnAH | kathaM tarhi satsvevAvayavAdiShu vinashyantItyata Aha- bheda iti || 
tathAshabdaH samuchchaye | avayavAdiShu satsvevAvayavyAdInAM nAshe bhedo.abhedashcha bhavedityarthaH | atra nAsha ityupalakShaNam.h | yatra satsvevAvayaveShvavayavino.abhAvaH sati guNini guNasyAbhAvastatra bhedAbhedAvityAdi draShyavyam.h | anyathA yatrAvayavAvayavyAdInAM yugapadvinAshastatra bhedAbhedAvukttau na syAtAm.h | 
idamukttaM bhavati | satyapi tasminnasattvAdityanena hetunA.avayavyAdInAmavayavAdibhyo bhedamAtraM vA sAdhyate.atyantabhedo vA | Adye siddhasAdhanatA bhAgAsiddhishcha | tathAhi | satyapyu(tyu)pAdAne kadAchidupAdeyamasat.h | yathA paTaH | evaM satyapi dravye kechidguNA asanto yathA pAkajAdayaH | tathA satyapyA(tyevA)shraye kAshchitkriyA asatyo yathA paTachalanAdayaH | jAtishcha kAchitsati jAtimatyasatI | yathA brAhmaNam.h | tatra bhedAbhedayoraN^gIkArAdbhedasAdhanaM siddhaviShayam.h | gaganatadbhAgayorIshvarAdyAshritaj~nAnAdiguNakriyAjAtiShvabhAvAdbhAgAsiddhatvaM  hetoH iti | na dvitIyaH | kAlAtyayApadiShyatvAt.h | abhedasya prAgupapAditatvAdupapAdayiShyamANatvAchcheti | 
syAdetat.h | yathA bhedasAdhakAnAM vyapadeshabhedAdInAM visheShAshrayeNaivAnyathAsiddhirukttA | tathA satyapi tasminnasattvasyApi visheShaNaiva nirvAhaH kriyatAm.h | kiM bhedAbhedAbhyupagamena | maivam.h | visheShasya bhedakAryavyavahAramAtranirvAhakatvena vinAshaM pratyanirvAhakatvAt.h | sakalabhedakAyarkAritve visheSho bheda eva, na tatpratinidhiH syAt.h | kiJNchAnekAshritasyAvayavino dvitvAdeshchAshrayeNAtyAntAbhede satyAshrayaNAmapi parasparamabhedaH prasajyate | tatparihArArthaM tAvadavashyaM tatra bhedo.aN^gIkaraNIyaH | nachAvachChedakena vinA bhedAbhedabhUmeH saN^grahaH syAdityayAvadAshrayabhAvitvameva grAhyam.h | tatrApi visheSha eva saN^karaM vArayiShyatIti tu nirastam.h | kiJNcha pramANAnusAriNakSha vyavasthA natu svechChAnusAriNI | pramANaM tu bhedAbhedAvavagAhata iti vakShyate | nanu anityadravyAshritA ekatvAdayo.api guNAH kiM bhedavantasteShAmapi dravyakAryatayA taduttarakShaNabhAvitvAditi | maivam.h | ukttottaratvAt.h | ukttaM hyetat.h | upAdAnadravyaM guNavadupAdeyatayA pariNamata iti |
nanu bhedAbhedAvekatra viruddhau | tatkathamayAvadAshrayabhAvinAmavayaviguNakamarsAmAnyAnAmavayavAdibhirbhedArbhedAbhyupagama ityata Aha- visheShameveti ||
bhedAbhedAvekatra bhavata iti sambandhaH | avadhAraNaM kAlAdibhedavyAvR^ittyartham.h | 
kathaM visheShAshrayaNe virodhashAntirityata Aha- virodha iti ||
balavAnbhedakAryakAraNa iti sheShaH | tato visheShaM samAshrityaikatra bhedAbhedau bhavata ityanvayaH | ayamarthaH | bhedo hi virodhashAntihetuH | tathAhi | kvachidAshrayabhedo yathA madhurAyAM devadattasadbhAvaH srughne tadabhAvaH | kvachitkAlAbhedo yathA madhurAyAmeva devadattasya bhAvAbhAvau | kvachitpratiyogibhedo yathA gavayo goghaTAbhyAM sadR^isho visadR^ishashcheti | bhedapratinidhishcha visheSha ityukttam.h | ataH kathamasau bhedAbhedAvekadaivaikatraiva nAvasthApayediti | 
evaM tarhyatiprasaN^gaH | sarvatra visheShamAshritya virodhasyotsAdayituM shakyatvAdityata Aha- dR^iShTIti || 
dR^iShTishcha tatpramANaM cha | pramANabhUtA dR^iShTirityarthaH | tato bhedAbhedau na viruddhAviti sambandhaH | chashabdo visheSheNa saha dR^iShTeH samuchchaye | na svechChAmAtreNa bhedAbhedAvityupetya visheSheNa virodhAbhAvo.abhidhIyate | yenAtiprasaN^gaH syAdityevashabdaH | ukttaM tAvadavayavAvayavyAdyabhedagrAhiNI dR^iShTirasti | sambaddhavastubuddhito vilakShaNatayA.anuvyavasAyAt.h | asti cha bhedagrAhiNI satyapi tasminnasattvAditi hetujanitA dR^iShTiriti | nachaite bAdhyabAdhake | anyatarAnanuvR^ittiprasaN^gAt.h | nApi pratipakShabhUte | pratipattR^iNAmubhayodAsInatApatteH | chaivam.h na | ato dvayorapi prAmANyatashcha bhedAbhedayoravagatayonar virodhaH | tadidamukttam.h- pramANata iti ||
nanu bha(va)vetAM bhedAbhedavekatraivaikadeva pramitau | tathA.api kathaM virodhashAntirityata Aha- virodha iti || 
sahadarshane sati kathaM virodho vakttuM shakyate | sahadR^iShTau viruddhau cheti vipratiShiddhamiti bhAvaH | 
etadeva vivR^iNoti- virodho hIti ||
sarvatra parasparaparihAreNaiva sattvadarshanaM mahAnavasthAnalakShaNavirodhe pramANam.h | kvachitsahadarshanaM chAvirodhe | anyasyAnirUpaNAt.h | ataH sahadR^iShTe bhedAbhedalakShaNe vastudvaye virodhaH kathamuchyeta | sahadarshane hyavirodhaH syAt.h | punarvirodhakathane vyAghAtAnivAraNAditi | hishabdena shItoShNAdau rUparasAdau cha virodhAvirodhayordarshanaikapramANatvaM nidarshayati | tushabdasya dR^iShTe 
tviti sambandhaH | sadbhirvidvadbhirityupahAsaH | vaisheShikAdayo hi saMyogavibhAgashabdAtmavisheShaguNAnAM tatraiva tadaiva bhAvAbhAvAvupetya sahadarshanAdvirodho nAstIti vadantaH punaratra sahadarshane.api virodhamudbhAvayantaH svavyAhatabhAShiNaH svokttavismaraNashIlAH svadR^iShTipakShapAtinaH kathaM santaH syuH | sarvatrAsahadR^iShTayoryadi kashchidAgrahamAtreNa sahAvasthAnaM manyate taM pratyeva virodhodbhAvanaM kriyate- nAnyatheti ||
dharmadharmiNorbhedAbhedau kvachiditi saN^kShepeNokttam.h | tatkiM sarveShvapi dravyeShUta keShuchidevetyapekShAyAmAha- abhinna iti ||
bhagavAniti chetanamAtropalakShaNam.h | svena svAvayavaguNakriyAdibhiH | tadanyena prakR^itijIvajaDAtmanA prapaJNchenetyevaM vyavasthitAveva bhedAbhedau na tvekaviShayAvityarthaH | ayAvaddravyabhAvidharmairbhedAbhedau kuto na syAtAmityata Aha- nityA iti || 
tushabdo.avadhAraNe | asmAt.h kAraNam.h | asmAt.h bhagavataH | dvitvAdisaN^khayAvyatirikttA iti sheShaH | 
kva tarhi bhedAbhedAvityata Aha- sAmastyeti ||
anyatra parameshvarAt.h | jaDe vastunIti yAvat.h | satyeva dhamirNi sAmastyenochChedavanto ye dharmAste ubhayarUpiNo bhinnAbhinnA ityarthaH | abhibhavavyAvR^ittyarthaM sAmastyetyukttam.h | yadvA sAmastye dravyasyAvikalatve nAshAbhAve.api ye uchChedina iti vyAkhyeyam.h | kiM svasadbhAvavelAyAmabhedino.asadbhAvavelAyAM bhedina ityevaM kAlabhedena bhedAbhedAvityata ukttam.h- bhAva iti || svasadbhAvadashAyAmevobhayarUpakA ityarthaH | vinaShyasyAsattvena bhedachintAnavakAshAt.h | prAgatyantAbhede vinAshAsambhavAchcha | kuto bhinnAbhinnA ityata Aha- ta eveti ||
pratyakShabalena ta eva dharmisvarUpabhUtA eva uchChedAt.h satyeva dharmiNyasattvAddhetostadanye | chashabdau mithaH samuchchayArthau | samastasha ityayAvaddravyabhAvivivakShayokttam.h | 
yadukttaM yAvadavayavabhAvino.avayavino.avayavairatyantAbhedo.ayAvadavayavabhAvinastu bhedAbhedAviti | tenAnyadapi chodyaM parihR^itamityAha- aMshAMshinoriti || 
tathA hi | sarvadikShvapi sambandhAditi yadaMshataH saMyoga ityukttaM tadayukttam.h | anavasthApatteH | ghaTasaMyogo hi ghaTAMshasaMyogapUrvakaH | so.api tadaMshasaMyogapUrvakaH | nacheyaM niraMshe paramparA vishrAmyatIti vAchyam.h | aMshaparamparAyA avishramasyApyaN^gIkR^itatvAt.h | ataH pUrvapUrvasaMyogAnutpattAvuttarottarAnutpattiprasaN^gAdaMshataH saMyoga iti niyamo nopapadyata iti | tadidamasaN^gatam.h | yadyapyaMshata eva saMyogo yadyapi chAMsheShvaMshaparamparAyA avishramastathA.apyaMshAMshinorabhede naivAMshasaMyoga eva hi yasmAdaMshinaH saMyogo.ato nAnavastheti | 
ayamabhisandhiH | syAdiyamanavasthA yadi sarvatrAMshata eva saMyoga iti vadatAmasmAkamaMshinaH saMyogoM.ashasaMyogenaiva jAyata ityabhiprAyaH syAt.h | nachaivam.h | kintu yo yasya aMshinaH saMyogaH sa tadaMshe vartate | niraMshasya tu saMyogaH kva nAma vartatAm.h | ataH paramANvoH saMyoge sati tad.hvR^ittyarthamaMsho.aN^gIkaraNIya iti | na hyevaM sati kAchidanavasthA.asti | anavasthitakAryakAraNabhUtAsiddhasaMyogaparamparAshrayaNAbhAvAt.h | etAvattu bhavet.h | ghaTasaMyogaH syAt.h | pramANavirodhAchcha | ghaTasaMyogo ghaTavR^ittirapi ghaTasaMyogaH syAt.h | pramANavirodhAchcha | ghaTasaMyogo ghaTavR^ittistadguNatvAttadrUpavaditi | ghaTAMshavR^ittiH saMyogo na ghaTasaMyogaH tadanyavR^ittitvAt.h | paTasaMyogavaditi | etadapyanavakAsham.h | aMshAMshinorabhedasya sAdhitatvAt.h | atiprasaN^go hi tadA syAdyadi paTavadghaTAMsho.api ghaTAdatyantabhinnaH syAt.h | abhede tu kvAtiprasaN^gaH | anumAnasyApyAdyasya siddhasAdhanatA | aMshavR^ittereva ghaTavR^ittitvAt.h | aMshAvR^ittitve sati ghaTavR^ittitvasAdhane dR^iShTAntaH sAdhyavikalaH syAt.h | dvitIyastu hetuH svarUpAsiddho.anyathAsiddho veti | yadi ghaTasaMyogo ghaTAMshe vartate tarhi ghaTAMshasaMyogaH kva vartata iti chet.h | anena (eva) nyAyena tadaMshe so.api tadaMsha iti brUmaH | nachaivamanavasthA | sarve.apyaMshisaMyogAstattadaMshavR^ittaya ityatretarApekShAyA abhAvAt.h | 
evaM tarhi paramANuvR^ittirapi saMyogo ghaTasaMyogaH syAditi chet.h | ko netyAheti | aMshasaMyoga eva hyaMshinaH saMyogo.ato nAnavasthetyukttamanavasthAparihAraM vivR^iNoti- ekasminniti ||
avayavaparamparAyA avishramamabhyupagamyaikaikasminnavayavasaMyoge jAta evAnyo.avayavasaMyogo jAyata iti yadyaN^gIkurmastadaivAnavasthA syAt.h | saMyogaikye avayavisaMyogaH kriyAto jAtastadavayave vartate, avayavavR^itteH saMyogAdaparo.avayavinaH saMyogo nAstIti vAde tu, kva sA.anavastheti | 
etenaitadapi nirastam.h | yadAhuH | saMyogastrividho.anyatarakarmajobhayakarmajasaMyogajabhedAt.h | tatrAnyatarakarmajo yaH kriyAvatA niShkriyasya, yathA sthANoH shyenena | ubhayakarmajastu viruddhadik.hkriyayoH sannipAto, yathA mallayoH | saMyogajastu saMyogaH 
kAraNAkAraNasaMyogAtkAryAkAryasaMyogo, yathA hastatarusaMyogAtkAyatarusaMyoga iti |
nahi hastatarusaMyogAtirikttaH kAyatarusaMyogo.asti | yenA.asau tajjanyaH syAt.h | pramANAbhAvAt.h | kintu hastakarmaNA janito hastavR^ittiH saMyoga eva hastakAyayorabhedAtkAyasaMyogo bhavati |
ata eva hastasyAshuchisaMyoge kAyakShAlanAdividhayo.apyupapadyate | 
ata eva vibhAgajo.api vibhAgo nirastaH |
dvividhaM hi tamAchakShate | kAraNAkAraNavibhAgAtkAraNavibhAgAchcheti | tatrAdyo yathA | hastataruvibhAgAtkAyataruvibhAgaH | dvitIyo yathA | dvitantukAvayave tantau karmotpannaM tasya tantvantarAdvibhAgaM karoti | vibhAgAttantvoH saMyogo nashyati | tato dvitantukavinAshaH | tata idAnIM tantvorvartamAno vibhAgaH sakriyasyAvayavasya dvitantukasaMyukttAkAshAdideshAdvibhAgaM karotIti | 
tatrAdyastAvadanupapannaH | hastataruvibhAgAtirikttasya kAyataruvibhAgasyAnupalambhAt.h | hastakarmaNA janito hi vibhAgo hastakAyayorabhedAddhastakAyaguNo bhavati | ata eva vivAdAdhyAsito vibhAgo na karmAsamavAyikAraNakaH karmaikArthAsamavetatvAt.h | shabdavaditayasiddhatayA nirastam.h | 
dvitIyastvanupapannataraH  | tantukarmaNaiva tantostantvantarAdAkAshAdideshAchcha vibhAgotpattyupapattau kramakalpanAnupapatteH | anyathAN^gulikarmaNAN^guleraN^gulyantarAdeva vibhAgo bhavati AkAshAdideshAttu vibhAgAdeveti syAt.h | 
nanvaN^gulikarma aN^gulivibhAgamAkAshAdivibhAgaM cha karoti | tayorvibhAgayoraviruddhatvAt.h | tantukarma tu tantvantaravibhAgamAkAshAdivibhAgaM (cha) na kartumarhati | tayorvibhAgayoH dravyArambhakasaMyogavirodhitvAvirodhitvarUpavirodhAt.h | nahyaviruddhAtkAraNAdviruddhakAryotpattiH sambhavatIti | maivam.h | ekasmAdeva karmaNaH saMyogavibhAgajananAbhyupagamAt.h | tantukarmarA dravyArambhakAnArambhakatantvantarAkAshasaMyogajanmAN^gIkArAchcha | anyathA kAraNAkAraNasaMyogajasaMyogavatkAraNamAtrasaMyogajo.api saMyogaH svIkAryaH syAt.h | 
nanu saMyogasya na svarUpato virodho.asti | yato dravyAnArambhakadravyasamaveta eva saMyogo dravyAnArambhakaH | dravyAnArambhakaM cha dravyaM saptavidham.h | ArabdhadravyamantyAvayavisparsharahitaM vinashyadavasthaM vinashyadavasthasaMyogaM niShphalArambhaM vijAtIyaM cheti | tataH karmaNaiva saMyogadvayajanmopapattiriti | eyaM tarhi vibhAgayorapi ko virodhaH | dravyArambhAnArambhaprayukttatvAdvirodhapratIteH | tantudvayavibhAgajanakaM tantukarma na tantvAkAshavibhAgajanakaM dravyArambhakasaMyogavirodhivibhAgajanakakarmatvAt.h | dravyAnrArambhakasaMyogavirodhivibhAgajanakakarmavat.h ityAbhAsasamAnayogakShematvAt.h | tantukamar na tantvantaravibhAgajanakaM karmatvAt.h sampratipannakarmavadityapi prayogasambhavAt.h tatra pramANabAdha iti chet.h | samamanyatrApi | vibhAgadvayayaugapadyAnubhavAt.h | tantukarma AkAshavibhAgajanakaM karmatvAditi pratipakShashcha | AkAshavibhAge vibhAgena kartavye karmaNo nimittatvAbhyupagamAtsiddhasAdhanamiti chenna | janakashabdasyAsamavAyyarthatvAt.h | 
etena vimataM karma dravyArambhakasaMyogavirodhitadavirodhivibhAgajanakaM na bhavati karmatvAditi nirastam.h | vimataM karma dravyArambhakAnArambhakasaMyogArambhakaM na bhavati karmatvAt.h | shyenakarmavadityAbhAsatulyatvAtsatpratipakShatvAchcha | yadAkAshavibhAgajanakaM kamar na tad.hdravyArambhakasaMyogavirodhivibhAgajanakaM yathAN^gulikamareti vyAptestantukarmaNo gaganavibhAgajanakatve tantvantaravibhAgajanakatvaM na syAditi chennana | yadyatpradeshavibhAgajanakaM na bhavati na tattatpradeshasthadravyavibhAgajanakamiti vyApterAkAshadeshavibhAgAjanakatve tantvantarAdapi vibhAgajanakaM na syAditi pratiprasaN^gasambhavAt.h | 
kiJNcha tantorAkAshavibhAgo yadi vibhAgajo na tu karmajastadA sakarmakasyevAkarmakasyApi kuto na syAt.h | vibhAgasyobhayatrApi sAmyAt.h | uttaravibhAge karma nimittakAraNamityato neti chenna | AdyavibhAgajananenaivopakShINasya kAraNatvAnavadhAraNAt.h | avadhAraNe vA.asamavAyitvasya anivAraNAt.h | anyathA tallakShaNasyAtivyApterityalaM vistareNa | 
evaM ChalatvenAnavasthAprasaN^gaM nirAkR^itya prakArAntareNa nirAkaroti- aMsha iti ||
aMshisaMyogasyAMshavR^ittitvadR^iShTeshcha nAnavasthAdoSha ityarthaH | dR^iShTatve kathamadoShatvamityata Aha- dR^iShTa iti ||
ApAdake.arthe dR^iShTe sati sA anavasthitiH kA na dUShaNamiti yAvat.h | etadukttaM bhavati | yadyaMshataH saMyogaH syAttadA.anavasthA syAttatashcha saMyogAbhAva evApadyeta | nachAsau yukttaH | tasmAnnAMshataH saMyoga iti hi viparyaye paryavasAnaM kartavyam.h | anavasthAyAstarkatvAt.h | viparyayAparyavasAyinashcha tarkAbhAsatvaniyamAt.h | 
atrAMshataH saMyoge na bhavatIti ko.artho yadyaMshisaMyogasyAMshasaMyogapUrvakatAniyamo nAstIti | tarhyevamiti vadAmaH | yadyaMshisaMyogoM.ashavR^ittirna bhavatIti | tanna | ghaTAdyaMshisaMyogasya tadaMshavR^ittitAyAH pratyakShadR^iShTatvena viparyayaparyavasAnasya bAdhitatvAt.h | ghaTasaMyogo ghaTa eva vartate | kintvavyApyavR^ittitvAttadaMshavR^ittirivAvabhAsata iti chet.h | keyamavyApyavR^ittitA nAma anyA aMshavR^ittitvAt.h | svAbhAvasamAnAdhikaraNatvamiti chenna | viruddhatvAt.h | dR^iShTatvAdavirodha iti chenna | kimaMshabhedena bhAvAbhAvau dR^ishyete uta ghaTa eveti sandehAt.h | na hyaviruddhaviShayatve sati viruddhaviShayatA.aN^gIkartumuchitA | upAdhibhedAdavirodha iti chet.h | ke ta upAdhayaH | aMshA eveti chet.h | ta eva santu tarhi saMyogAvAbhAvAshrayAH kimaM(shi)shavR^ittitvena viruddhena aN^gIkR^itena | aMshAMshinorabhedenAtiprasaN^gasyApAstatvAditi | 
pratitarkaparAhatatvAchchAtiprasaN^go.ayamityAha- yadIti ||
yadi kAraNAnAM saMyogastadaMshavR^ittirna syAttadA tadArabdheShu kAryeShu kAraNApekShayA parimANotkarSho na syAdityarthaH | 
ayamabhisandhiH | kAraNaparimANApekShayA kArye parimANotkarShastAvatsarvatra prachayajanyaH | dvitUlake tathA darshanAt.h | prachayahInatUladvayajanyarajjudravye tadabhAvopalambhAchcha | prachayashcha kAraNayoH prashithilaH saMyogaH | prashithilatA cha saMyogasya keShuchidaMsheShu vR^ittiH keShuchidavR^ittireva | nAnyA | anirUpaNAt.h | tataH saMyogasyAMshavR^ittitvAbhAve prachayo.asau na bhavatIti kAraNAbhAvAdutkR^iShyaparimANotpAdo na syAditi | 
astvanyasya saMyogo yathAtathA | prastute paramANau saMyogasyAMshavR^ittitvAbhAve nAtiprasaN^ga iti chenna | anvayavyatirekAbhyAM kAraNaparimANotkR^iShyasya kAryaparimANasya prachayAkhyAMshavR^ittisaMyogajatvAvadhAraNAtkAraNAbhAve cha kAryAbhAvaniyamAtparamANusaMyogasyAMshavR^ittitvAbhAve tatkArye dvayaNuke paramANuparimANAdutkR^iShyaparimANaM notpadyetetyasyaiva bAdhakasya sattvAt.h | nanvidamiShyApAdanam.h | paramANuto dvayaNuke parimANotkarShAbhAvAdityata Aha- paramANoriti || 
paramANuparimANAdaNodvaryaNukasya mahattA parimANotkarSho nAstIti vacho.adbhutaM svavyAhataM pramANaviruddhaM chetyarthaH | ayamADhyo.ayaM paramADhya itivadaNuparamANushabdAbhyAmeva parimANatAratamyAvagatestadabhAvavachanaM svavyAhataM bhavati | dvitantukaparimANavada(saMmR^idi)samuditAvayavajanyadravyaparimANatvena dvayaNukaparimANasya paramANuparimANAdutkarShasyAnumAnAvagatvAchcheti |
nanu yat.h kAraNaparimANajanyamutkR^iShyaparimANaM tadeva prachayajanmay.h | tyaNukaparimANavad.hdvayaNukaparimANamapi kAraNaparimANajanyaM na bhavati | kintu kAraNasaMkhyAjanyameva | tatkathaM paramANoH prachayAbhAve dvayaNuke parimANotkarShAnutpAdApAdanamityata Aha- aNUnAmiti || 
dvayaNukAnAM parimANotkarShApekShAM vinaiva saMkhyAmAtreNa tyaNuke sa parimANotkarSho jAyate | tathA paramANormahattvaM parimANotkarShaM vinA kevalasaMkhyayA dvayaNuke parimANotkaSharo jAyata ityetadvachaH kathaM ghaTate | mahaddIrghavadveti nirastatvAditi bhAvaH | chApishabdAvitaretarasamuchchaye | atra parimANamAtragrahaNe kartavye prathimeti mahattvamiti chokttirvisadR^ishaparimAratvasyAnapekShAhetoH nirAkaraNaM smArayitumiti | 
aMshAMshinoratyantAbhedo bhedAbhedau cheti yadukttaM tadvishadayati- aMshina iti || 
yathA gaganAderyAvadaMshabhAvinoM.ashinaH svAMshairatyantAbhedastathA paTAderaMshino.api sarvairaMshaiH atyantAbhedaH ekaikAMshena tu bhidAbhidA | ayamityuttaravAkyena sambaddhayate | 
nanvetadayukttam.h | sarvatantubhAve.api kadAchitpaTasyAbhAvAt.h | khaNDite bhedAbhedasvIkArAt.h | ata ekenaiva savarairapi paTasya bhedAbhedAvevopachitau | tathAchokttaM brahmatarke | "tantubhyo.anyaH paTaH sAkShAtkasya dR^iShTipathaM gataH | ananyashchettantubhAve paTAbhAvaH kuto bhavet.h' iti | uchyate | vyatiShaN^gavishiShyA hi tantavo.avagamyate | nacha tadbhAve kadA.api paTAbhAvaH | tasmAdvayatiShaN^gavisheShavishiShyaiH sarvatantubhiH paTasyAtyantAbheda eva | avivakShitavyatiShaN^gaiH sarvatantubhistu bhedAbhedAveveti na kashchidvirodhaH | 
nanvevaM tarhi vyatiShakttatantuvyatirekeNa paTAbhAve paramANupuJNjavAdApattiriti | maivam.h | yathA hi guNAnAM dravyAbhede(.api) na dravyaM nirguNam.h | yathA cha pareShAM sAmAnyAdAvatirikttasattAbhAve(.api) nAsattvam.h | tathA vyatiShakttatantava eva paTastathA.api na paTAbhAvaH | kintu sati vyatiShakttAstantavaH paTashcha | sa cha tebhyo na bhidyate iti | kathametaditi chet.h | visheShashaktayaiveti brUmaH | 
nanu vyatiShakttasarvatantubhyo.api paTasya bhedo.aN^gIkAryaH | tantuvyatiShaN^gAnantaraM paTasya jAyamAnatvAt.h | kathaM chaikaikatantunA.abhedaH ekaikatra paTabuddhayabhAvAdityata Aha- sarveti || 
uuktto.ayamarthaH sarvapratyakShaviShayo yasmAttasmAtkathamevApodyate | etadukttaM bhavati | asti tAvadvayatiShakttasarvatantUnAM paTasya chAbhede pratyakSham.h | tatpratIteH sambaddhavastudvayapratItivailakShaNyasya sAkShisiddhatvAt.h | nacha  bhede pramANamasti | yena so.api svIkariShyate | jAyatAM nAma tantuvyatiShaN^gaM paTamAchakShmahe | kintu vyatiShaN^ge sati yattantUnAM vishiShyaM rUpam.h | nachaikaikatantuparityAge sarvatantavo nAma santi | atastatrApyastyevAbhedapratItiH | ekaikatra paTabuddhayabhAvastu bhedamAkShipati | natu pratyakShasiddhamabhedamapavadatIti |
athApi syAt.h  | avayavyAdInAmavayavAdibhirabhedo nopapadyate | eko hyavayavyaneke chAvayavAH | tadabhede.avayavAnAmapyabhedo.avayavino vA bhedaH prasajyeta | tathA guNAshcha kechidanekAshritAH | ekaiva hi saMyogvayakttirdvayordvayorvartate  | tathA vibhAgavyakttirapi | saN^khayA cha dvividhA | ekatvAnekatvabhedAt.h | tatraikatvasyaikadravyagatatve.api dvitvAdikamenekAshritam.h | evaM pR^ithaktavamapi dvividham.h | ekapR^ithaktavamanekapR^ithaktavaM cha | tatraikapR^ithaktavasyaikadravyavR^ittitve.api dvipR^ithaktavAdikamane(kadravyAshri)kAshritameva | evaMcha guNAnAM guNinaikye saMyogAdyAshrayAnekadravyAbhedo vA saMyogAdibhedo vA.a.apadyeta | sAmAnyaM chaikamanekAshritam.h | tasya vyaktayabhede vyakttInAmapyabhedaH sAmAnyasya vA bhedaH prasajyetetyataH saMyogavibhAgapR^ithaktavAnAM tAvadanekAshritatvaM nAstItyAha- saMyogashcheti ||
bheda iti pR^ithaktavamuchyate | chashabdA itaretarayoge | pR^ithakpR^ithageva ekaikadravyAshritA evetyarthaH | tatashchaikena guNenAbhinnatve dravyayorapyabhedaH syAdityatiprasaN^gasyApAdakAsiddhiH | anekadravyAbhinnatve guNasyApi bhedaH syAdityasyeShyApattirdUShaNamityukttaM bhavati |
nanu ghaTapaTasaMyogavibhAgabhedA ghaTapaTasambandhitayA.anubhUyate | tatkathamekaikAshritAH | tathAtve chaikaikasminneva saMyukttAdipratyayaprasaN^ga ityata Aha- anyonyeti ||
pratiyogaH pratiyogitvam.h | anyonyasya pratiyogo.anyonyapratiyogaH | yatsaMyogAdirubhayorapi dR^ishyate tadanyonyapratiyogena hi nimittena | atrobhayorapItyanekopalakShaNam.h | bhedasya bahusambandhitayA.api pratIteH | etadukttaM bhavati | ghaTapratiyogikaH saMyogAdiH paTe.asti | tathA paTapratiyogiko ghaTe.asti | tasmAdubhayasambandhitayA pratibhAso.atiprasaN^gAbhAvashcha yujyata iti |
syAdetadyadi saMyogAdInAmekaikavR^ittitve pramANaM syAt.h | tadeva nAstItyata Aha- anyonyeti || pR^ithak.h pR^ithagevetyanuvartate | anyonyapratiyogena hetunA saMyogAdikamubhayorapi pR^ithak.h pR^ithageva hi dR^ishyate | 
ayamarthaH | paTo ghaTena saMyuktto ghaTAdvibhaktto ghaTAdbhinna iti paTadharmaH saMyogAdigharTapratiyogikatayA pratIyate | yashcha yatpratiyogiko nAsau taddharmaH | yathA sthavirapratiyogikamaparatvaM na sthaviradharmaH | tasmAnnAyaM saMyogAdirghaTadharmaH | evaM ghaTadharmaH saMyogAdiH paTapratiyogitayopalabhyamAno na paTadharmo bhavitumarhati | tathAcha pR^ithak.h pR^ithageva saMyogAdiranekadharmo.avagamyata iti |
nanvastu saMyogavibhAgayoriyaM gatiH | natu pR^ithaktave | yaddhi ghaTAtpaTaH pR^ithak.h paTAchcha ghaTaH pR^ithagityanyonyapratiyogikatayA pratIyate tadekapR^ithaktavaM pR^ithak.h pR^ithagevAbhyupagamyate | yattu bhinnAvimau bhinnA ime iti pratIyate tadanekapR^ithaktavamanekAshritameva pratiyogyanirUpyasyaikAshrita(shraya)tve mAnAbhAvAdityata Aha- bhinnA iti ||
ime bhinnA ityAdipratItau bhedAnAM samudAyo.anekatvaM hi dR^ishyate | katham.h | yathaiva cha padArthAnAm.h | 
etadukttaM bhavati | yathA hi shuklA ime paTA ityAdipratItAvaneke paTA anekAni cha tadvisheShaNAni shauklayAnyavabhAsante | tathA bhinnA ima ityAdipratItAvapyaneke padArthA aneke cha bhedAH prakAshante ityabhyupagantavyam.h | nacha visheShapramANamasti | yenAtrAnyo vidhirbhaviShyatIti | 
etena saMyukttAvimAvityAdipratItirapi vyAkhyAtA veditavyA | 
nanvanayorbhedo.amIShAM bheda iti pratItAvanekAshritaM pR^ithaktavamupalabhyate | tatkathametaditi chet.h | kimatrAnekasya dharmitayA.avabhAsaM pramANayasi, uta dharmasyaikatvAvabhAsam.h, utobhayAvabhAsam.h | pakShatraye.apyuttaramAha- anayoriti || 
asyAmapi pratItAvito ghaTAdamuShya paTasyAmutaH paTAdamuShya ghaTasya bheda ityevaM dvidharmiko bhedo dR^iShTaH | tathAchAnekasya dharmitve.api dharmasyaikatvAvabhAsAsammatenarAnenAbhimatArthasiddhirityukttaM bhavati | anenaivAnayoH saMyoga ityAdipratItirapi vyAkhyAtA draShyavyA | 
nanu vachanaliN^gA hi vaktturabhiprAyAH | bheda  iti chaikavachanaM prayujyate | tena anumIyate.asyAM pratItAveka eva bhedo dvidharmiko dR^iShTa iti | tasmAdanyonyapratiyogikAnekadharmikAnekabhedaviShayatvaM pratIterna vakttuM shakyamityata Aha- tatreti ||
tatra anayobhareda ityAdivAkye, bhedadvaye vA | bhojanamityekavachanaM yathA tathetyarthaH | etena ekavachanena pratIterekArthaviShayatvAnumAne.anaikAntikatvaM samudAyaviShayatvenAnyathAsiddhishchetyukttaM bhavati | avayavinastvekatve.api na kashchiddoShaH | AkAshasya svAvayavairabhedavadavayavAnAmapyabhedasya aN^gIkR^itatvAt.h | paTasya cha yAdR^ishena tantusamudAyenAtyantAbhedo.abhihitaH sa eka eva | vyatiShakttAnAM tantUnAM vishiShyAkAro hyasau | sa chAgantukatvAttantubhyo bhinnAbhinna eva | ekaikena tantunA sarvaishchabhede.api bhedasyApi vidyamAnatvAnnAnyonyAbhedaprasakttiriti svayamevohyatAmiti nokttam.h | 
nanvevaM tarhi saMyogAderapyekaikAshritatvaM na vakttavyam.h | ayAvaddravyabhAvitvena bhedAbhedAbhyAmevokttAkShepasamAdhAnAditi | satyam.h | tathA.api vastusthitiriyamukttetyadoShaH | api chAjasaMyoge nAyaM samAdhiH sambhavati | sa eva nAsti pramANAbhAvAditi chenna | paramANoH AkAshAdisaMyogAN^gIkArAt.h | so.api paramANukarmaja iti chenna | prAgasayogaprasaN^gAt.h | aMshabhedAnneti chenna | svAbhAvikasyAnabhyupagamAt.h | aupAdhikasya cha nirAkariShyamANatvAt.h | 
kiJNchAkAshamIshvareNa saMyujyate dravyatvAdghaTavat.h | nacha mUrtatvamupAdhirvisheShaNavaiyarthyAt.h | parichChinnaparimANavattvenaivAlam.h | parichChinnatvavisheShaNaM tu vyarthameva | AkAshamIshvareNa na saMyujyate amUrtatvAdrUpavaditi chenna | adravyatvasyopAdhitvAditi | 
idAnIM sAmAnyasyaikaikAshritatvamAha- nastvAdikamiti || 
evaM saMyogAdivadekaikavR^ittItyarthaH | sAmAnyamapIti vakttavye brAhmaNatvAderayAvaddravyabhAvitvenApi tatra parihAraH sambhavatIti j~nApayituM naratvAdikamityukttam.h | upapAdanaM cha naikaprakAramiti yogavibhAgaH | kuto naratvAdikaM prativyakttibhinnamityata Aha- tattaditi ||
yathAhi nareShUpalabhyamAneShu tadIyaM rUpAdikaM pratiniyatamupalabhyate | tathA naratvAdikamapi tattanniyatadharmatayaiveyate dR^ishyate iti pratyakShamukttam.h | yadvA yo.anekAshrito dharmo nAsAvekaikapratItau pratIyate, yathA dvitvAdi | pratIyate cha naratvAdikamekaikapratItAvato nAnugatamityanumAnamanena sUchayati |
kiJNcha naratvAdikaM nAnekAnuvR^ittaM dharmatvAdrUpAdivat.h | asyAbhAsoddhAraM karoti- neti || 
sarvadharmaH anekavR^ittidharmaH | tena dharmatvaM na bhagnavyAptikamiti sheShaH | pakShadharmatA tu sphuTaiveti |
nanvanekatvasaN^khayA tAvadanekAshritA | ekaikasmindvitvAdeH | shaN^kitumapyashakyatvAt.h | nahi dvitvAdikamekaikapratItau pratIyate | nacha pratiyoginirUpyam.h | dharmitayaivAnekeShAmanubhavAt.h | ato dharmatvahetostatrAnaikAntyamityata Aha- samudAyastviti ||
samudAyo.anekatvaM bhinnago.anekAshritaH | satyamanekatvasaN^khayA.anekAshritA | tathA.api tadanyatvena hetuvisheShaNAdadoSha iti bhAvaH | sA chApekShAbuddhijanyatvAdayAvad.hdravyabhAvinI bhinnAbhinneti nAshrayayorabhedApattiH | 
prAbhAkarAstvAhuH | sAdR^ishyaM tAvadekamanekAnugataM, tatra dharmatvahetovyarbhichAraH  nacha vAchyaM sAmAnyameva sAdR^ishyamataH pakShe vyabhichArachodaneyamanupapanneti | jAtisaN^karaprasaN^gAt.h | asti hi kayoshchidashvarAsabhavaktayoH sAdR^ishyaM, tatra yadi sAdR^ishyamashvatvAtparam.h tadA sarveShAmapyashvAnAM rAsabhasAdR^ishyaM syAt.h | yadi chAparaM tadA rAsabhavyakttAvapyashvatvaM syAt.h | evaM rAsabhatve.api vAchyam.h | na sAdR^ishyamashvarAsabhavR^itti brUmaH | kintu tadavayavR^itti | dravyaguNAvayavakarmavR^ittIni sAmAnyAdeva hi sAdR^ishyanAmanyabhyupagachChAmo.ato na jAiAtasaN^karadoSha iti chenna | gaurgavayena sadR^ishItyAdivyavahArANAmamukhyatvaprasaN^gAt.h | nacha sAmAnyaM pratiyoginirUpyam.h | tannirUpyaM cha sAdR^ishyamiti sphuTo.anayorbheda ityata Aha- etAdR^ishaM cheti ||
bhavatu sAdR^ishyaM sAmAnyato bhinnaM tathA.api tatpadArtheShu pR^ithak.h pR^ithageveti na tena dharmatvahetorvyabhichAraH | etAdR^ishamiti tatrokttahetvatideshaH | nahi sAdR^ishyasyAnekavR^ittitve pramANasyAnena sAdR^ishyamasyAnena shuklAvimAvityAdivadupapatteH | anayoH sAdR^ishyamityAdeshchAsyAnena sAdR^ishyamasyAnena sAdR^ishyamityupapatteH | ekavachanasyA (cha) viprANAM bhojanamityAdivadupapannatvatpratiyogino dharmitvAsambhavAchcha | ekAshritatve.api pratiyoginirUpyatvenaikaikapratItAvapi apratItisambhavAchcheti |
naratvAdisAmAnyasya prativyakttibhinnatve.anumAnAntaramAha- ekasminniti ||
ekasminnare naShye tadAshritaM naratvaM tAvannaShyam.h | tathA.api sa naratvalakShaNo dharmo.anyatra narAntare dR^ishyata eva yato.ato.api 
naratvAdikamityukttena sambandhaH | yadvA vinaShyaM vinAshaH saha vinaShyena vartata iti savinaShyaM tasminvinAshavatIti yAvat.h | athavA.a.ashrayeNa saha vinaShyaM savinaShyaM tasminniti yojanA | ayamatra prayogaH | naShyAnaShyavarti naratvaM bhedavat.h viruddhadharmAshrayatvAchChAyA.a.atapavat.h | nachAsiddho hetuH | naShyAshrayasya naratvasya naShyatvAt.h | anyasya tu dR^ishyamAnatvena avinaShyatvAt.h | yadvedaM naratvaM vinaShyAnnaratvAdbhidyate.avinaShyatvAdghaTavat.h | yadi vA tannaratvamavinaShyAnnaratvAdbhidyate vinaShyatvAdghaTavaditi | 
bhavedetadyadi vinaShyanarAshritamapi naratvaM vinashyet.h | nachaitadasti tasya nityatvAdityata Aha- kuta iti ||
naShyanarAshritasyApi naratvasya punaH sattvaM na niShpramANakaM pratyakShasiddhatvAt.h | naShyAnaShyanarAshritaM naratvaM tAvadekam.h | tachchAvinaShye nare punarupalabhyate | ata evAnumAnamapi bAdhitaviShayamityata Aha- ekatva iti ||
syAtedadyadyetayorekatve mAnaM syAt.h | nacha tadastItyarthaH | nacha pratyabhij~nAnaM pramANam.h | tasya svarUpataH pramANatvena sandigdhatvAt.h | chashabdenAnyonyAshrayatvaM samuuchchinoti | ekatve hi punaH (tasya) sattvasiddhistatsiddhau chaikatvasiddhiriti |
evaM sAmAnyAdInAM pratyAshrayaM bhede pratyakShAnumAnAnyuktavA shrutimapyAha- shrutirapIti ||
Aha sAmAnyAdInAM pratyAshrayaM bhedamiti sheShaH | bhinnAH parasparato bhedavantaH | anyonyaM bhinnA dharmA yeShAM te bhinnadharmAH | bhinnadharmA ityanenAshrayato.api bhedo.abhihita iti shaN^kAnirAsArthamukttam.h- svairiti || svarUpairapi yathA bhagavAnmatsyAdibhiH | svaiH svairdharmairabhinnAshchetyasyApavAdo.anivR^itteti | anivR^itte.apyAshraye vinAsho yeShAM te tathokttAH | yathA.a.amaghaTashyAmatAdayaH | ubhayarUpakA bhinnAbhinnAH | na kenachiditi shrutiH svaprakR^itamupasaMharati | atra sarvasha ityAdivachanAdukttavivaraNAchchAdaraH pratIyate | 
nanu ghaTAderAmadravyasyAgninA sambaddhasya, agnyabhighAtAnnodanAdvA tadArambhakeShu paramANuShu, karmANyutpadyante | tebhyo vibhAgAH, vibhAgebhyassaMyogavinAshAH | saMyogavinAshebhyaH kAryadravyaM vinashyati | tasminvichaShye paramANuShvagnisaMyogAdauShNyApekShAchChyAmAdInAM vinAshaH | punaranyasmAdagnisaMyogAdauShNyApekShAtpAkajA jAyante | tadanantaraM bhoginAmadR^iShTApekShAdAtmANusaMyogAdutpannapAkajeShvaNuShu karmotpattau teShAM parasparasaMyogAddvayaNukAdikrameNa kAryadravyamutpadyate | tatra cha kAraNaguNaprakrameNa rUpAdyutpattirbhavati | tatkathamAmaghaTashyAmatvAdInAmayAvad.hdravyabhAvitvamuchyate | 
maivam.h | atra pramANAbhAvAt.h | 
nodanAdyutpattau karmotpattiH pramANam.h, karmasu vibhAgAH, teShu pUrvasaMyoganivR^ittiH, tatra kAryadravyavinAshaH, tatra cha pUrvarUpAdiparAvR^ittiH, tathA rUpAdyantarotpattiH sthUladravyotpattau pramANam.h, sA tadavayavaparamparAyAm.h, sA dvayaNuke, tadutpattiH paramANusaMyoge, sa cha tatkriyAyam.h, sA tadavayavaparamparAyAm.h, sA tadavayavaparamparAyAm.h, sA dvayaNuke, tadutpattiH paramANusaMyoge, sa cha tatkriyAyAm.h, sA.adR^iShTavadAtmasaMyoga iti chenna | paramANuShviva kAryadravyeShu pUrvarUpAdinivR^itterapUvarrUpAdyutpatterupapatteH | pArthivAvayavirUpAdayaH svAshrayavinAshAdeva vinashyanti avayavirUpAditvAt.h dagdhapaTarUpAdivat.h | kAraNaguNebhya evotpadyante tata eva tadvadeveti chenna | kvachitsatyAshraye.api rUpA(dInAM vi)divinAshe.agnisaMyogajatve cha virodhAbhAvAt.h | anyathA kAryadravyaM saMyogavinAshAdeva vinashyati kAryadravyatvAt.h dvayaNukavadityAdikamapi syAt.h | 
nanvagnisaMyogaH sarvAvayaveShvasti na vA | nachettatra rUpAdivinAshotpAdAsambhavaH | tathA chAvayavAvayavinorvilakShaNarUpAdimattvaM syAt.h | Adye.agnyavayavAnAM sarvatra praveshena avayavinAshasyAvarjanIyatvamiti chet.h | avayavidravyANAM sachChidratvena praveshopapatteH | saMsthAnApagamAbhAvenAvayavivinAshAyogAt.h | tathAvidhasyaivodAhR^itatvAdityalam.h | 
evaM sAmAnyasyAnekavR^ittitvaM pramANairapAkR^itam.h | tadayukttam.h | tasyAnekavR^ittitvAbhAve bAdhakasadbhAvAt.h | 
tathAhi | sarveShu gopiNDeShu yadyanugatamekaM gotvasAmAnyaM na syAt.h tadA tatra goshabdasaN^gatigrahaNalakShaNA vyutpattirna syAt.h | vR^iddhavyavahAropadeshAdinA hi vyutpattirbhavati | nacha pratipiNDaM vyavahArAdikamasti | teShAmAnantyena vyutpattAveva puruShAyuShaparyavasAnaprasaN^gAt.h | ato yatropadeshAdikaM tatraiva vyutpattirvyavahArashcheti syAt.h | atha vinaivaikena nimittenopadeshAdyabhAve.api gopiNDAntare goshabda(saN^gatiM)saN^ketaM gR^ihNIyAt.h | tadA.ashvapiNDe.api kinna gR^ihNIyAt.h | avisheShAt.h | anugatagotve tu goshabdavR^ittinimittatayopadeshAdinA.avagate nAyaM doShaH prAduShyAt.h | tasmAdanekeShvekashabdasaN^gatigrahaNAnyathA.anupapattyA.anugatamekamabhyupagantavyameva | 
nanu kathaM tarhi sAmAnyarahiteShu pR^ithivyAdiShu bhUtamUrtAdishabdasaN^gatigrahaNam.h | uchyate | tatrApi 
bAhyaikendriyagrAhyaguNAshrayatveyattAvachChinnaparimANatvAdyupAdhinibandhanaiva vyutpattiH | upAdhInAM vyAvR^ittatve.apyanugatasAmAnyAshrayatvena doShAbhAvAt.h | 
kiJNchAnugatatantutvapaTatvAdisAmAnyAbhAve kAryakAraNabhAvAvadhAraNaM na syAt.h | tatashcha kAryArthinaH kAraNe pravR^ittirna syAt.h | 
kAyarkAraNabhAve hyanvayavyatirekau vopadesho vA pramANam.h | nacha vyAvR^itteShu vastuShvanvayavyatirekagrahaNamupapadyate | niyamavyabhichArayodurj~nAnatvAt.h | 
upadeshashchAnanteShu na sambhavatyevetyukttam.h |
api cha vyAptij~nAnamapyanugatasAmAnyAbhAve.anupapannaM syAt.h | vyAvR^ittavastUnAmanvayavyatirekAvagamAnupapatteH | 
sAmAnyApavAdanyAyashchAnugatasAmAnyAbhAve na bhavet.h | dvayoH pramANayorekasvarUpaviShayatve (hya)tvanyatarasyAprAmANyameva syAt.h | bhinnaviShayatve nApavAdaviShayo.asti | asti cha tAvadgaurayamityanugatAkArapratyayaH | nachAsau vyAvR^itteShu sambhavati | bhrAntatvaprasaN^gAt.h | nachaitatsavarmanyApohanibandhanam.h | tasyApi pratipiNDaM vyAvR^ittatvAt.h | anugatatve vA kimaparAddhaM sAmAnyena | tathAcha vidhirUpaH pratyayo.api samAhitaH syAt.h | 
evaMchAN^gIkArye gotvAderanugame nityatvamapyanivAryamityata Aha- vyutpattirapIti ||
apipadaM kAryakAraNabhAvAvadhAraNAdisamuchchayArtham.h | hishabdo yasmAdityarthe | gamyate abhyupagamyate.avagamyata iti | asti tAvatsAdR^ishyaM nAma padArthAntaram.h | gosadR^isho gavaya ityAdyadhyakShasiddhatvAt.h | tenaiva chopapadyate vyutpattyAdikam.h | tasmAnna tadarthaM gotvAderanugatatvaM kalpanIyam.h | sAdR^ishyena tAvat.h shabdavyutpattiprakAraM darshayitumupakramate- sarveShviti ||
bahavo hi shabdasaN^gatigrahaNopAyAH | tatra yadopadeshato vyutpadyate tadA.ayaM gaurityupadeshavAkyaM vyAptigrAhakatayopayujyate | katham.h | sAdR^ishyopadhAnena sarveShu gopiNDeShu yugapadekakAlamayamityAdishabdaH pravartate | ayaM gaurityasyAyametatsadR^ishAH sarve.api goshabdavAchya ityartho vaktrA abhipreyate | shrotrA chAvadhAryata iti yAvat.h | dvayorapi sArvatrikavyutpattikAmatvena vAkyasyaikapiNDaviShaya(ka)tvakalpanAnupapatteriti bhAvaH | 
MyadyayaM gaurityAdivAkyaM naikapiNDamAtraviShayam.h | kintvayaM chaitatsadR^ishAshcha sarve goshabdavAchyA iti vyAptiparaM tadA saN^gatigrahaNottarakAlaM gAmAnayetyuktte goshabdAtsarvagopratipattiH syAt.h | abhIShyagopratipattistu jAyate sA kathamiti taTasthasya chodyaM pariharati- tathA.apIti ||
yadyapyupadesho naikapiNDavisheShagocharastathA.api gAmAnayetyuktte.abhIShyagopiNDAvagatiH syAdeva | katham.h | prAptito yogyatvAt.h | atItAnAgatAnAmatyantaviprakR^iShyadeshasthAnAM gavAmAnayanayogyatA.abhAvamAlochya tatparityAga ityarthaH | tarhi sannihitasarvagopratipattiH kuto na bhavati iti chenna | gAmityekavachanAt.h | tathA.api yasya kasyachidekasya gopiNDasya pratipattiH syAt.h | nAbhIShyasyaiveti chenna | shabalaM bahulAM kAlAkShImityAdivisheShaNAt.h | etadukttaM bhavati | goshabdAdbhavatyeva sarvagopratipattiH | kintu liN^gaprakaraNAdibalAtpiNDavisheShe kAryapratipattiriti | 
astvayaM gaurityAdivAkyaM vyAptiparam.h | tataH kimityata Aha- shakttiriti ||
yato vAchakatvashakttiH  shabdasya sAdR^ishyagA sAdR^ishyasambandhinI sAdR^ishya(sya) vyApiketi yAvat.h | asmAdvAkyAdavadhAriteti sheShaH | atastAM shakttiM tattadviShayatayA sAdR^ishyaM sphuTaM j~nApayati | kathamityataH prayogaprakAraM darshayati- tAdR^isha iti ||
cho yasmAdityarthe | ayaM paridR^ishyamAno yasmAttAdR^isha upadeshakAle sannihitena piNDena sadR^ishastasmAt.h | tachChabdaH sa shabdo yasya vAchako.asau tathokttaH | itishabdaH prakAravAchI | 
ayamatra samudAyArthaH | vyutpattyatharM tAvannAnugataM kimapyaN^gIkaraNIyam.h | sAdR^ishyenaiva tadupapatteH | nacha vAchyaM sAdR^ishyamapyanugataM chetkiM sAmAnyenAparAddham.h | vyAvR^ittatve kathaM sArvatrikavyutpattyaN^gamiti | nahi sAdR^ishyaM shabdashakttiviShayatayA pravR^ittinimittatayA vA abhyupagamyate | kinnAma liN^gatayA | yathA hi gandhavattvaM na pR^ithivIshabdavAchyam.h, nApi tatpravR^ittinimittam.h, kintu pR^ithivItvavatyA vyaktteH pR^ithivIshabdavAchyatve liN^gameva | tathA tete vyAvR^ittAmapi tadavabodhe liN^gatayopayujyate | tathA hi | yadA.ayaM gaurityupadeshapUrvikA vyutpattistadA tadvAkyaM vyAptigrAhakam.h | ayaM chaitanyasadR^ishAshcha sarve goshabdavAchyA ityevamparatvAt.h | vyavahArAdipUrvikAyAM tu vyutpattau bhUyovyavahArAdidasharne sAdR^ishyavyApyatA.avagamo bhavati | tatashchaitadvAkyAdinA.avagatavyAptirityanumIyate "ayaM goshabdavAchyo bhavitumarhati tatsadR^ishatvAt.h yastatsadR^ishassa goshabdavAchyastathA chAyaM tatsadR^ishastasmAdgoshabdavAchyaH' iti |
nanvatra ko dR^iShTAntaH | upadeshakAle sannihito gopiNDa iti chenna | tasya tatsadR^ishatvAbhAvAt.h | maivam.h | dR^iShTAntaniyamasya nirastatvAt.h | nacha sAsnAdimattvameva liN^gamastu kiM sAdR^ishyeneti vAchyam.h | tasya gotvavatprativyakttivyAvR^ittatvAt.h | sAdR^ishyasya tu vyAvR^ittatve.api pratiyoginirUpyatvenAnugataphalasAdhakatvAnubhavAt.h | sAsnAdimattvasyApi sAdR^ishyopahitasya liN^gatvamabhyupagachChAmaH | nacha vAchyaM gosAdR^ishyamashve.apyastIti tatrApi goshabdavAchyatAnumAnaprasaN^ga iti | jAtinimittatve.apyevaM prasaN^gasya samAnatvAt.h | jAtivisheSho nimittatayA.aN^gIkriyate yo.avyabhichArIti chet.h | tarhi sAdR^ishyavisheSha eva liN^gaM yo lakShaNabhUta iti vadAmaH | 
etena kAryakAraNabhAvAvadhAraNAdikamapi samAhitaM veditavyam.h | sAdR^ishyenaiva tadupapatteH | antyavisheShe hi na kiJNchidanugatamasti, nApyanugatAshraya upAdhiH | tadbhAve dravyaguNakarmavadatyantavyAvartakatvasvarUpahAniprasaN^gAt.h | tathA.apyasti tatra visheShashabdavyutpattiH atyantavyAvR^i(tti)ttabuddhiM prati kAraNatvAvadhAraNamityAdi | tatra pareNApi lakShaNarUpaM sAdR^ishyamevAdaraNIyamiti | 
evamanugatasAmAnyAnabhyupagamenaiva vyutpattyAdikaM samarthitam.h | yastu manyate anugatasAmanyenaiva vyutpattyAdikaM nAnyatheti tasya bAdhakamAha- jAtitashchediti ||
yadyanugatajAtinimittaiva sarvatra vyutpattiH kAryakAraNabhAvAvadhAraNAdikaM cha syAt.h | tadA tAsu jAtiShu kathaM jAtyAdishabdavyutpattiranugatabuddhikAraNatvAvadhAraNaM, gotvaM nityaM jAtitvAdityAdivyAptij~nAnamityAdikaM syAt.h | jAtiShu jAtyabhAvena tatra vyutpattyAdikaM na syAdityarthaH | 
yadi vaiyAtyAtkashchidbrUyAt.h  "asti jAtiShvapi jAtitvaM nAma jAtistadvashAttatra savarmupapadyate' iti, taM pratyAha- tatra chediti ||
yadi tatra jAtiShvapi jAtitvaM nAma jAtiraN^gIkriyate tadA.anavasthitiH syAt.h | tathAhi gotvAdijAtiShu jAtishabdapravR^ittinimittaM yA jAtitvaM nAma jAtiH sA na tAvatsvarUpe vartate | svavR^iR^itteraprAmANikatvAt.h | ataH svavyatirikttAsveva jAtiShu vartata iti vAchyam.h | tathAcha svavyatirikttajAtiShu jAtishabdapravR^ittAviyaM nimittaM syAnna tu svarUpe.api | atastasyAM tadvayatirikttAsu jAtiShvekasya jAtishabdasya pravR^ittau nimittaM jAtyantaramaN^gIkaraNIyam.h | tatrApyevamevetyanavastheti |
nanu gotvAdijAtiShu jAtitvaprayuktto jAtishabdaH | jAtitve tUpadeshAdhIno bhavatu | tasyA ekatvAditi | maivam.h | na hyasmAbhiH sAdR^ishyamiva bhavatA jAtiH (jAti)shabdapravR^ittau j~nApakatayopeyate | yena kvachidupadesho niveshyate | kintu nimittatayA | tatropadeshopanyAsasya kvopayogaH | sthAnAntare.api bAdhakamAha- tathaiveti ||
yathA jAtivij~nAnaM jAtitvAbhAvena dUShitaM tathaiva vyakttivij~nAnaM vyakttInAM vyakttishabdavAchyatvavij~nAnaM tannimittavyakttitvajAtyabhAvena dUShitam.h | dravyaguNakarmANi khalu vyakttaya uchyante | nacha tatra vyakttitvaM nAma sAmAnyamasti | sattayA parAparabhAvAbhAvAt.h | tasmAttatra vyakttishabdavAchyatvaj~nAnaM na syAt.h | mA bhUdvayatirikttaM vyakttitvaM sattaiva vyakttishabdapravR^ittau nimittaM bhaviShyatIti chenna | sAmAnyasya paryAyapravR^ittau nimittatvAt.h | sadvayakttishabdayoraparyAyatvAt.h | anyathA saMyogyAdishabdAnAmapi dravyAdishabdapayarAyatvaM syAt.h |
nanu shabdamAtrasya jAtinimittatvAtsattayA parAparabhAvashUnyamapi dravyaguNakarmasu vyakttitvamastyevetyato nokttadoSha ityata Aha- yadIti ||
tarhi tasya vyakttitvasyApi visheSheShu vyakttiShu praveshaH syAt.h | tathA chAnavasthitiriti yojanA | tathA hi | yaH shabdo.anekavAchakaH sa sarvo jAtinimittaka iti svIkR^itya dravyaguNakarmasu vyakttitvaM nAma jAtiryadyaN^gIkriyate | tarhi tasyAmanyAsu cha jAtiShu jAtishabdapravR^ittaye jAtitvaM jAtiraN^gIkartavyA syAt.h | omiti chet.h | tarhi sA vyakttitvajAtirapi jAtitvajAtiM prati vyakttiH syAt.h | nacha sA svarUpe vartate tato dravyAditraye tasyAM cha vyakttishabdapravR^ittyarthamaparaM vyakttitvamaN^gIkaraNIyam.h | tatra punarjAtishabdapravR^ittaye jAtitvamabhyupagantavyamiti sA.api tadAshrayatayA vyakttiH syAt.h | tasyAM punarvyakttitvAntaramityevamanavastheti |
sthalAntare bAdhakamAha- kathamiti ||
atra svarUpamityadhyAhartavyam.h | tatashchAyamarthaH | yadyanugatasAmAnyanibandhanaiva sarvatra vyutpattistadA sakalapadArthasvarUpaM svarUpashabdavAchyatayA kathaM j~nAyate | anugatasya svarUpatvasAmAnyasyAbhAvAt.h | svarUpeShu svarUpashabdavyutpattirna syAditi |
